original: BhP_12.01.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.01.001/1 yo 'ntyaḥ purañjayo nāma bhaviṣyo bārahadrathaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ntyaḥ purañjayaḥ nāma bhaviṣyaḥ bārahadrathaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.001/3 tasyāmātyas tu śunako hatvā svāminam ātma-jam
analyzed: tasya amātyaḥ tu śunakaḥ hatvā svāminam ātmajam

original: BhP_12.01.002/1 pradyota-saṃjñaṃ rājānaṃ kartā yat-pālakaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: pradyota saṃjñam rājānam kartā yad pālakaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.002/3 viśākhayūpas tat-putro bhavitā rājakas tataḥ
analyzed: viśākhayūpaḥ tad putraḥ bhavitā rājakaḥ tatas

original: BhP_12.01.003/1 nandivardhanas tat-putraḥ pañca pradyotanā ime
analyzed: nandivardhanaḥ tad putraḥ pañca pradyotanāḥ ime

original: BhP_12.01.003/3 aṣṭa-triṃśottara-śataṃ bhokṣyanti pṛthivīṃ nṛpāḥ
analyzed: aṣṭatriṃśottaraśatam bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.004/1 śiśunāgas tato bhāvyaḥ kākavarṇas tu tat-sutaḥ
analyzed: śiśunāgaḥ tatas bhāvyaḥ kākavarṇaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.004/3 kṣemadharmā tasya sutaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣemadharma-jaḥ
analyzed: kṣemadharmā tasya sutaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣemadharma jaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.005/1 vidhisāraḥ sutas tasyā- jātaśatrur bhaviṣyati
analyzed: vidhisāraḥ sutaḥ tasyāḥ jātaśatruḥ bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_12.01.005/3 darbhakas tat-suto bhāvī darbhakasyājayaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: darbhakaḥ tad sutaḥ bhāvī darbhakasya ajayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.006/1 nandivardhana ājeyo mahānandiḥ sutas tataḥ
analyzed: nandivardhanaḥ ājeyaḥ mahānandiḥ sutaḥ tatas

original: BhP_12.01.006/3 śiśunāgā daśaivaite saṣṭy-uttara-śata-trayam
analyzed: śiśunāgāḥ daśa eva ete saṣṭi uttara śata trayam

original: BhP_12.01.007/1 samā bhokṣyanti pṛthivīṃ kuru-śreṣṭha kalau nṛpāḥ
analyzed: samāḥ bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm kuruśreṣṭha kalau nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.007/3 mahānandi-suto rājan śūdrā-garbhodbhavo balī
analyzed: mahānandi sutaḥ rājan śūdrā garbha udbhavaḥ balī

original: BhP_12.01.008/1 mahāpadma-patiḥ kaścin nandaḥ kṣatra-vināśa-kṛt
analyzed: mahāpadma patiḥ kaścid nandaḥ kṣatra vināśa kṛt

original: BhP_12.01.008/3 tato nṛpā bhaviṣyanti śūdra-prāyās tv adhārmikāḥ
analyzed: tatas nṛpāḥ bhaviṣyanti śūdra prāyāḥ tu adhārmikāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.009/1 sa eka-cchatrāṃ pṛthivīm anullaṅghita-śāsanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eka chatrām pṛthivīm an ullaṅghita śāsanaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.009/3 śāsiṣyati mahāpadmo dvitīya iva bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: śāsiṣyati mahāpadmaḥ dvitīyaḥ iva bhārgavaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.010/1 tasya cāṣṭau bhaviṣyanti sumālya-pramukhāḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: tasya ca aṣṭau bhaviṣyanti sumālya pramukhāḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.010/3 ya imāṃ bhokṣyanti mahīṃ rājānaś ca śataṃ samāḥ
analyzed: ye imām bhokṣyanti mahīm rājānaḥ ca śatam samāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.011/1 nava nandān dvijaḥ kaścit prapannān uddhariṣyati
analyzed: nava nandān dvijaḥ kaścid prapannān uddhariṣyati

original: BhP_12.01.011/3 teṣāṃ abhāve jagatīṃ mauryā bhokṣyanti vai kalau
analyzed: teṣām abhāve jagatīm mauryāḥ bhokṣyanti vai kalau

original: BhP_12.01.012/1 sa eva candraguptaṃ vai dvijo rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
analyzed: saḥ eva candraguptam vai dvijaḥ rājye bhiṣekṣyati

original: BhP_12.01.012/3 tat-suto vārisāras tu tataś cāśokavardhanaḥ
analyzed: tad sutaḥ vārisāraḥ tu tatas ca aśokavardhanaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.013/1 suyaśā bhavitā tasya saṅgataḥ suyaśaḥ-sutaḥ
analyzed: suyaśāḥ bhavitā tasya saṅgataḥ suyaśaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.013/3 śāliśūkas tatas tasya somaśarmā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śāliśūkaḥ tatas tasya somaśarmā bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_12.01.013/5 śatadhanvā tatas tasya bhavitā tad-bṛhadrathaḥ
analyzed: śatadhanvā tatas tasya bhavitā tad bṛhat rathaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.014/1 mauryā hy ete daśa nṛpāḥ sapta-triṃśac-chatottaram
analyzed: mauryāḥ hi ete daśa nṛpāḥ saptatriṃśat śata uttaram

original: BhP_12.01.014/3 samā bhokṣyanti pṛthivīṃ kalau kuru-kulodvaha
analyzed: samāḥ bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm kalau kuru kula udvaha

original: BhP_12.01.015/1 agnimitras tatas tasmāt sujyeṣṭho bhavitā tataḥ
analyzed: agnimitraḥ tatas tasmāt sujyeṣṭhaḥ bhavitā tatas

original: BhP_12.01.015/3 vasumitro bhadrakaś ca pulindo bhavitā sutaḥ
analyzed: vasumitraḥ bhadrakaḥ ca pulindaḥ bhavitā sutaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.016/1 tato ghoṣaḥ sutas tasmād vajramitro bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tatas ghoṣaḥ sutaḥ tasmāt vajramitraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_12.01.016/3 tato bhāgavatas tasmād devabhūtiḥ kurūdvaha
analyzed: tatas bhāgavataḥ tasmāt devabhūtiḥ kuru udvaha

original: BhP_12.01.017/1 śuṅgā daśaite bhokṣyanti bhūmiṃ varṣa-śatādhikam
analyzed: śuṅgāḥ daśa ete bhokṣyanti bhūmim varṣa śata adhikam

original: BhP_12.01.017/3 tataḥ kāṇvān iyaṃ bhūmir yāsyaty alpa-guṇān nṛpa
analyzed: tatas kāṇvān iyam bhūmiḥ yāsyati alpa guṇān nṛpa

original: BhP_12.01.018/1 śuṅgaṃ hatvā devabhūtiṃ kāṇvo 'mātyas tu kāminam
analyzed: śuṅgam hatvā devabhūtim kāṇvaḥ mātyaḥ tu kāminam

original: BhP_12.01.018/3 svayaṃ kariṣyate rājyaṃ vasudevo mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: svayam kariṣyate rājyam vasudevaḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_12.01.019/1 tasya putras tu bhūmitras tasya nārāyaṇaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ tu bhūmitraḥ tasya nārāyaṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.019/3 kāṇvāyanā ime bhūmiṃ catvāriṃśac ca pañca ca
analyzed: kāṇvāyanāḥ ime bhūmim catvāriṃśat ca pañca ca

original: BhP_12.01.019/5 śatāni trīṇi bhokṣyanti varṣāṇāṃ ca kalau yuge
analyzed: śatāni trīṇi bhokṣyanti varṣāṇām ca kalau yuge

original: BhP_12.01.020/1 hatvā kāṇvaṃ suśarmāṇaṃ tad-bhṛtyo vṛṣalo balī
analyzed: hatvā kāṇvam suśarmāṇam tad bhṛtyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ balī

original: BhP_12.01.020/3 gāṃ bhokṣyaty andhra-jātīyaḥ kañcit kālam asattamaḥ
analyzed: gām bhokṣyati andhra jātīyaḥ kañcid kālam asattamaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.021/1 kṛṣṇa-nāmātha tad-bhrātā bhavitā pṛthivī-patiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa nāmā atha tad bhrātā bhavitā pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: BhP_12.01.021/3 śrī-śāntakarṇas tat-putraḥ paurṇamāsas tu tat-sutaḥ
BhP_12.01.022/1 lambodaras tu tat-putras tasmāc cibilako nṛpaḥ
analyzed: lambodaraḥ tu tad putraḥ tasmāt cibilakaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.022/3 meghasvātiś cibilakād aṭamānas tu tasya ca
analyzed: meghasvātiḥ cibilakāt aṭamānaḥ tu tasya ca

original: BhP_12.01.023/1 aniṣṭakarmā hāleyas talakas tasya cātma-jaḥ
analyzed: aniṣṭa karmā hāleyaḥ talakaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.023/3 purīṣabhīrus tat-putras tato rājā sunandanaḥ
analyzed: purīṣabhīruḥ tad putraḥ tatas rājā sunandanaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.024/1 cakoro bahavo yatra śivasvātir arin-damaḥ
analyzed: cakoraḥ bahavaḥ yatra śiva svātiḥ arindamaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.024/3 tasyāpi gomatī putraḥ purīmān bhavitā tataḥ
analyzed: tasya api gomatī putraḥ purīmān bhavitā tatas

original: BhP_12.01.025/1 medaśirāḥ śivaskando yajñaśrīs tat-sutas tataḥ
BhP_12.01.025/3 vijayas tat-suto bhāvyaś candravijñaḥ sa-lomadhiḥ
analyzed: vijayaḥ tad sutaḥ bhāvyaḥ candravijñaḥ salomadhiḥ

original: BhP_12.01.026/1 ete triṃśan nṛpatayaś catvāry abda-śatāni ca
analyzed: ete triṃśat nṛpatayaḥ catvāri abda śatāni ca

original: BhP_12.01.027/3 ṣaṭ-pañcāśac ca pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti kuru-nandana
analyzed: ṣaṭpañcāśat ca pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti kuru nandana

original: BhP_12.01.027/1 saptābhīrā āvabhṛtyā daśa gardabhino nṛpāḥ
analyzed: sapta ābhīrāḥ āvabhṛtyāḥ daśa gardabhinaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.027/3 kaṅkāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhū-pālā bhaviṣyanty ati-lolupāḥ
analyzed: kaṅkāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhūpālāḥ bhaviṣyanti ati lolupāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.028/1 tato 'ṣṭau yavanā bhāvyāś caturdaśa turuṣkakāḥ
analyzed: ṣṭau yavanāḥ bhāvyāḥ caturdaśa turuṣkakāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.028/3 bhūyo daśa guruṇḍāś ca maulā ekādaśaiva tu
analyzed: bhūyas daśa guruṇḍāḥ ca maulāḥ ekādaśā eva tu

original: BhP_12.01.029/1 ete bhokṣyanti pṛthivīṃ daśa varṣa-śatāni ca
analyzed: ete bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm daśa varṣa śatāni ca

original: BhP_12.01.029/3 navādhikāṃ ca navatiṃ maulā ekādaśa kṣitim
analyzed: nava adhikām ca navatim maulāḥ ekādaśa kṣitim

original: BhP_12.01.030/1 bhokṣyanty abda-śatāny aṅga trīṇi taiḥ saṃsthite tataḥ
analyzed: bhokṣyanti abda śatāni aṅga trīṇi taiḥ saṃsthite tatas

original: BhP_12.01.030/3 kilakilāyāṃ nṛpatayo bhūtanando 'tha vaṅgiriḥ
analyzed: kilakilāyām nṛpatayaḥ vaṅgiriḥ

original: BhP_12.01.031/1 śiśunandiś ca tad-bhrātā yaśonandiḥ pravīrakaḥ
analyzed: śiśunandiḥ ca tad bhrātā yaśonandiḥ pravīrakaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.031/3 ity ete vai varṣa-śataṃ bhaviṣyanty adhikāni ṣaṭ
analyzed: iti ete vai varṣa śatam bhaviṣyanti adhikāni ṣaḍ

original: BhP_12.01.032/1 teṣāṃ trayodaśa sutā bhavitāraś ca bāhlikāḥ
analyzed: teṣām trayodaśa sutāḥ bhavitāraḥ ca bāhlikāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.032/3 puṣpamitro 'tha rājanyo durmitro 'sya tathaiva ca
analyzed: rājanyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: BhP_12.01.033/1 eka-kālā ime bhū-pāḥ saptāndhrāḥ sapta kauśalāḥ
analyzed: eka kālāḥ ime bhūpāḥ sapta andhrāḥ sapta kauśalāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.033/3 vidūra-patayo bhāvyā niṣadhās tata eva hi
analyzed: vidūra patayaḥ bhāvyāḥ niṣadhāḥ tatas eva hi

original: BhP_12.01.034/1 māgadhānāṃ tu bhavitā viśvasphūrjiḥ purañjayaḥ
analyzed: māgadhānām tu bhavitā viśvasphūrjiḥ purañjayaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.034/3 kariṣyaty aparo varṇān pulinda-yadu-madrakān
analyzed: kariṣyati aparaḥ varṇān pulinda yadu madrakān

original: BhP_12.01.035/1 prajāś cābrahma-bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sthāpayiṣyati durmatiḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ ca a brahma bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sthāpayiṣyati durmatiḥ

original: BhP_12.01.035/3 vīryavān kṣatram utsādya padmavatyāṃ sa vai puri
analyzed: vīryavān kṣatram utsādya padmavatyām sa vai puri

original: BhP_12.01.035/5 anu-gaṅgam ā-prayāgaṃ guptāṃ bhokṣyati medinīm
analyzed: anu gaṅgam ā prayāgam guptām bhokṣyati medinīm

original: BhP_12.01.036/1 saurāṣṭrāvanty-ābhīrāś ca śūrā arbuda-mālavāḥ
analyzed: saurāṣṭra āvantya ābhīrāḥ ca śūrāḥ arbuda mālavāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.036/3 vrātyā dvijā bhaviṣyanti śūdra-prāyā janādhipāḥ
analyzed: vrātyāḥ dvijāḥ bhaviṣyanti śūdra prāyāḥ janādhipāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.037/1 sindhos taṭaṃ candrabhāgāṃ kauntīṃ kāśmīra-maṇḍalam
analyzed: sindhoḥ taṭam candrabhāgām kauntīm kāśmīra maṇḍalam

original: BhP_12.01.037/3 bhokṣyanti śūdrā vrātyādyā mlecchāś cābrahma-varcasaḥ
analyzed: bhokṣyanti śūdrāḥ vrātya ādyāḥ mlecchāḥ ca abrahmavarcasaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.038/1 tulya-kālā ime rājan mleccha-prāyāś ca bhū-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: tulya kālāḥ ime rājan mleccha prāyāḥ ca bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.038/3 ete 'dharmānṛta-parāḥ phalgu-dās tīvra-manyavaḥ
analyzed: ete dharma anṛta parāḥ phalgudāḥ tīvra manyavaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.039/1 strī-bāla-go-dvija-ghnāś ca para-dāra-dhanādṛtāḥ
analyzed: strī bāla go dvija ghnāḥ ca para dāra dhana ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.039/3 uditāsta-mita-prāyā alpa-sattvālpakāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: udita astamita prāyāḥ alpa sattva alpaka āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.040/1 asaṃskṛtāḥ kriyā-hīnā rajasā tamasāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: asaṃskṛtāḥ kriyā hīnāḥ rajasā tamasā āvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_12.01.040/3 prajās te bhakṣayiṣyanti mlecchā rājanya-rūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ te bhakṣayiṣyanti mlecchāḥ rājanya rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.041/1 tan-nāthās te janapadās tac-chīlācāra-vādinaḥ
analyzed: tad nāthāḥ te janapadāḥ tad śīla ācāra vādinaḥ

original: BhP_12.01.041/3 anyonyato rājabhiś ca kṣayaṃ yāsyanti pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: anyonyataḥ rājabhiḥ ca kṣayam yāsyanti pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.02.001/1 tataś cānu-dinaṃ dharmaḥ satyaṃ śaucaṃ kṣamā dayā
analyzed: tatas ca anudinam dharmaḥ satyam śaucam kṣamā dayā

original: BhP_12.02.001/3 kālena balinā rājan naṅkṣyaty āyur balaṃ smṛtiḥ
analyzed: kālena balinā rājan naṅkṣyati āyuḥ balam smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_12.02.002/1 vittam eva kalau nṝṇāṃ janmācāra-guṇodayaḥ
analyzed: vittam eva kalau nṝṇām janma ācāra guṇa udayaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.002/3 dharma-nyāya-vyavasthāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ balam eva hi
analyzed: dharma nyāya vyavasthāyām kāraṇam balam eva hi

original: BhP_12.02.003/1 dāmpatye 'bhirucir hetur māyaiva vyāvahārike
analyzed: dāmpatye bhiruciḥ hetuḥ māyā eva vyāvahārike

original: BhP_12.02.003/3 strītve puṃstve ca hi ratir vipratve sūtram eva hi
analyzed: strī tve puṃs tve ca hi ratiḥ vipra tve sūtram eva hi

original: BhP_12.02.004/1 liṅgaṃ evāśrama-khyātāv anyonyāpatti-kāraṇam
BhP_12.02.004/3 avṛttyā nyāya-daurbalyaṃ pāṇḍitye cāpalaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: avṛttyā nyāya daurbalyam pāṇḍitye cāpalam vacaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.005/1 anāḍhyataivāsādhutve sādhutve dambha eva tu
analyzed: an āḍhya tā eva a sādhu tve sādhu tve dambhaḥ eva tu

original: BhP_12.02.005/3 svīkāra eva codvāhe snānam eva prasādhanam
analyzed: svīkāre eva ca udvāhe snānam eva prasādhanam

original: BhP_12.02.006/1 dūre vāry-ayanaṃ tīrthaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ keśa-dhāraṇam
analyzed: dūre vāri ayanam tīrtham lāvaṇyam keśa dhāraṇam

original: BhP_12.02.006/3 udaraṃ-bharatā svārthaḥ satyatve dhārṣṭyam eva hi
analyzed: udaraṃbharatā sva arthaḥ satya tve dhārṣṭyam eva hi

original: BhP_12.02.006/5 dākṣyaṃ kuṭumba-bharaṇaṃ yaśo 'rthe dharma-sevanam
analyzed: dākṣyam kuṭumba bharaṇam yaśaḥ rthe dharma sevanam

original: BhP_12.02.007/1 evaṃ prajābhir duṣṭābhir ākīrṇe kṣiti-maṇḍale
analyzed: evam prajābhiḥ duṣṭābhiḥ ākīrṇe kṣiti maṇḍale

original: BhP_12.02.007/3 brahma-viṭ-kṣatra-śūdrāṇāṃ yo balī bhavitā nṛpaḥ
analyzed: brahma viś kṣatra śūdrāṇām yaḥ balī bhavitā nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.008/1 prajā hi lubdhai rājanyair nirghṛṇair dasyu-dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ hi lubdhaiḥ rājanyaiḥ nirghṛṇaiḥ dasyu dharmabhiḥ

original: BhP_12.02.008/3 ācchinna-dāra-draviṇā yāsyanti giri-kānanam
analyzed: ācchinna dāra draviṇāḥ yāsyanti giri kānanam

original: BhP_12.02.009/1 śāka-mūlāmiṣa-kṣaudra- phala-puṣpāṣṭi-bhojanāḥ
analyzed: śāka mūla āmiṣa kṣaudra phala puṣpa aṣṭi bhojanāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.009/3 anāvṛṣṭyā vinaṅkṣyanti durbhikṣa-kara-pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: anāvṛṣṭyā vinaṅkṣyanti durbhikṣa kara pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.010/1 śīta-vātātapa-prāvṛḍ- himair anyonyataḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: śīta vāta ātapa prāvṛṣ himaiḥ anyonyataḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.010/3 kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ vyādhibhiś caiva santapsyante ca cintayā
analyzed: kṣut tṛḍbhyām vyādhibhiḥ ca eva santapsyante ca cintayā

original: BhP_12.02.011/1 triṃśad viṃśati varṣāṇi
analyzed: triṃśat viṃśati varṣāṇi

original: BhP_12.02.011/2 paramāyuḥ kalau nṛṇām
analyzed: parama āyuḥ kalau nṛṇām

original: BhP_12.02.012/1 kṣīyamāṇeṣu deheṣu dehināṃ kali-doṣataḥ
analyzed: kṣīyamāṇeṣu deheṣu dehinām kali doṣataḥ

original: BhP_12.02.012/3 varṇāśramavatāṃ dharme naṣṭe veda-pathe nṛṇām
analyzed: varṇa āśramavatām dharme naṣṭe vedapathe nṛṇām

original: BhP_12.02.013/1 pāṣaṇḍa-pracure dharme dasyu-prāyeṣu rājasu
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa pracure dharme dasyu prāyeṣu rājasu

original: BhP_12.02.013/3 cauryānṛta-vṛthā-hiṃsā- nānā-vṛttiṣu vai nṛṣu
analyzed: caurya anṛta vṛthāhiṃsāḥ nānā vṛttiṣu vai nṛṣu

original: BhP_12.02.014/1 śūdra-prāyeṣu varṇeṣu cchāga-prāyāsu dhenuṣu
analyzed: śūdra prāyeṣu varṇeṣu chāga prāyāsu dhenuṣu

original: BhP_12.02.014/3 gṛha-prāyeṣv āśrameṣu yauna-prāyeṣu bandhuṣu
analyzed: gṛha prāyeṣu āśrameṣu yauna prāyeṣu bandhuṣu

original: BhP_12.02.015/1 aṇu-prāyāsv oṣadhīṣu śamī-prāyeṣu sthāsnuṣu
analyzed: aṇu prāyāsu oṣadhīṣu śamī prāyeṣu sthāsnuṣu

original: BhP_12.02.015/3 vidyut-prāyeṣu megheṣu śūnya-prāyeṣu sadmasu
analyzed: vidyut prāyeṣu megheṣu śūnya prāyeṣu sadmasu

original: BhP_12.02.016/1 itthaṃ kalau gata-prāye janeṣu khara-dharmiṣu
analyzed: ittham kalau gata prāye janeṣu khara dharmiṣu

original: BhP_12.02.016/3 dharma-trāṇāya sattvena bhagavān avatariṣyati
analyzed: dharma trāṇāya sattvena bhagavān avatariṣyati

original: BhP_12.02.017/1 carācara-guror viṣṇor īśvarasyākhilātmanaḥ
analyzed: carācara guroḥ viṣṇoḥ īśvarasya akhilātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.017/3 dharma-trāṇāya sādhūnāṃ janma karmāpanuttaye
analyzed: dharma trāṇāya sādhūnām janma karma apanuttaye

original: BhP_12.02.018/1 śambhala-grāma-mukhyasya brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: śambhala grāma mukhyasya brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.018/3 bhavane viṣṇuyaśasaḥ kalkiḥ prādurbhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhavane viṣṇuyaśasaḥ kalkiḥ prādurbhaviṣyati

original: BhP_12.02.019/1 aśvam āśu-gam āruhya devadattaṃ jagat-patiḥ
analyzed: aśvam āśu gam āruhya devadattam jagatpatiḥ

original: BhP_12.02.019/3 asināsādhu-damanam aṣṭaiśvarya-guṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: asinā asādhu damanam aṣṭa aiśvarya guṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.020/1 vicarann āśunā kṣauṇyāṃ hayenāpratima-dyutiḥ
analyzed: vicaran āśunā kṣauṇyām hayena apratima dyutiḥ

original: BhP_12.02.020/3 nṛpa-liṅga-cchado dasyūn koṭiśo nihaniṣyati
analyzed: nṛpa liṅga chadaḥ dasyūn koṭiśas nihaniṣyati

original: BhP_12.02.021/1 atha teṣāṃ bhaviṣyanti manāṃsi viśadāni vai
analyzed: atha teṣām bhaviṣyanti manāṃsi viśadāni vai

original: BhP_12.02.021/3 vāsudevāṅga-rāgāti- puṇya-gandhānila-spṛśām
analyzed: vāsudeva aṅgarāgā ati puṇya gandhā anila spṛśām

original: BhP_12.02.021/5 paura-jānapadānāṃ vai hateṣv akhila-dasyuṣu
analyzed: paura jānapadānām vai hateṣu akhila dasyuṣu

original: BhP_12.02.022/1 teṣāṃ prajā-visargaś ca sthaviṣṭhaḥ sambhaviṣyati
analyzed: teṣām prajā visargaḥ ca sthaviṣṭhaḥ sambhaviṣyati

original: BhP_12.02.022/3 vāsudeve bhagavati sattva-mūrtau hṛdi sthite
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati sattva mūrtau hṛdi sthite

original: BhP_12.02.023/1 yadāvatīrṇo bhagavān kalkir dharma-patir hariḥ
analyzed: yadā avatīrṇaḥ bhagavān kalkiḥ dharmapatiḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_12.02.023/3 kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tadā prajā-sūtiś ca sāttvikī
analyzed: kṛtam bhaviṣyati tadā prajā sūtiḥ ca sāttvikī

original: BhP_12.02.024/1 yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca tathā tiṣya-bṛhaspatī
analyzed: yadā candraḥ ca sūryaḥ ca tathā tiṣya bṛhaspatī

original: BhP_12.02.024/3 eka-rāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam
analyzed: eka rāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam

original: BhP_12.02.025/1 ye 'tītā vartamānā ye bhaviṣyanti ca pārthivāḥ
analyzed: ye tītāḥ vartamānāḥ ye bhaviṣyanti ca pārthivāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.025/3 te ta uddeśataḥ proktā vaṃśīyāḥ soma-sūryayoḥ
analyzed: te te uddeśataḥ proktāḥ vaṃśīyāḥ soma sūryayoḥ

original: BhP_12.02.026/1 ārabhya bhavato janma yāvan nandābhiṣecanam
analyzed: ārabhya bhavataḥ janma yāvat nanda abhiṣecanam

original: BhP_12.02.026/3 etad varṣa-sahasraṃ tu śataṃ pañcadaśottaram
analyzed: etat varṣa sahasram tu śatam pañcadaśa uttaram

original: BhP_12.02.027/1 saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi
analyzed: saptarṣīṇām tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi

original: BhP_12.02.027/3 tayos tu madhye nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yat samaṃ niśi
analyzed: tayoḥ tu madhye nakṣatram dṛśyate yat samam niśi

original: BhP_12.02.028/1 tenaiva ṛṣayo yuktās tiṣṭhanty abda-śataṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: tena eva ṛṣayaḥ yuktāḥ tiṣṭhanti abda śatam nṛṇām

original: BhP_12.02.028/3 te tvadīye dvijāḥ kāla adhunā cāśritā maghāḥ
analyzed: te tvadīye dvijāḥ kāla adhunā ca āśritāḥ maghāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.029/1 viṣṇor bhagavato bhānuḥ kṛṣṇākhyo 'sau divaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ bhagavataḥ bhānuḥ sau divam gataḥ

original: BhP_12.02.029/3 tadāviśat kalir lokaṃ pāpe yad ramate janaḥ
analyzed: tadā aviśat kaliḥ lokam pāpe yat ramate janaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.030/1 yāvat sa pāda-padmābhyāṃ spṛśan āste ramā-patiḥ
analyzed: yāvat sa pāda padmābhyām spṛśan āste ramāpatiḥ

original: BhP_12.02.030/3 tāvat kalir vai pṛthivīṃ parākrantuṃ na cāśakat
analyzed: tāvat kaliḥ vai pṛthivīm parākrantum na ca aśakat

original: BhP_12.02.031/1 yadā devarṣayaḥ sapta maghāsu vicaranti hi
analyzed: yadā devarṣayaḥ sapta maghāsu vicaranti hi

original: BhP_12.02.031/3 tadā pravṛttas tu kalir dvādaśābda-śatātmakaḥ
analyzed: tadā pravṛttaḥ tu kaliḥ dvādaśa abda śata ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.032/1 yadā maghābhyo yāsyanti pūrvāṣāḍhāṃ maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: yadā maghābhyaḥ yāsyanti pūrvāṣāḍhām mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.032/3 tadā nandāt prabhṛty eṣa kalir vṛddhiṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: tadā nandāt prabhṛti eṣa kaliḥ vṛddhim gamiṣyati

original: BhP_12.02.033/1 yasmin kṛṣṇo divaṃ yātas tasminn eva tadāhani
analyzed: yasmin kṛṣṇaḥ divam yātaḥ tasmin eva tadā ahani

original: BhP_12.02.033/3 pratipannaṃ kali-yugam iti prāhuḥ purā-vidaḥ
analyzed: pratipannam kali yugam iti prāhuḥ

original: BhP_12.02.034/1 divyābdānāṃ sahasrānte caturthe tu punaḥ kṛtam
analyzed: divya abdānām sahasra ante caturthe tu punar kṛtam

original: BhP_12.02.034/3 bhaviṣyati tadā nṝṇāṃ mana ātma-prakāśakam
analyzed: bhaviṣyati tadā nṝṇām manaḥ ātma prakāśakam

original: BhP_12.02.035/1 ity eṣa mānavo vaṃśo yathā saṅkhyāyate bhuvi
analyzed: iti eṣa mānavaḥ vaṃśaḥ yathā saṅkhyāyate bhuvi

original: BhP_12.02.035/3 tathā viṭ-śūdra-viprāṇāṃ tās tā jñeyā yuge yuge
analyzed: tathā viś śūdra viprāṇām tāḥ tāḥ jñeyāḥ yuge yuge

original: BhP_12.02.036/1 eteṣāṃ nāma-liṅgānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: eteṣām nāma liṅgānām puruṣāṇām mahātmanām

original: BhP_12.02.036/3 kathā-mātrāvaśiṣṭānāṃ kīrtir eva sthitā bhuvi
analyzed: kathā mātra avaśiṣṭānām kīrtiḥ eva sthitā bhuvi

original: BhP_12.02.037/1 devāpiḥ śāntanor bhrātā maruś cekṣvāku-vaṃśa-jaḥ
analyzed: devāpiḥ śāntanoḥ bhrātā maruḥ ca ikṣvāku vaṃśa jaḥ

original: BhP_12.02.037/3 kalāpa-grāma āsāte mahā-yoga-balānvitau
analyzed: kalāpa grāme āsāte mahā yoga bala anvitau

original: BhP_12.02.038/1 tāv ihaitya kaler ante vāsudevānuśikṣitau
analyzed: tau iha etya kaleḥ ante vāsudeva anuśikṣitau

original: BhP_12.02.038/3 varṇāśrama-yutaṃ dharmaṃ pūrva-vat prathayiṣyataḥ
analyzed: varṇa āśrama yutam dharmam pūrvavat prathayiṣyataḥ

original: BhP_12.02.039/1 kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti catur-yugam
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ ca iti caturyugam

original: BhP_12.02.039/3 anena krama-yogena bhuvi prāṇiṣu vartate
analyzed: anena krama yogena bhuvi prāṇiṣu vartate

original: BhP_12.02.040/1 rājann ete mayā proktā nara-devās tathāpare
analyzed: rājan ete mayā proktāḥ naradevāḥ tathā apare

original: BhP_12.02.040/3 bhūmau mamatvaṃ kṛtvānte hitvemāṃ nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: bhūmau mamatvam kṛtvā ante hitvā imām nidhanam gatāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.041/1 kṛmi-viḍ-bhasma-saṃjñānte rāja-nāmno 'pi yasya ca
analyzed: kṛmi viṣ bhasma saṃjñā ante rājanāmnaḥ pi yasya ca

original: BhP_12.02.041/3 bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte svārthaṃ kiṃ veda nirayo yataḥ
analyzed: tad kṛte sva artham kim veda nirayaḥ yatas

original: BhP_12.02.042/1 kathaṃ seyam akhaṇḍā bhūḥ pūrvair me puruṣair dhṛtā
analyzed: katham sā iyam akhaṇḍā bhūḥ pūrvaiḥ me puruṣaiḥ dhṛtā

original: BhP_12.02.042/3 mat-putrasya ca pautrasya mat-pūrvā vaṃśa-jasya vā
analyzed: mad putrasya ca pautrasya mad pūrvā vaṃśa jasya vā

original: BhP_12.02.043/1 tejo-'b-anna-mayaṃ kāyaṃ gṛhītvātmatayābudhāḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ banna mayam kāyam gṛhītvā ātma tayā abudhāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.043/3 mahīṃ mamatayā cobhau hitvānte 'darśanaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: mahīm mamatayā ca ubhau hitvā ante darśanam gatāḥ

original: BhP_12.02.044/1 ye ye bhū-patayo rājan bhuñjate bhuvam ojasā
analyzed: ye ye bhūpatayaḥ rājan bhuñjate bhuvam ojasā

original: BhP_12.02.044/3 kālena te kṛtāḥ sarve kathā-mātrāḥ kathāsu ca
analyzed: kālena te kṛtāḥ sarve kathāmātrāḥ kathāsu ca

original: BhP_12.03.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.03.001/1 dṛṣṭvātmani jaye vyagrān nṛpān hasati bhūr iyam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ātmani jaye vyagrān nṛpān hasati bhūḥ iyam

original: BhP_12.03.001/3 aho mā vijigīṣanti mṛtyoḥ krīḍanakā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: aho mā vijigīṣanti mṛtyoḥ krīḍanakāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.002/1 kāma eṣa narendrāṇāṃ moghaḥ syād viduṣām api
analyzed: kāmaḥ eṣa narendrāṇām moghaḥ syāt viduṣām api

original: BhP_12.03.002/3 yena phenopame piṇḍe ye 'ti-viśrambhitā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: yena phena upame piṇḍe ye nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.003/1 pūrvaṃ nirjitya ṣaḍ-vargaṃ jeṣyāmo rāja-mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam nirjitya ṣaḍvargam jeṣyāmaḥ rāja mantriṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.003/3 tataḥ saciva-paurāpta- karīndrān asya kaṇṭakān
analyzed: tatas kari indrān asya kaṇṭakān

original: BhP_12.03.004/1 evaṃ krameṇa jeṣyāmaḥ pṛthvīṃ sāgara-mekhalām
analyzed: evam krameṇa jeṣyāmaḥ pṛthvīm sāgara mekhalām

original: BhP_12.03.004/3 ity āśā-baddha-hṛdayā na paśyanty antike 'ntakam
analyzed: iti āśā baddha hṛdayāḥ na paśyanti antike ntakam

original: BhP_12.03.005/1 samudrāvaraṇāṃ jitvā māṃ viśanty abdhim ojasā
analyzed: samudra āvaraṇām jitvā mām viśanti abdhim ojasā

original: BhP_12.03.005/3 kiyad ātma-jayasyaitan muktir ātma-jaye phalam
analyzed: kiyat ātma jayasya etat muktiḥ ātma jaye phalam

original: BhP_12.03.006/1 yāṃ visṛjyaiva manavas tat-sutāś ca kurūdvaha
analyzed: yām visṛjya eva manavaḥ tad sutāḥ ca kuru udvaha

original: BhP_12.03.006/3 gatā yathāgataṃ yuddhe tāṃ māṃ jeṣyanty abuddhayaḥ
analyzed: gatāḥ yathāgatam yuddhe tām mām jeṣyanti abuddhayaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.007/1 mat-kṛte pitṛ-putrāṇāṃ bhrātṛṇāṃ cāpi vigrahaḥ
analyzed: mad kṛte pitṛ putrāṇām bhrātṛṇām ca api vigrahaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.007/3 jāyate hy asatāṃ rājye mamatā-baddha-cetasām
analyzed: jāyate hi asatām rājye mamatā baddha cetasām

original: BhP_12.03.008/1 mamaiveyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā na te mūḍheti vādinaḥ
analyzed: mama eva iyam mahī kṛtsnā na te mūḍhā iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.008/3 spardhamānā mitho ghnanti mriyante mat-kṛte nṛpāḥ
analyzed: spardhamānāḥ mithas ghnanti mriyante mad kṛte nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.009/1 pṛthuḥ purūravā gādhir nahuṣo bharato 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: pṛthuḥ purūravāḥ gādhiḥ nahuṣaḥ bharataḥ rjunaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.009/3 māndhātā sagaro rāmaḥ khaṭvāṅgo dhundhuhā raghuḥ
analyzed: māndhātā sagaraḥ rāmaḥ khaṭvāṅgaḥ dhundhuhā raghuḥ

original: BhP_12.03.010/1 tṛṇabindur yayātiś ca śaryātiḥ śantanur gayaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇabinduḥ yayātiḥ ca śaryātiḥ śantanuḥ gayaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.010/3 bhagīrathaḥ kuvalayāśvaḥ kakutstho naiṣadho nṛgaḥ
BhP_12.03.011/1 hiraṇyakaśipur vṛtro rāvaṇo loka-rāvaṇaḥ
BhP_12.03.011/3 namuciḥ śambaro bhaumo hiraṇyākṣo 'tha tārakaḥ
analyzed: namuciḥ śambaraḥ bhaumaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ tha tārakaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.012/1 anye ca bahavo daityā rājāno ye maheśvarāḥ
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ daityāḥ rājānaḥ ye maheśvarāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.012/3 sarve sarva-vidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve sarva-jito 'jitāḥ
analyzed: sarve sarva vidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve sarva jitaḥ jitāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.013/1 mamatāṃ mayy avartanta kṛtvoccair martya-dharmiṇaḥ
analyzed: mamatām mayi avartanta kṛtvā uccais martya dharmiṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.013/3 kathāvaśeṣāḥ kālena hy akṛtārthāḥ kṛtā vibho
analyzed: kathā avaśeṣāḥ kālena hi akṛtārthāḥ kṛtāḥ vibho

original: BhP_12.03.014/1 kathā imās te kathitā mahīyasāṃ vitāya lokeṣu yaśaḥ pareyuṣām
analyzed: kathāḥ imāḥ te kathitāḥ mahīyasām vitāya lokeṣu yaśaḥ pareyuṣām

original: BhP_12.03.014/3 vijñāna-vairāgya-vivakṣayā vibho vaco-vibhūtīr na tu pāramārthyam
analyzed: vijñāna vairāgya vivakṣayā vibho vacaḥ vibhūtīḥ na tu pāramārthyam

original: BhP_12.03.015/1 yas tūttamaḥ-śloka-guṇānuvādaḥ saṅgīyate 'bhīkṣṇam amaṅgala-ghnaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu uttamaḥśloka guṇa anuvādaḥ saṅgīyate bhīkṣṇam amaṅgala ghnaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.015/3 tam eva nityaṃ śṛṇuyād abhīkṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇe 'malāṃ bhaktim abhīpsamānaḥ
analyzed: tam eva nityam śṛṇuyāt abhīkṣṇam kṛṣṇe malām bhaktim abhīpsamānaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.016/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_12.03.016/1 kenopāyena bhagavan kaler doṣān kalau janāḥ
analyzed: kena upāyena bhagavan kaleḥ doṣān kalau janāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.016/3 vidhamiṣyanty upacitāṃs tan me brūhi yathā mune
analyzed: vidhamiṣyanti upacitān tat me brūhi yathā mune

original: BhP_12.03.017/1 yugāni yuga-dharmāṃś ca mānaṃ pralaya-kalpayoḥ
analyzed: yugāni yuga dharmān ca mānam pralaya kalpayoḥ

original: BhP_12.03.017/3 kālasyeśvara-rūpasya gatiṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kālasya īśvara rūpasya gatim viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.018/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.03.018/1 kṛte pravartate dharmaś catuṣ-pāt taj-janair dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: kṛte pravartate dharmaḥ catuṣpād tad janaiḥ dhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.018/3 satyaṃ dayā tapo dānam iti pādā vibhor nṛpa
analyzed: satyam dayā tapaḥ dānam iti pādāḥ vibhoḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_12.03.019/1 santuṣṭāḥ karuṇā maitrāḥ śāntā dāntās titikṣavaḥ
analyzed: santuṣṭāḥ karuṇāḥ maitrāḥ śāntāḥ dāntāḥ titikṣavaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.019/3 ātmārāmāḥ sama-dṛśaḥ prāyaśaḥ śramaṇā janāḥ
analyzed: ātma ārāmāḥ samadṛśaḥ prāyaśas śramaṇāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.020/1 tretāyāṃ dharma-pādānāṃ turyāṃśo hīyate śanaiḥ
analyzed: tretāyām dharma pādānām turya aṃśaḥ hīyate śanais

original: BhP_12.03.020/3 adharma-pādair anṛta- hiṃṣāsantoṣa-vigrahaiḥ
analyzed: a dharma pādaiḥ anṛta hiṃṣā santoṣa vigrahaiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.021/1 tadā kriyā-tapo-niṣṭhā nāti-hiṃsrā na lampaṭāḥ
analyzed: tadā kriyā tapaḥ niṣṭhāḥ na ati hiṃsrāḥ na lampaṭāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.021/3 trai-vargikās trayī-vṛddhā varṇā brahmottarā nṛpa
analyzed: traivargikāḥ trayī vṛddhāḥ varṇāḥ brahma uttarāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_12.03.022/1 tapaḥ-satya-dayā-dāneṣv ardhaṃ hrasvati dvāpare
analyzed: tapaḥ satya dayā dāneṣu ardham hrasvati dvāpare

original: BhP_12.03.022/3 hiṃsātuṣṭy-anṛta-dveṣair dharmasyādharma-lakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: hiṃsā tuṣṭi anṛta dveṣaiḥ dharmasya adharma lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.023/1 yaśasvino mahā-śīlāḥ svādhyāyādhyayane ratāḥ
analyzed: yaśasvinaḥ mahā śīlāḥ svādhyāya adhyayane ratāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.023/3 ādhyāḥ kuṭumbino hṛṣṭā varṇāḥ kṣatra-dvijottarāḥ
analyzed: ādhyāḥ kuṭumbinaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ varṇāḥ kṣatra dvijottarāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.024/1 kalau tu dharma-pādānāṃ turyāṃśo 'dharma-hetubhiḥ
analyzed: kalau tu dharma pādānām turya aṃśaḥ dharma hetubhiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.024/3 edhamānaiḥ kṣīyamāṇo hy ante so 'pi vinaṅkṣyati
analyzed: edhamānaiḥ kṣīyamāṇaḥ hi ante saḥ pi vinaṅkṣyati

original: BhP_12.03.025/1 tasmin lubdhā durācārā nirdayāḥ śuṣka-vairiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmin lubdhāḥ durācārāḥ nirdayāḥ śuṣka vairiṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.025/3 durbhagā bhūri-tarṣāś ca śūdra-dāsottarāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: durbhagāḥ bhūri tarṣāḥ ca śūdra dāsa uttarāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.026/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.026/3 kāla-sañcoditās te vai parivartanta ātmani
analyzed: kāla sañcoditāḥ te vai parivartante ātmani

original: BhP_12.03.027/1 prabhavanti yadā sattve mano-buddhīndriyāṇi ca
analyzed: prabhavanti yadā sattve manaḥ buddhi indriyāṇi ca

original: BhP_12.03.027/3 tadā kṛta-yugaṃ vidyāj jñāne tapasi yad ruciḥ
analyzed: tadā kṛta yugam vidyāt jñāne tapasi yat ruciḥ

original: BhP_12.03.028/1 yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu bhaktir yaśasi dehinām
analyzed: yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu bhaktiḥ yaśasi dehinām

original: BhP_12.03.028/3 tadā tretā rajo-vṛttir iti jānīhi buddhiman
analyzed: tadā tretā rajaḥ vṛttiḥ iti jānīhi buddhiman

original: BhP_12.03.029/1 yadā lobhas tv asantoṣo māno dambho 'tha matsaraḥ
analyzed: yadā lobhaḥ tu asantoṣaḥ mānaḥ matsaraḥ

original: BhP_12.03.029/3 karmaṇāṃ cāpi kāmyānāṃ dvāparaṃ tad rajas-tamaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇām ca api kāmyānām dvāparam tat rajaḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.030/1 yadā māyānṛtaṃ tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣādanam
analyzed: yadā māyā anṛtam tandrā nidrā hiṃsā viṣādanam

original: BhP_12.03.030/3 śoka-mohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: śoka mohau bhayam dainyam sa kaliḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.031/1 tasmāt kṣudra-dṛśo martyāḥ kṣudra-bhāgyā mahāśanāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt kṣudra dṛśaḥ martyāḥ kṣudra bhāgyāḥ mahā aśanāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.031/3 kāmino vitta-hīnāś ca svairiṇyaś ca striyo 'satīḥ
analyzed: kāminaḥ vitta hīnāḥ ca svairiṇyaḥ ca striyaḥ satīḥ

original: BhP_12.03.032/1 dasyūtkṛṣṭā janapadā vedāḥ pāṣaṇḍa-dūṣitāḥ
analyzed: dasyu utkṛṣṭāḥ janapadāḥ vedāḥ pāṣaṇḍa dūṣitāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.032/3 rājānaś ca prajā-bhakṣāḥ śiśnodara-parā dvijāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca prajā bhakṣāḥ śiśna udara parāḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.033/1 avratā baṭavo 'śaucā bhikṣavaś ca kuṭumbinaḥ
analyzed: avratāḥ śaucāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca kuṭumbinaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.033/3 tapasvino grāma-vāsā nyāsino 'tyartha-lolupāḥ
analyzed: tapasvinaḥ grāma vāsāḥ tyartha lolupāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.034/1 hrasva-kāyā mahāhārā bhūry-apatyā gata-hriyaḥ
analyzed: hrasva kāyāḥ mahā āhārāḥ bhūri apatyāḥ gata hriyaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.034/3 śaśvat kaṭuka-bhāṣiṇyaś caurya-māyoru-sāhasāḥ
analyzed: śaśvat kaṭuka bhāṣiṇyaḥ caurya māyā uru sāhasāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.035/1 paṇayiṣyanti vai kṣudrāḥ kirāṭāḥ kūṭa-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: paṇayiṣyanti vai kṣudrāḥ kirāṭāḥ kūṭa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.035/3 anāpady api maṃsyante vārtāṃ sādhu jugupsitām
analyzed: anāpadi api maṃsyante vārtām sādhu jugupsitām

original: BhP_12.03.036/1 patiṃ tyakṣyanti nirdravyaṃ bhṛtyā apy akhilottamam
analyzed: patim tyakṣyanti nirdravyam bhṛtyāḥ api akhila uttamam

original: BhP_12.03.036/3 bhṛtyaṃ vipannaṃ patayaḥ kaulaṃ gāś cāpayasvinīḥ
analyzed: bhṛtyam vipannam patayaḥ kaulam gāḥ ca a payasvinīḥ

original: BhP_12.03.037/1 pitṛ-bhrātṛ-suhṛj-jñātīn hitvā saurata-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: pitṛ bhrātṛ suhṛd jñātīn hitvā saurata sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.037/3 nanāndṛ-śyāla-saṃvādā dīnāḥ straiṇāḥ kalau narāḥ
analyzed: dīnāḥ straiṇāḥ kalau narāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.038/1 śūdrāḥ pratigrahīṣyanti tapo-veṣopajīvinaḥ
analyzed: śūdrāḥ pratigrahīṣyanti tapaḥ veṣa upajīvinaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.038/3 dharmaṃ vakṣyanty adharma-jñā adhiruhyottamāsanam
analyzed: dharmam vakṣyanti a dharma jñāḥ adhiruhya uttama āsanam

original: BhP_12.03.039/1 nityaṃ udvigna-manaso durbhikṣa-kara-karśitāḥ
analyzed: nityam udvigna manasaḥ durbhikṣa kara karśitāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.039/3 niranne bhū-tale rājan anāvṛṣṭi-bhayāturāḥ
analyzed: niranne bhū tale rājan anāvṛṣṭi bhaya āturāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.040/1 vāso-'nna-pāna-śayana- vyavāya-snāna-bhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: vāsa unna pāna śayana vyavāya snāna bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.040/3 hīnāḥ piśāca-sandarśā bhaviṣyanti kalau prajāḥ
analyzed: hīnāḥ piśāca sandarśāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau prajāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.041/1 kalau kākiṇike 'py arthe vigṛhya tyakta-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: kalau kākiṇike pi arthe vigṛhya tyakta sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.041/3 tyakṣyanti ca priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svakān api
analyzed: tyakṣyanti ca priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svakān api

original: BhP_12.03.042/1 na rakṣiṣyanti manujāḥ sthavirau pitarāv api
analyzed: na rakṣiṣyanti manujāḥ sthavirau pitarau api

original: BhP_12.03.042/3 putrān bhāryāṃ ca kula-jāṃ kṣudrāḥ śiśnodaraṃ-bharāḥ
analyzed: putrān bhāryām ca kula jām kṣudrāḥ śiśna udaraṃbharāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.043/1 kalau na rājan jagatāṃ paraṃ guruṃ tri-loka-nāthānata-pāda-paṅkajam
analyzed: kalau na rājan jagatām param gurum triloka nātha ānata pāda paṅkajam

original: BhP_12.03.043/3 prāyeṇa martyā bhagavantam acyutaṃ yakṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa-vibhinna-cetasaḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa martyāḥ bhagavantam acyutam yakṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa vibhinna cetasaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.044/1 yan-nāmadheyaṃ mriyamāṇa āturaḥ patan skhalan vā vivaśo gṛṇan pumān
analyzed: yad nāmadheyam mriyamāṇaḥ āturaḥ patan skhalan vā vivaśaḥ gṛṇan pumān

original: BhP_12.03.044/3 vimukta-karmārgala uttamāṃ gatiṃ prāpnoti yakṣyanti na taṃ kalau janāḥ
analyzed: vimukta karma argalaḥ uttamām gatim prāpnoti yakṣyanti na tam kalau janāḥ

original: BhP_12.03.045/1 puṃsāṃ kali-kṛtān doṣān dravya-deśātma-sambhavān
analyzed: puṃsām kali kṛtān doṣān dravya deśa ātma sambhavān

original: BhP_12.03.045/3 sarvān harati citta-stho bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: sarvān harati citta sthaḥ bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.046/1 śrutaḥ saṅkīrtito dhyātaḥ pūjitaś cādṛto 'pi vā
analyzed: śrutaḥ saṅkīrtitaḥ dhyātaḥ pūjitaḥ vā

original: BhP_12.03.046/3 nṛṇāṃ dhunoti bhagavān hṛt-stho janmāyutāśubham
analyzed: nṛṇām dhunoti bhagavān hṛd sthaḥ janma ayuta aśubham

original: BhP_12.03.047/1 yathā hemni sthito vahnir durvarṇaṃ hanti dhātu-jam
analyzed: yathā hemni sthitaḥ vahniḥ durvarṇam hanti dhātu jam

original: BhP_12.03.047/3 evam ātma-gato viṣṇur yoginām aśubhāśayam
analyzed: evam ātma gataḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām aśubha āśayam

original: BhP_12.03.048/1 vidyā-tapaḥ-prāṇa-nirodha-maitrī- tīrthābhiṣeka-vrata-dāna-japyaiḥ
analyzed: vidyā tapaḥ prāṇa nirodha maitrī tīrtha abhiṣeka vrata dāna japyaiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.048/3 nātyanta-śuddhiṃ labhate 'ntarātmā yathā hṛdi-sthe bhagavaty anante
analyzed: na atyanta śuddhim labhate ntarātmā yathā hṛdisthe bhagavati anante

original: BhP_12.03.049/1 tasmāt sarvātmanā rājan hṛdi-sthaṃ kuru keśavam
analyzed: tasmāt sarva ātmanā rājan hṛdistham kuru keśavam

original: BhP_12.03.049/3 mriyamāṇo hy avahitas tato yāsi parāṃ gatim
analyzed: mriyamāṇaḥ hi avahitaḥ tatas yāsi parām gatim

original: BhP_12.03.050/1 mriyamāṇair abhidhyeyo bhagavān parameśvaraḥ
analyzed: mriyamāṇaiḥ abhidhyeyaḥ bhagavān parameśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.03.050/3 ātma-bhāvaṃ nayaty aṅga sarvātmā sarva-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: ātma bhāvam nayati aṅga sarva ātmā sarva saṃśrayaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.051/1 kaler doṣa-nidhe rājann asti hy eko mahān guṇaḥ
analyzed: kaleḥ doṣa nidhe rājan asti hi ekaḥ mahān guṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.03.051/3 kīrtanād eva kṛṣṇasya mukta-saṅgaḥ paraṃ vrajet
analyzed: kīrtanāt eva kṛṣṇasya mukta saṅgaḥ param vrajet

original: BhP_12.03.052/1 kṛte yad dhyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ yajato makhaiḥ
analyzed: kṛte yat dhyāyataḥ viṣṇum tretāyām yajataḥ makhaiḥ

original: BhP_12.03.052/3 dvāpare paricaryāyāṃ kalau tad dhari-kīrtanāt
analyzed: dvāpare paricaryāyām kalau tat hari kīrtanāt

original: BhP_12.04.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.04.001/1 kālas te paramāṇv-ādir dvi-parārdhāvadhir nṛpa
analyzed: kālaḥ te paramāṇu ādiḥ dvi parārdha avadhiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_12.04.001/3 kathito yuga-mānaṃ ca śṛṇu kalpa-layāv api
analyzed: kathitaḥ yuga mānam ca śṛṇu kalpa layau api

original: BhP_12.04.002/1 catur-yuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate
analyzed: catur yuga sahasram tu brahmaṇaḥ dinam ucyate

original: BhP_12.04.002/3 sa kalpo yatra manavaś caturdaśa viśām-pate
analyzed: sa kalpaḥ yatra manavaḥ caturdaśa viśām pate

original: BhP_12.04.003/1 tad-ante pralayas tāvān brāhmī rātrir udāhṛtā
analyzed: tad ante pralayaḥ tāvān brāhmī rātriḥ udāhṛtā

original: BhP_12.04.003/3 trayo lokā ime tatra kalpante pralayāya hi
analyzed: trayaḥ lokāḥ ime tatra kalpante pralayāya hi

original: BhP_12.04.004/1 eṣa naimittikaḥ proktaḥ pralayo yatra viśva-sṛk
analyzed: eṣa naimittikaḥ proktaḥ pralayaḥ yatra viśvasṛj

original: BhP_12.04.004/3 śete 'nantāsano viśvam ātmasāt-kṛtya cātma-bhūḥ
analyzed: śete nanta āsanaḥ viśvam ātmasāt kṛtya ca ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_12.04.005/1 dvi-parārdhe tv atikrānte brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: dvi parārdhe tu atikrānte brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.005/3 tadā prakṛtayaḥ sapta kalpante pralayāya vai
analyzed: tadā prakṛtayaḥ sapta kalpante pralayāya vai

original: BhP_12.04.006/1 eṣa prākṛtiko rājan pralayo yatra līyate
analyzed: eṣa prākṛtikaḥ rājan pralayaḥ yatra līyate

original: BhP_12.04.006/3 aṇḍa-koṣas tu saṅghāto vighāṭa upasādite
analyzed: aṇḍakoṣaḥ tu saṅghātaḥ vighāṭaḥ upasādite

original: BhP_12.04.007/1 parjanyaḥ śata-varṣāṇi bhūmau rājan na varṣati
analyzed: parjanyaḥ śata varṣāṇi bhūmau rājan na varṣati

original: BhP_12.04.007/3 tadā niranne hy anyonyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ kṣudhārditāḥ
analyzed: tadā niranne hi anyonyam bhakṣyamāṇāḥ kṣudhā arditāḥ

original: BhP_12.04.007/5 kṣayaṃ yāsyanti śanakaiḥ kālenopadrutāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: kṣayam yāsyanti śanakais kālena upadrutāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_12.04.008/1 sāmudraṃ daihikaṃ bhaumaṃ rasaṃ sāṃvartako raviḥ
analyzed: sāmudram daihikam bhaumam rasam sāṃvartakaḥ raviḥ

original: BhP_12.04.008/3 raśmibhiḥ pibate ghoraiḥ sarvaṃ naiva vimuñcati
analyzed: raśmibhiḥ pibate ghoraiḥ sarvam na eva vimuñcati

original: BhP_12.04.009/1 tataḥ saṃvartako vahniḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-mukhotthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃvartakaḥ vahniḥ saṅkarṣaṇa mukha utthitaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.009/3 dahaty anila-vegotthaḥ śūnyān bhū-vivarān atha
analyzed: dahati anila vega utthaḥ śūnyān bhū vivarān atha

original: BhP_12.04.010/1 upary adhaḥ samantāc ca śikhābhir vahni-sūryayoḥ
analyzed: upari adhas samantāt ca śikhābhiḥ vahni sūryayoḥ

original: BhP_12.04.010/3 dahyamānaṃ vibhāty aṇḍaṃ dagdha-gomaya-piṇḍa-vat
analyzed: dahyamānam vibhāti aṇḍam dagdha gomaya piṇḍa vat

original: BhP_12.04.011/1 tataḥ pracaṇḍa-pavano varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam
analyzed: tatas pracaṇḍa pavanaḥ varṣāṇām adhikam śatam

original: BhP_12.04.011/3 paraḥ sāṃvartako vāti dhūmraṃ khaṃ rajasāvṛtam
analyzed: paraḥ sāṃvartakaḥ vāti dhūmram kham rajasā āvṛtam

original: BhP_12.04.012/1 tato megha-kulāny aṅga citra varṇāny anekaśaḥ
analyzed: tatas megha kulāni aṅga citra varṇāni anekaśas

original: BhP_12.04.012/3 śataṃ varṣāṇi varṣanti nadanti rabhasa-svanaiḥ
analyzed: śatam varṣāṇi varṣanti nadanti rabhasa svanaiḥ

original: BhP_12.04.013/1 tata ekodakaṃ viśvaṃ
analyzed: tatas ekodakam viśvam

original: BhP_12.04.013/2 brahmāṇḍa-vivarāntaram
BhP_12.04.014/1 tadā bhūmer gandha-guṇaṃ grasanty āpa uda-plave
analyzed: tadā bhūmeḥ gandha guṇam grasanti āpaḥ uda plave

original: BhP_12.04.014/3 grasta-gandhā tu pṛthivī pralayatvāya kalpate
analyzed: grasta gandhā tu pṛthivī pralaya tvāya kalpate

original: BhP_12.04.015/1 apāṃ rasam atho tejas tā līyante 'tha nīrasāḥ
analyzed: apām rasam atha u tejaḥ tāḥ līyante nīrasāḥ

original: BhP_12.04.015/3 grasate tejaso rūpaṃ vāyus tad-rahitaṃ tadā
analyzed: grasate tejasaḥ rūpam vāyuḥ tad rahitam tadā

original: BhP_12.04.016/1 līyate cānile tejo vāyoḥ khaṃ grasate guṇam
analyzed: līyate ca anile tejaḥ vāyoḥ kham grasate guṇam

original: BhP_12.04.016/3 sa vai viśati khaṃ rājaṃs tataś ca nabhaso guṇam
analyzed: sa vai viśati kham rājan tatas ca nabhasaḥ guṇam

original: BhP_12.04.017/1 śabdaṃ grasati bhūtādir nabhas tam anu līyate
analyzed: śabdam grasati bhūtādiḥ nabhaḥ tam anu līyate

original: BhP_12.04.017/3 taijasaś cendriyāṇy aṅga devān vaikāriko guṇaiḥ
analyzed: taijasaḥ ca indriyāṇi aṅga devān vaikārikaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_12.04.018/1 mahān grasaty ahaṅkāraṃ guṇāḥ sattvādayaś ca tam
analyzed: mahān grasati ahaṅkāram guṇāḥ sattva ādayaḥ ca tam

original: BhP_12.04.018/3 grasate 'vyākṛtaṃ rājan guṇān kālena coditam
analyzed: grasate vyākṛtam rājan guṇān kālena coditam

original: BhP_12.04.019/1 na tasya kālāvayavaiḥ pariṇāmādayo guṇāḥ
analyzed: na tasya kāla avayavaiḥ pariṇāma ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_12.04.019/3 anādy anantam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ kāraṇam avyayam
analyzed: anādi anantam avyaktam nityam kāraṇam avyayam

original: BhP_12.04.020/1 na yatra vāco na mano na sattvaṃ tamo rajo vā mahad-ādayo 'mī
analyzed: na yatra vācaḥ na manaḥ na sattvam tamaḥ rajaḥ vā mahat ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.020/3 na prāṇa-buddhīndriya-devatā vā na sanniveśaḥ khalu loka-kalpaḥ
analyzed: na prāṇa buddhīndriya devatāḥ vā na sanniveśaḥ khalu loka kalpaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.021/1 na svapna-jāgran na ca tat suṣuptaṃ na khaṃ jalaṃ bhūr anilo 'gnir arkaḥ
analyzed: na svapna jāgrat na ca tat suṣuptam na kham jalam bhūḥ anilaḥ gniḥ arkaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.021/3 saṃsupta-vac chūnya-vad apratarkyaṃ tan mūla-bhūtaṃ padam āmananti
analyzed: saṃsupta vat śūnya vat apratarkyam tat mūla bhūtam padam āmananti

original: BhP_12.04.022/1 layaḥ prākṛtiko hy eṣa puruṣāvyaktayor yadā
analyzed: layaḥ prākṛtikaḥ hi eṣa puruṣa avyaktayoḥ yadā

original: BhP_12.04.022/3 śaktayaḥ sampralīyante vivaśāḥ kāla-vidrutāḥ
analyzed: śaktayaḥ sampralīyante vivaśāḥ kāla vidrutāḥ

original: BhP_12.04.023/1 buddhīndriyārtha-rūpeṇa jñānaṃ bhāti tad-āśrayam
analyzed: buddhīndriya artha rūpeṇa jñānam bhāti tad āśrayam

original: BhP_12.04.023/3 dṛśyatvāvyatirekābhyām ādy-antavad avastu yat
analyzed: dṛśya tva avyatirekābhyām ādi anta vat avastu yat

original: BhP_12.04.024/1 dīpaś cakṣuś ca rūpaṃ ca jyotiṣo na pṛthag bhavet
analyzed: dīpaḥ cakṣuḥ ca rūpam ca jyotiṣaḥ na pṛthak bhavet

original: BhP_12.04.024/3 evaṃ dhīḥ khāni mātrāś ca na syur anyatamād ṛtāt
analyzed: evam dhīḥ khāni mātrāḥ ca na syuḥ anyatamāt ṛtāt

original: BhP_12.04.025/1 buddher jāgaraṇaṃ svapnaḥ suṣuptir iti cocyate
analyzed: buddheḥ jāgaraṇam svapnaḥ suṣuptiḥ iti ca ucyate

original: BhP_12.04.025/3 māyā-mātram idaṃ rājan nānātvaṃ pratyag-ātmani
analyzed: māyā mātram idam rājan nānātvam pratyagātmani

original: BhP_12.04.026/1 yathā jala-dharā vyomni bhavanti na bhavanti ca
analyzed: yathā jaladharāḥ vyomni bhavanti na bhavanti ca

original: BhP_12.04.026/3 brahmaṇīdaṃ tathā viśvam avayavy udayāpyayāt
analyzed: brahmaṇi idam tathā viśvam avayavi udaya apyayāt

original: BhP_12.04.027/1 satyaṃ hy avayavaḥ proktaḥ sarvāvayavinām iha
analyzed: satyam hi avayavaḥ proktaḥ sarva avayavinām iha

original: BhP_12.04.027/3 vinārthena pratīyeran paṭasyevāṅga tantavaḥ
analyzed: vinā arthena pratīyeran paṭasya iva aṅga tantavaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.028/1 yat sāmānya-viśeṣābhyām upalabhyeta sa bhramaḥ
analyzed: yat sāmānya viśeṣābhyām upalabhyeta sa bhramaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.028/3 anyonyāpāśrayāt sarvam ādy-antavad avastu yat
analyzed: anyonya apāśrayāt sarvam ādi antavat avastu yat

original: BhP_12.04.029/1 vikāraḥ khyāyamāno 'pi pratyag-ātmānam antarā
analyzed: vikāraḥ khyāyamānaḥ pi pratyagātmānam antarā

original: BhP_12.04.029/3 na nirūpyo 'sty aṇur api syāc cec cit-sama ātma-vat
analyzed: na nirūpyaḥ sti aṇuḥ api syāt ced cit samaḥ ātma vat

original: BhP_12.04.030/1 na hi satyasya nānātvam avidvān yadi manyate
analyzed: na hi satyasya nānātvam a vidvān yadi manyate

original: BhP_12.04.030/3 nānātvaṃ chidrayor yadvaj jyotiṣor vātayor iva
analyzed: nānātvam chidrayoḥ yadvat jyotiṣoḥ vātayoḥ iva

original: BhP_12.04.031/1 yathā hiraṇyaṃ bahudhā samīyate nṛbhiḥ kriyābhir vyavahāra-vartmasu
analyzed: yathā hiraṇyam bahudhā samīyate nṛbhiḥ kriyābhiḥ vyavahāra vartmasu

original: BhP_12.04.031/3 evaṃ vacobhir bhagavān adhokṣajo vyākhyāyate laukika-vaidikair janaiḥ
analyzed: evam vacobhiḥ bhagavān adhokṣajaḥ vyākhyāyate laukika vaidikaiḥ janaiḥ

original: BhP_12.04.032/1 yathā ghano 'rka-prabhavo 'rka-darśito
analyzed: yathā ghanaḥ rka prabhavaḥ rka darśitaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.032/2 hy arkāṃśa-bhūtasya ca cakṣuṣas tamaḥ
analyzed: hi arka aṃśa bhūtasya ca cakṣuṣaḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.032/3 evaṃ tv ahaṃ brahma-guṇas tad-īkṣito
analyzed: evam tu aham brahma guṇaḥ tad īkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.032/4 brahmāṃśakasyātmana ātma-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: brahma aṃśakasya ātmanaḥ ātma bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.033/1 ghano yadārka-prabhavo vidīryate cakṣuḥ svarūpaṃ ravim īkṣate tadā
analyzed: ghanaḥ yadā arka prabhavaḥ vidīryate cakṣuḥ sva rūpam ravim īkṣate tadā

original: BhP_12.04.033/3 yadā hy ahaṅkāra upādhir ātmano jijñāsayā naśyati tarhy anusmaret
analyzed: yadā hi ahaṅkāraḥ upādhiḥ ātmanaḥ jijñāsayā naśyati tarhi anusmaret

original: BhP_12.04.034/1 yadaivam etena viveka-hetinā māyā-mayāhaṅkaraṇātma-bandhanam
analyzed: yadā evam etena viveka hetinā māyā maya ahaṅkaraṇa ātma bandhanam

original: BhP_12.04.034/3 chittvācyutātmānubhavo 'vatiṣṭhate tam āhur ātyantikam aṅga samplavam
analyzed: chittvā acyuta ātma anubhavaḥ vatiṣṭhate tam āhuḥ ātyantikam aṅga samplavam

original: BhP_12.04.035/1 nityadā sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ parantapa
analyzed: nityadā sarva bhūtānām brahma ādīnām parantapa

original: BhP_12.04.035/3 utpatti-pralayāv eke sūkṣma-jñāḥ sampracakṣate
analyzed: utpatti pralayau eke sūkṣma jñāḥ sampracakṣate

original: BhP_12.04.036/1 kāla-sroto-javenāśu hriyamāṇasya nityadā
analyzed: kāla srotaḥ javena āśu hriyamāṇasya nityadā

original: BhP_12.04.036/3 pariṇāmināṃ avasthās tā janma-pralaya-hetavaḥ
analyzed: pariṇāminām avasthāḥ tāḥ janma pralaya hetavaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.037/1 anādy-antavatānena kāleneśvara-mūrtinā
analyzed: anādi antavatā anena kālena īśvara mūrtinā

original: BhP_12.04.037/3 avasthā naiva dṛśyante viyati jyotiṣāṃ iva
analyzed: avasthāḥ nā eva dṛśyante viyati jyotiṣām iva

original: BhP_12.04.038/1 nityo naimittikaś caiva tathā prākṛtiko layaḥ
analyzed: nityaḥ naimittikaḥ ca eva tathā prākṛtikaḥ layaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.038/3 ātyantikaś ca kathitaḥ kālasya gatir īdṛśī
analyzed: ātyantikaḥ ca kathitaḥ kālasya gatiḥ īdṛśī

original: BhP_12.04.039/1 etāḥ kuru-śreṣṭha jagad-vidhātur nārāyaṇasyākhila-sattva-dhāmnaḥ
analyzed: etāḥ kuruśreṣṭha jagat vidhātuḥ nārāyaṇasya akhila sattva dhāmnaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.039/3 līlā-kathās te kathitāḥ samāsataḥ kārtsnyena nājo 'py abhidhātum īśaḥ
analyzed: līlā kathāḥ te kathitāḥ samāsatas kārtsnyena na ajaḥ pi abhidhātum īśaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.040/1 saṃsāra-sindhum ati-dustaram uttitīrṣor
analyzed: saṃsāra sindhum ati dustaram uttitīrṣoḥ

original: BhP_12.04.040/2 nānyaḥ plavo bhagavataḥ puruṣottamasya
analyzed: na anyaḥ plavaḥ bhagavataḥ puruṣottamasya

original: BhP_12.04.040/3 līlā-kathā-rasa-niṣevaṇam antareṇa
analyzed: līlā kathā rasa niṣevaṇam antareṇa

original: BhP_12.04.040/4 puṃso bhaved vividha-duḥkha-davārditasya
analyzed: puṃsaḥ bhavet vividha duḥkha dava arditasya

original: BhP_12.04.041/1 purāṇa-saṃhitām etām ṛṣir nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: purāṇa saṃhitām etām ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.041/3 nāradāya purā prāha kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyanāya saḥ
analyzed: nāradāya purā prāha kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāya saḥ

original: BhP_12.04.042/1 sa vai mahyaṃ mahā-rāja bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa vai mahyam mahā rāja bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.04.042/3 imāṃ bhāgavatīṃ prītaḥ saṃhitāṃ veda-sammitām
analyzed: imām bhāgavatīm prītaḥ saṃhitām veda sammitām

original: BhP_12.04.043/1 imāṃ vakṣyaty asau sūta ṛṣibhyo naimiṣālaye
analyzed: imām vakṣyati asau sūtaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ naimiṣa ālaye

original: BhP_12.04.043/3 dīrgha-satre kuru-śreṣṭha sampṛṣṭaḥ śaunakādibhiḥ
analyzed: dīrgha satre kuruśreṣṭha sampṛṣṭaḥ śaunaka ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.05.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.05.001/1 atrānuvarṇyate 'bhīkṣṇaṃ viśvātmā bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: atra anuvarṇyate bhīkṣṇam viśvātmā bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_12.05.001/3 yasya prasāda-jo brahmā rudraḥ krodha-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: yasya prasāda jaḥ brahmā rudraḥ krodha samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.002/1 tvaṃ tu rājan mariṣyeti paśu-buddhim imāṃ jahi
analyzed: tvam tu rājan mariṣya iti paśu buddhim imām jahi

original: BhP_12.05.002/3 na jātaḥ prāg abhūto 'dya deha-vat tvaṃ na naṅkṣyasi
analyzed: na jātaḥ prāk a bhūtaḥ dya deha vat tvam na naṅkṣyasi

original: BhP_12.05.003/1 na bhaviṣyasi bhūtvā tvaṃ putra-pautrādi-rūpavān
analyzed: na bhaviṣyasi bhūtvā tvam putra pautra ādi rūpavān

original: BhP_12.05.003/3 bījāṅkura-vad dehāder vyatirikto yathānalaḥ
analyzed: bīja aṅkura vat deha ādeḥ vyatiriktaḥ yathā analaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.004/1 svapne yathā śiraś-chedaṃ pañcatvādy ātmanaḥ svayam
analyzed: svapne yathā śiraḥ chedam pañcatva ādi ātmanaḥ svayam

original: BhP_12.05.004/3 yasmāt paśyati dehasya tata ātmā hy ajo 'maraḥ
analyzed: yasmāt paśyati dehasya tatas ātmā hi ajaḥ maraḥ

original: BhP_12.05.005/1 ghaṭe bhinne ghaṭākāśa ākāśaḥ syād yathā purā
analyzed: ghaṭe bhinne ghaṭa ākāśe ākāśaḥ syāt yathā purā

original: BhP_12.05.005/3 evaṃ dehe mṛte jīvo brahma sampadyate punaḥ
analyzed: evam dehe mṛte jīvaḥ brahma sampadyate punar

original: BhP_12.05.006/1 manaḥ sṛjati vai dehān guṇān karmāṇi cātmanaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ sṛjati vai dehān guṇān karmāṇi ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.006/3 tan manaḥ sṛjate māyā tato jīvasya saṃsṛtiḥ
analyzed: tat manaḥ sṛjate māyā tatas jīvasya saṃsṛtiḥ

original: BhP_12.05.007/1 snehādhiṣṭhāna-varty-agni- saṃyogo yāvad īyate
analyzed: sneha adhiṣṭhāna varti agni saṃyogaḥ yāvat īyate

original: BhP_12.05.007/3 tāvad dīpasya dīpatvam evaṃ deha-kṛto bhavaḥ
analyzed: tāvat dīpasya dīpa tvam evam deha kṛtaḥ bhavaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.007/5 rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-vṛttyā jāyate 'tha vinaśyati
analyzed: rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ vṛttyā jāyate vinaśyati

original: BhP_12.05.008/1 na tatrātmā svayaṃ-jyotir yo vyaktāvyaktayoḥ paraḥ
analyzed: na tatra ātmā svayam jyotiḥ yaḥ vyakta avyaktayoḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_12.05.008/3 ākāśa iva cādhāro dhruvo 'nantopamas tataḥ
analyzed: ākāśaḥ iva ca ādhāraḥ dhruvaḥ nanta upamaḥ tatas

original: BhP_12.05.009/1 evam ātmānam ātma-stham ātmanaivāmṛśa prabho
analyzed: evam ātmānam ātma stham ātmanā eva āmṛśa prabho

original: BhP_12.05.009/3 buddhyānumāna-garbhiṇyā vāsudevānucintayā
analyzed: buddhyā anumāna garbhiṇyā vāsudeva anucintayā

original: BhP_12.05.010/1 codito vipra-vākyena na tvāṃ dhakṣyati takṣakaḥ
analyzed: coditaḥ vipra vākyena na tvām dhakṣyati takṣakaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.010/3 mṛtyavo nopadhakṣyanti mṛtyūnāṃ mṛtyum īśvaram
analyzed: mṛtyavaḥ na upadhakṣyanti mṛtyūnām mṛtyum īśvaram

original: BhP_12.05.011/1 ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam
analyzed: aham brahma param dhāma brahma aham paramam padam

original: BhP_12.05.011/3 evaṃ samīkṣya cātmānam ātmany ādhāya niṣkale
analyzed: evam samīkṣya ca ātmānam ātmani ādhāya niṣkale

original: BhP_12.05.012/1 daśantaṃ takṣakaṃ pāde lelihānaṃ viṣānanaiḥ
analyzed: daśantam takṣakam pāde lelihānam viṣa ānanaiḥ

original: BhP_12.05.012/3 na drakṣyasi śarīraṃ ca viśvaṃ ca pṛthag ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na drakṣyasi śarīram ca viśvam ca pṛthak ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.05.013/1 etat te kathitaṃ tāta yad ātmā pṛṣṭavān nṛpa
analyzed: etat te kathitam tāta yat ātmā pṛṣṭavān nṛpa

original: BhP_12.05.013/3 harer viśvātmanaś ceṣṭāṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
analyzed: hareḥ viśvātmanaḥ ceṣṭām kim bhūyas śrotum icchasi

original: BhP_12.06.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.001/1 etan niśamya muninābhihitaṃ parīkṣid
analyzed: etat niśamya muninā abhihitam parīkṣit

original: BhP_12.06.001/2 vyāsātmajena nikhilātma-dṛśā samena
analyzed: vyāsa ātmajena nikhila ātma dṛśā samena

original: BhP_12.06.001/3 tat-pāda-mūlam upasṛtya natena mūrdhnā
analyzed: tad pāda mūlam upasṛtya natena mūrdhnā

original: BhP_12.06.001/4 baddhāñjalis tam idam āha sa viṣṇurātaḥ
analyzed: baddhāñjaliḥ tam idam āha sa viṣṇurātaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.002/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.002/1 siddho 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi bhavatā karuṇātmanā
analyzed: siddhaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi bhavatā karuṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_12.06.002/3 śrāvito yac ca me sākṣād anādi-nidhano hariḥ
analyzed: śrāvitaḥ yat ca me sākṣāt an ādi nidhanaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_12.06.003/1 nāty-adbhutam ahaṃ manye mahatām acyutātmanām
analyzed: na ati adbhutam aham manye mahatām acyuta ātmanām

original: BhP_12.06.003/3 ajñeṣu tāpa-tapteṣu bhūteṣu yad anugrahaḥ
analyzed: ajñeṣu tāpa tapteṣu bhūteṣu yat anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.004/1 purāṇa-saṃhitām etām aśrauṣma bhavato vayam
analyzed: purāṇa saṃhitām etām aśrauṣma bhavataḥ vayam

original: BhP_12.06.004/3 yasyāṃ khalūttamaḥ-śloko bhagavān anavarṇyate
analyzed: yasyām khalu uttamaḥ ślokaḥ bhagavān

original: BhP_12.06.005/1 bhagavaṃs takṣakādibhyo mṛtyubhyo na bibhemy aham
analyzed: bhagavan takṣaka ādibhyaḥ mṛtyubhyaḥ na bibhemi aham

original: BhP_12.06.005/3 praviṣṭo brahma nirvāṇam abhayaṃ darśitaṃ tvayā
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ brahma nirvāṇam abhayam darśitam tvayā

original: BhP_12.06.006/1 anujānīhi māṃ brahman vācaṃ yacchāmy adhokṣaje
analyzed: anujānīhi mām brahman vācam yacchāmi adhokṣaje

original: BhP_12.06.006/3 mukta-kāmāśayaṃ cetaḥ praveśya visṛjāmy asūn
analyzed: mukta kāma āśayam cetaḥ praveśya visṛjāmi asūn

original: BhP_12.06.007/1 ajñānaṃ ca nirastaṃ me jñāna-vijñāna-niṣṭhayā
analyzed: ajñānam ca nirastam me jñāna vijñāna niṣṭhayā

original: BhP_12.06.007/3 bhavatā darśitaṃ kṣemaṃ paraṃ bhagavataḥ padam
analyzed: bhavatā darśitam kṣemam param bhagavataḥ padam

original: BhP_12.06.008/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.008/1 ity uktas tam anujñāpya bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tam anujñāpya bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.008/3 jagāma bhikṣubhiḥ sākaṃ nara-devena pūjitaḥ
analyzed: jagāma bhikṣubhiḥ sākam naradevena pūjitaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.009/1 parīkṣid api rājarṣir ātmany ātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: parīkṣit api rājarṣiḥ ātmani ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_12.06.009/3 samādhāya paraṃ dadhyāv aspandāsur yathā taruḥ
analyzed: samādhāya param dadhyau aspanda asuḥ yathā taruḥ

original: BhP_12.06.010/1 prāk-kūle barhiṣy āsīno gaṅgā-kūla udaṅ-mukhaḥ
analyzed: prāc kūle barhiṣi āsīnaḥ gaṅgā kūle udak mukhaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.010/3 brahma-bhūto mahā-yogī niḥsaṅgaś chinna-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ mahā yogī niḥsaṅgaḥ chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.011/1 takṣakaḥ prahito viprāḥ kruddhena dvija-sūnunā
analyzed: takṣakaḥ prahitaḥ viprāḥ kruddhena dvijasūnunā

original: BhP_12.06.011/3 hantu-kāmo nṛpaṃ gacchan dadarśa pathi kaśyapam
analyzed: hantu kāmaḥ nṛpam gacchan dadarśa pathi kaśyapam

original: BhP_12.06.012/1 taṃ tarpayitvā draviṇair nivartya viṣa-hāriṇam
analyzed: tam tarpayitvā draviṇaiḥ nivartya viṣa hāriṇam

original: BhP_12.06.012/3 dvija-rūpa-praticchannaḥ kāma-rūpo 'daśan nṛpam
analyzed: dvija rūpa praticchannaḥ kāmarūpaḥ daśan nṛpam

original: BhP_12.06.013/1 brahma-bhūtasya rājarṣer deho 'hi-garalāgninā
analyzed: brahma bhūtasya rājarṣeḥ dehaḥ hi garala agninā

original: BhP_12.06.013/3 babhūva bhasmasāt sadyaḥ paśyatāṃ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: babhūva bhasmasāt sadyas paśyatām sarva dehinām

original: BhP_12.06.014/1 hāhā-kāro mahān āsīd bhuvi khe dikṣu sarvataḥ
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt bhuvi khe dikṣu sarvatas

original: BhP_12.06.014/3 vismitā hy abhavan sarve devāsura-narādayaḥ
analyzed: vismitāḥ hi abhavan sarve deva asura nara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.015/1 deva-dundubhayo nedur gandharvāpsaraso jaguḥ
analyzed: deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_12.06.015/3 vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi vibudhāḥ sādhu-vādinaḥ
analyzed: vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi vibudhāḥ sādhu vādinaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.016/1 janmejayaḥ sva-pitaraṃ śrutvā takṣaka-bhakṣitam
analyzed: janmejayaḥ sva pitaram śrutvā takṣaka bhakṣitam

original: BhP_12.06.016/3 yathājuhāva sankruddho nāgān satre saha dvijaiḥ
analyzed: yathā ājuhāva san kruddhaḥ nāgān satre saha dvijaiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.017/1 sarpa-satre samiddhāgnau dahyamānān mahoragān
analyzed: sarpa satre samiddha agnau dahyamānān mahā uragān

original: BhP_12.06.017/3 dṛṣṭvendraṃ bhaya-saṃvignas takṣakaḥ śaraṇaṃ yayau
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā indram bhaya saṃvignaḥ takṣakaḥ śaraṇam yayau

original: BhP_12.06.018/1 apaśyaṃs takṣakaṃ tatra rājā pārīkṣito dvijān
analyzed: apaśyan takṣakam tatra rājā pārīkṣitaḥ dvijān

original: BhP_12.06.018/3 uvāca takṣakaḥ kasmān na dahyetoragādhamaḥ
analyzed: uvāca takṣakaḥ kasmāt na dahyeta uraga adhamaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.019/1 taṃ gopāyati rājendra śakraḥ śaraṇam āgatam
analyzed: tam gopāyati rāja indra śakraḥ śaraṇam āgatam

original: BhP_12.06.019/3 tena saṃstambhitaḥ sarpas tasmān nāgnau pataty asau
analyzed: tena saṃstambhitaḥ sarpaḥ tasmāt na agnau patati asau

original: BhP_12.06.020/1 pārīkṣita iti śrutvā prāhartvija udāra-dhīḥ
analyzed: pārīkṣitaḥ iti śrutvā prāha ṛtvijaḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: BhP_12.06.020/3 sahendras takṣako viprā nāgnau kim iti pātyate
analyzed: saha indraḥ takṣakaḥ viprāḥ na agnau kim iti pātyate

original: BhP_12.06.021/1 tac chrutvājuhuvur viprāḥ sahendraṃ takṣakaṃ makhe
analyzed: tat śrutvā ajuhuvuḥ viprāḥ saha indram takṣakam makhe

original: BhP_12.06.021/3 takṣakāśu patasveha sahendreṇa marutvatā
analyzed: takṣaka āśu patasva iha saha indreṇa marutvatā

original: BhP_12.06.022/1 iti brahmoditākṣepaiḥ sthānād indraḥ pracālitaḥ
analyzed: iti brahma udita ākṣepaiḥ sthānāt indraḥ pracālitaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.022/3 babhūva sambhrānta-matiḥ sa-vimānaḥ sa-takṣakaḥ
analyzed: babhūva sambhrānta matiḥ sa vimānaḥ sa takṣakaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.023/1 taṃ patantaṃ vimānena saha-takṣakam ambarāt
analyzed: tam patantam vimānena saha takṣakam ambarāt

original: BhP_12.06.023/3 vilokyāṅgirasaḥ prāha rājānaṃ taṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: vilokya aṅgirasaḥ prāha rājānam tam bṛhaspatiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.024/1 naiṣa tvayā manuṣyendra vadham arhati sarpa-rāṭ
analyzed: na eṣa tvayā manuṣya indra vadham arhati sarpa rāj

original: BhP_12.06.024/3 anena pītam amṛtam atha vā ajarāmaraḥ
analyzed: anena pītam amṛtam atha vā ajara amaraḥ

original: BhP_12.06.025/1 jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ jantor gatiḥ svenaiva karmaṇā
analyzed: jīvitam maraṇam jantoḥ gatiḥ svena eva karmaṇā

original: BhP_12.06.025/3 rājaṃs tato 'nyo nāsty asya pradātā sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: rājan tatas nyaḥ na asti asya pradātā sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_12.06.026/1 sarpa-caurāgni-vidyudbhyaḥ kṣut-tṛd-vyādhy-ādibhir nṛpa
analyzed: sarpa caura agni vidyudbhyaḥ kṣuttṛd vyādhi ādibhiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_12.06.026/3 pañcatvam ṛcchate jantur bhuṅkta ārabdha-karma tat
analyzed: pañcatvam ṛcchate jantuḥ bhuṅkte ārabdha karma tat

original: BhP_12.06.027/1 tasmāt satram idaṃ rājan saṃsthīyetābhicārikam
analyzed: tasmāt satram idam rājan saṃsthīyeta ābhicārikam

original: BhP_12.06.027/3 sarpā anāgaso dagdhā janair diṣṭaṃ hi bhujyate
analyzed: sarpāḥ anāgasaḥ dagdhāḥ janaiḥ diṣṭam hi bhujyate

original: BhP_12.06.028/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.028/1 ity uktaḥ sa tathety āha maharṣer mānayan vacaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tathā iti āha mahā ṛṣeḥ mānayan vacaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.028/3 sarpa-satrād uparataḥ pūjayām āsa vāk-patim
analyzed: sarpa satrāt uparataḥ pūjayām āsa vākpatim

original: BhP_12.06.029/1 saiṣā viṣṇor mahā-māyā- bādhyayālakṣaṇā yayā
analyzed: sā eṣā viṣṇoḥ mahāmāyā bādhyayā alakṣaṇā yayā

original: BhP_12.06.029/3 muhyanty asyaivātma-bhūtā bhūteṣu guṇa-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: muhyanti asya eva ātma bhūtāḥ bhūteṣu guṇa vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.030/1 na yatra dambhīty abhayā virājitā māyātma-vāde 'sakṛd ātma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: na yatra dambhī iti abhayā virājitā māyā ātma vāde sakṛt ātma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.030/3 na yad vivādo vividhas tad-āśrayo manaś ca saṅkalpa-vikalpa-vṛtti yat
analyzed: na yat vivādaḥ vividhaḥ tad āśrayaḥ manaḥ ca saṅkalpa vikalpa vṛtti yat

original: BhP_12.06.031/1 na yatra sṛjyaṃ sṛjatobhayoḥ paraṃ śreyaś ca jīvas tribhir anvitas tv aham
analyzed: na yatra sṛjyam sṛjatā ubhayoḥ param śreyaḥ ca jīvaḥ tribhiḥ anvitaḥ tu aham

original: BhP_12.06.031/3 tad etad utsādita-bādhya-bādhakaṃ niṣidhya cormīn virameta tan muniḥ
analyzed: tat etat utsādita bādhya bādhakam niṣidhya ca ūrmīn virameta tat muniḥ

original: BhP_12.06.032/1 paraṃ padaṃ vaiṣṇavam āmananti tad yan neti netīty atad-utsisṛkṣavaḥ
analyzed: param padam vaiṣṇavam āmananti tat yat na iti na iti iti a tad utsisṛkṣavaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.032/3 visṛjya daurātmyam ananya-sauhṛdā hṛdopaguhyāvasitaṃ samāhitaiḥ
analyzed: visṛjya daurātmyam ananya sauhṛdāḥ hṛdā upaguhya avasitam samāhitaiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.033/1 ta etad adhigacchanti viṣṇor yat paramaṃ padam
analyzed: te etat adhigacchanti viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam

original: BhP_12.06.033/3 ahaṃ mameti daurjanyaṃ na yeṣāṃ deha-geha-jam
analyzed: aham mama iti daurjanyam na yeṣām deha geha jam

original: BhP_12.06.034/1 ativādāṃs titikṣeta nāvamanyeta kañcana
analyzed: ativādān titikṣeta na avamanyeta kañcana

original: BhP_12.06.034/3 na cemaṃ deham āśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kenacit
analyzed: na ca imam deham āśritya vairam kurvīta kenacid

original: BhP_12.06.035/1 namo bhagavate tasmai kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate tasmai kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase

original: BhP_12.06.035/3 yat-pādāmburuha-dhyānāt saṃhitām adhyagām imām
analyzed: yad pāda amburuha dhyānāt saṃhitām adhyagām imām

original: BhP_12.06.036/0 śrī-śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.036/1 pailādibhir vyāsa-śiṣyair vedācāryair mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: paila ādibhiḥ vyāsa śiṣyaiḥ veda ācāryaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.036/3 vedāś ca kathitā vyastā etat saumyābhidhehi naḥ
analyzed: vedāḥ ca kathitāḥ vyastāḥ etat saumya abhidhehi naḥ

original: BhP_12.06.037/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.037/1 samāhitātmano brahman brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: samāhita ātmanaḥ brahman brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.037/3 hṛdy ākāśād abhūn nādo vṛtti-rodhād vibhāvyate
analyzed: hṛdi ākāśāt abhūt nādaḥ vṛtti rodhāt vibhāvyate

original: BhP_12.06.038/1 yad-upāsanayā brahman yogino malam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yad upāsanayā brahman yoginaḥ malam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.038/3 dravya-kriyā-kārakākhyaṃ dhūtvā yānty apunar-bhavam
analyzed: dravya kriyā kāraka ākhyam dhūtvā yānti apunarbhavam

original: BhP_12.06.039/1 tato 'bhūt tri-vṛd oṃkāro yo 'vyakta-prabhavaḥ sva-rāṭ
analyzed: tatas bhūt trivṛt oṃkāraḥ yaḥ vyakta prabhavaḥ svarāj

original: BhP_12.06.039/3 yat tal liṅgaṃ bhagavato brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat tat liṅgam bhagavataḥ brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.040/1 śṛṇoti ya imaṃ sphoṭaṃ supta-śrotre ca śūnya-dṛk
analyzed: śṛṇoti yaḥ imam sphoṭam supta śrotre ca śūnya dṛś

original: BhP_12.06.040/3 yena vāg vyajyate yasya vyaktir ākāśa ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yena vāc vyajyate yasya vyaktiḥ ākāśaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.041/1 sva-dhāmno brāhmaṇaḥ sākṣād vācakaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: sva dhāmnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ sākṣāt vācakaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.041/3 sa sarva-mantropaniṣad veda-bījaṃ sanātanam
analyzed: sa sarva mantra upaniṣad veda bījam sanātanam

original: BhP_12.06.042/1 tasya hy āsaṃs trayo varṇā a-kārādyā bhṛgūdvaha
analyzed: tasya hi āsan trayaḥ varṇāḥ akāra ādyāḥ bhṛgu udvaha

original: BhP_12.06.042/3 dhāryante yais trayo bhāvā guṇa-nāmārtha-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: dhāryante yaiḥ trayaḥ bhāvāḥ guṇa nāma artha vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.043/1 tato 'kṣara-samāmnāyam asṛjad bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: kṣara samāmnāyam asṛjat bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.043/3 antasthoṣma-svara-sparśa- hrasva-dīrghādi-lakṣaṇam
BhP_12.06.044/1 tenāsau caturo vedāṃś caturbhir vadanair vibhuḥ
analyzed: tena asau caturaḥ vedān caturbhiḥ vadanaiḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_12.06.044/3 sa-vyāhṛtikān soṃkārāṃś cātur-hotra-vivakṣayā
analyzed: sa vyāhṛtikān sa oṃkārān cāturhotra vivakṣayā

original: BhP_12.06.045/1 putrān adhyāpayat tāṃs tu brahmarṣīn brahma-kovidān
analyzed: putrān adhyāpayat tān tu brahmarṣīn brahma kovidān

original: BhP_12.06.045/3 te tu dharmopadeṣṭāraḥ sva-putrebhyaḥ samādiśan
analyzed: te tu dharma upadeṣṭāraḥ sva putrebhyaḥ samādiśan

original: BhP_12.06.046/1 te paramparayā prāptās tat-tac-chiṣyair dhṛta-vrataiḥ
analyzed: te paramparayā prāptāḥ tad tad śiṣyaiḥ dhṛta vrataiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.046/3 catur-yugeṣv atha vyastā dvāparādau maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: catur yugeṣu atha vyastāḥ dvāpara ādau mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.047/1 kṣīṇāyuṣaḥ kṣīṇa-sattvān durmedhān vīkṣya kālataḥ
analyzed: kṣīṇa āyuṣaḥ kṣīṇa sattvān durmedhān vīkṣya kālataḥ

original: BhP_12.06.047/3 vedān brahmarṣayo vyasyan hṛdi-sthācyuta-coditāḥ
analyzed: vedān brahmarṣayaḥ vyasyan hṛdistha acyuta coditāḥ

original: BhP_12.06.048/1 asminn apy antare brahman bhagavān loka-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: asmin api antare brahman bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.048/3 brahmeśādyair loka-pālair yācito dharma-guptaye
analyzed: brahma īśa ādyaiḥ lokapālaiḥ yācitaḥ dharma guptaye

original: BhP_12.06.049/1 parāśarāt satyavatyām aṃśāṃśa-kalayā vibhuḥ
analyzed: parāśarāt satyavatyām aṃśa aṃśa kalayā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_12.06.049/3 avatīrṇo mahā-bhāga vedaṃ cakre catur-vidham
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ mahābhāga vedam cakre caturvidham

original: BhP_12.06.050/1 ṛg-atharva-yajuḥ-sāmnāṃ rāśīr uddhṛtya vargaśaḥ
analyzed: ṛk atharva yajuḥ sāmnām rāśīḥ uddhṛtya vargaśas

original: BhP_12.06.050/3 catasraḥ saṃhitāś cakre mantrair maṇi-gaṇā iva
analyzed: catasraḥ saṃhitāḥ cakre mantraiḥ maṇi gaṇāḥ iva

original: BhP_12.06.051/1 tāsāṃ sa caturaḥ śiṣyān upāhūya mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: tāsām sa caturaḥ śiṣyān upāhūya mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.051/3 ekaikāṃ saṃhitāṃ brahmann ekaikasmai dadau vibhuḥ
analyzed: ekaikām saṃhitām brahman ekaikasmai dadau vibhuḥ

original: BhP_12.06.052/1 pailāya saṃhitām ādyāṃ bahvṛcākhyāṃ uvāca ha
analyzed: pailāya saṃhitām ādyām bahvṛca ākhyām uvāca ha

original: BhP_12.06.052/3 vaiśampāyana-saṃjñāya nigadākhyaṃ yajur-gaṇam
analyzed: vaiśampāyana saṃjñāya nigada ākhyam yajuḥ gaṇam

original: BhP_12.06.053/1 sāmnāṃ jaiminaye prāha tathā chandoga-saṃhitām
analyzed: sāmnām jaiminaye prāha tathā chandoga saṃhitām

original: BhP_12.06.053/3 atharvāṅgirasīṃ nāma sva-śiṣyāya sumantave
analyzed: atharvāṅgirasīm nāma sva śiṣyāya sumantave

original: BhP_12.06.054/1 pailaḥ sva-saṃhitām ūce indrapramitaye muniḥ
analyzed: pailaḥ sva saṃhitām ūce indra pramitaye muniḥ

original: BhP_12.06.054/3 bāṣkalāya ca so 'py āha śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃhitāṃ svakām
analyzed: bāṣkalāya ca saḥ u pi āha śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃhitām svakām

original: BhP_12.06.055/1 caturdhā vyasya bodhyāya yājñavalkyāya bhārgava
analyzed: caturdhā vyasya bodhyāya yājñavalkyāya bhārgava

original: BhP_12.06.055/3 parāśarāyāgnimitra indrapramitir ātmavān
analyzed: parāśarāya agnimitraḥ indrapramitiḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_12.06.056/1 adhyāpayat saṃhitāṃ svāṃ māṇḍūkeyam ṛṣiṃ kavim
analyzed: adhyāpayat saṃhitām svām māṇḍūkeyam ṛṣim kavim

original: BhP_12.06.056/3 tasya śiṣyo devamitraḥ saubhary-ādibhya ūcivān
analyzed: tasya śiṣyaḥ devamitraḥ saubhari ādibhyaḥ ūcivān

original: BhP_12.06.057/1 śākalyas tat-sutaḥ svāṃ tu pañcadhā vyasya saṃhitām
analyzed: śākalyaḥ tad sutaḥ svām tu pañcadhā vyasya saṃhitām

original: BhP_12.06.057/3 vātsya-mudgala-śālīya- gokhalya-śiśireṣv adhāt
analyzed: vātsya mudgala śālīya go khalya śiśireṣu adhāt

original: BhP_12.06.058/1 jātūkarṇyaś ca tac-chiṣyaḥ sa-niruktāṃ sva-saṃhitām
analyzed: jātūkarṇyaḥ ca tad śiṣyaḥ sa niruktām sva saṃhitām

original: BhP_12.06.058/3 balāka-paila-jābāla- virajebhyo dadau muniḥ
analyzed: balāka paila jābāla virajebhyaḥ dadau muniḥ

original: BhP_12.06.059/1 bāṣkaliḥ prati-śākhābhyo vālakhilyākhya-saṃhitām
analyzed: bāṣkaliḥ pratiśākhābhyaḥ vālakhilya ākhya saṃhitām

original: BhP_12.06.059/3 cakre vālāyanir bhajyaḥ kāśāraś caiva tāṃ dadhuḥ
analyzed: cakre vālāyaniḥ bhajyaḥ kāśāraḥ ca eva tām

original: BhP_12.06.060/1 bahvṛcāḥ saṃhitā hy etā ebhir brahmarṣibhir dhṛtāḥ
analyzed: bahvṛcāḥ saṃhitāḥ hi etāḥ ebhiḥ brahmarṣibhiḥ dhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_12.06.060/3 śrutvaitac-chandasāṃ vyāsaṃ sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: śrutvā etat chandasām vyāsam sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: BhP_12.06.061/1 vaiśampāyana-śiṣyā vai carakādhvaryavo 'bhavan
analyzed: vaiśampāyana śiṣyāḥ vai caraka adhvaryavaḥ bhavan

original: BhP_12.06.061/3 yac cerur brahma-hatyāṃhaḥ kṣapaṇaṃ sva-guror vratam
analyzed: yat ceruḥ brahmahatyā aṃhaḥ kṣapaṇam sva guroḥ vratam

original: BhP_12.06.062/1 yājñavalkyaś ca tac-chiṣya āhāho bhagavan kiyat
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ ca tad śiṣyaḥ āha aho bhagavan kiyat

original: BhP_12.06.062/3 caritenālpa-sārāṇāṃ cariṣye 'haṃ su-duścaram
analyzed: caritena alpa sārāṇām cariṣye haṃ su duścaram

original: BhP_12.06.063/1 ity ukto gurur apy āha kupito yāhy alaṃ tvayā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ guruḥ api āha kupitaḥ yāhi alam tvayā

original: BhP_12.06.063/3 viprāvamantrā śiṣyeṇa mad-adhītaṃ tyajāśv iti
analyzed: vipra avamantrā śiṣyeṇa mat adhītam tyaja āśu iti

original: BhP_12.06.064/1 devarāta-sutaḥ so 'pi charditvā yajuṣāṃ gaṇam
analyzed: devarāta sutaḥ saḥ u pi charditvā yajuṣām gaṇam

original: BhP_12.06.064/3 tato gato 'tha munayo dadṛśus tān yajur-gaṇān
analyzed: tatas munayaḥ dadṛśuḥ tān yajuḥ gaṇān

original: BhP_12.06.065/1 yajūṃṣi tittirā bhūtvā tal-lolupatayādaduḥ
analyzed: yajūṃṣi tittirāḥ bhūtvā tat lolupa tayā adaduḥ

original: BhP_12.06.065/3 taittirīyā iti yajuḥ- śākhā āsan su-peśalāḥ
analyzed: taittirīyāḥ iti yajuḥ śākhāḥ āsan supeśalāḥ

original: BhP_12.06.066/1 yājñavalkyas tato brahmaṃś chandāṃsy adhi gaveṣayan
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ tatas brahman chandāṃsi adhi gaveṣayan

original: BhP_12.06.066/3 guror avidyamānāni sūpatasthe 'rkam īśvaram
analyzed: guroḥ a vidyamānāni su upatasthe rkam īśvaram

original: BhP_12.06.067/0 śrī-yājñavalkya uvāca
analyzed: śrī yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.067/1 oṃ namo bhagavate ādityāyākhila-jagatām ātma-svarūpeṇa kāla-
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate ādityāya akhila jagatām ātma svarūpeṇa kāla

original: BhP_12.06.067/2 svarūpeṇa catur-vidha-bhūta-nikāyānāṃ brahmādi-stamba-paryantānām antar-hṛdayeṣu
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa caturvidha bhūta nikāyānām brahma ādi stamba paryantānām antar hṛdayeṣu

original: BhP_12.06.067/3 bahir api cākāśa ivopādhināvyavadhīyamāno bhavān eka
analyzed: bahis api ca ākāśe iva upādhinā a vyavadhīyamānaḥ bhavān eka

original: BhP_12.06.067/4 eva kṣaṇa-lava-nimeṣāvayavopacita-saṃvatsara-gaṇenāpām ādāna-
analyzed: eva kṣaṇa lava nimeṣa avayava upacita saṃvatsara gaṇena apām ādāna

original: BhP_12.06.067/5 visargābhyām imāṃ loka-yātrām anuvahati
analyzed: visargābhyām imām lokayātrām anuvahati

original: BhP_12.06.068/1 yad u ha vāva vibudharṣabha savitar adas tapaty anusavanam ahar
analyzed: yat u ha vāva vibudha ṛṣabha savitar adaḥ tapati anusavanam ahar

original: BhP_12.06.068/2 ahar āmnāya-vidhinopatiṣṭhamānānām akhila-durita-vṛjina-
analyzed: ahar āmnāya vidhinā upatiṣṭhamānānām akhila durita vṛjina

original: BhP_12.06.068/3 bījāvabharjana bhagavataḥ samabhidhīmahi tapana maṇḍalam
analyzed: bīja avabharjana bhagavataḥ samabhidhīmahi tapana maṇḍalam

original: BhP_12.06.069/1 ya iha vāva sthira-cara-nikarāṇāṃ nija-niketanānāṃ mana-indriyāsu-
analyzed: yaḥ iha vāva sthira cara nikarāṇām nija niketanānām mana indriyāsu

original: BhP_12.06.069/2 gaṇān anātmanaḥ svayam ātmāntar-yāmī pracodayati
analyzed: gaṇān anātmanaḥ svayam ātma antaryāmī pracodayati

original: BhP_12.06.070/1 ya evemaṃ lokam ati-karāla-vadanāndhakāra-saṃjñājagara-graha-
analyzed: yaḥ eva imam lokam ati karāla vadana andhakāra saṃjñā jagara graha

original: BhP_12.06.070/2 gilitaṃ mṛtakam iva vicetanam avalokyānukampayā parama-kāruṇika
analyzed: gilitam mṛtakam iva vicetanam avalokya anukampayā parama kāruṇika

original: BhP_12.06.070/3 īkṣayaivotthāpyāhar ahar anusavanaṃ śreyasi sva-dharmākhyātmāva-
analyzed: īkṣaya eva utthāpya ahar ahar anusavanam śreyasi

original: BhP_12.06.070/4 sthane pravartayati
analyzed: sthane pravartayati

original: BhP_12.06.071/1 avani-patir ivāsādhūnāṃ bhayam udīrayann aṭati parita āśā-pālais
analyzed: avanipatiḥ iva asādhūnām bhayam udīrayan aṭati paritas āśāpālaiḥ

original: BhP_12.06.071/2 tatra tatra kamala-kośāñjalibhir upahṛtārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra kamala kośa añjalibhiḥ upahṛta arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.072/1 atha ha bhagavaṃs tava caraṇa-nalina-yugalaṃ tri-bhuvana-gurubhir abhivanditam
analyzed: atha ha bhagavan tava caraṇa nalina yugalam tribhuvana gurubhiḥ abhivanditam

original: BhP_12.06.072/3 aham ayāta-yāma-yajuṣ-kāma upasarāmīti
analyzed: aham ayātayāma yajuṣkāmaḥ upasarāmi iti

original: BhP_12.06.073/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.06.073/1 evaṃ stutaḥ sa bhagavān vāji-rūpa-dharo raviḥ
analyzed: evam stutaḥ sa bhagavān vāji rūpa dharaḥ raviḥ

original: BhP_12.06.073/3 yajūṃṣy ayāta-yāmāni munaye 'dāt prasāditaḥ
analyzed: yajūṃṣi ayātayāmāni munaye dāt prasāditaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.074/1 yajurbhir akaroc chākhā daśa pañca śatair vibhuḥ
analyzed: yajurbhiḥ akarot śākhāḥ daśa pañca śataiḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_12.06.074/3 jagṛhur vājasanyas tāḥ kāṇva-mādhyandinādayaḥ
analyzed: jagṛhuḥ vājasanyaḥ tāḥ kāṇva mādhyandina ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.075/1 jaimineḥ sama-gasyāsīt sumantus tanayo muniḥ
analyzed: jaimineḥ samagasya āsīt sumantuḥ tanayaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_12.06.075/3 sutvāṃs tu tat-sutas tābhyām ekaikāṃ prāha saṃhitām
analyzed: sutvān tu tad sutaḥ tābhyām ekaikām prāha saṃhitām

original: BhP_12.06.076/1 sukarmā cāpi tac-chiṣyaḥ sāma-veda-taror mahān
analyzed: sukarmā ca api tad śiṣyaḥ sāmaveda taroḥ mahān

original: BhP_12.06.076/3 sahasra-saṃhitā-bhedaṃ cakre sāmnāṃ tato dvija
analyzed: sahasra saṃhitā bhedam cakre sāmnām tatas dvija

original: BhP_12.06.077/1 hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ pauṣyañjiś ca sukarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ pauṣyañjiḥ ca sukarmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.077/3 śiṣyau jagṛhatuś cānya āvantyo brahma-vittamaḥ
analyzed: śiṣyau jagṛhatuḥ ca anyaḥ āvantyaḥ brahma vittamaḥ

original: BhP_12.06.078/1 udīcyāḥ sāma-gāḥ śiṣyā āsan pañca-śatāni vai
analyzed: udīcyāḥ sāmagāḥ śiṣyāḥ āsan pañcaśatāni vai

original: BhP_12.06.078/3 pauṣyañjy-āvantyayoś cāpi tāṃś ca prācyān pracakṣate
analyzed: pauṣyañjyāvantyayoḥ ca api tān ca prācyān pracakṣate

original: BhP_12.06.079/1 laugākṣir māṅgaliḥ kulyaḥ kuśīdaḥ kukṣir eva ca
analyzed: laugākṣiḥ māṅgaliḥ kulyaḥ kuśīdaḥ kukṣiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_12.06.079/3 pauṣyañji-siṣyā jagṛhuḥ saṃhitās te śataṃ śatam
analyzed: pauṣyañjisiṣyāḥ jagṛhuḥ saṃhitāḥ te śatam śatam

original: BhP_12.06.080/1 kṛto hiraṇyanābhasya catur-viṃśati saṃhitāḥ
analyzed: kṛtaḥ hiraṇyanābhasya caturviṃśati saṃhitāḥ

original: BhP_12.06.080/3 śiṣya ūce sva-śiṣyebhyaḥ śeṣā āvantya ātmavān
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ ūce sva śiṣyebhyaḥ śeṣāḥ āvantyaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_12.07.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.07.001/1 atharva-vit sumantuś ca śiṣyam adhyāpayat svakām
analyzed: atharva vid sumantuḥ ca śiṣyam adhyāpayat svakām

original: BhP_12.07.001/3 saṃhitāṃ so 'pi pathyāya vedadarśāya coktavān
analyzed: saṃhitām saḥ pi pathyāya vedadarśāya ca uktavān

original: BhP_12.07.002/1 śauklāyanir brahmabalir modoṣaḥ pippalāyaniḥ
analyzed: śauklāyaniḥ brahmabaliḥ modoṣaḥ pippalāyaniḥ

original: BhP_12.07.002/3 vedadarśasya śiṣyās te pathya-śiṣyān atho śṛṇu
analyzed: vedadarśasya śiṣyāḥ te pathya śiṣyān atho śṛṇu

original: BhP_12.07.002/5 kumudaḥ śunako brahman jājaliś cāpy atharva-vit
analyzed: kumudaḥ śunakaḥ brahman jājaliḥ ca api atharva vid

original: BhP_12.07.003/1 babhruḥ śiṣyo 'thāngirasaḥ saindhavāyana eva ca
analyzed: babhruḥ saindhavāyanaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_12.07.003/3 adhīyetāṃ saṃhite dve sāvarṇādyās tathāpare
analyzed: adhīyetām saṃhite dve sāvarṇa ādyāḥ tathā apare

original: BhP_12.07.004/1 nakṣatrakalpaḥ śāntiś ca kaśyapāṅgirasādayaḥ
analyzed: nakṣatra kalpaḥ śāntiḥ ca kaśyapa aṅgirasa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.004/3 ete ātharvaṇācāryāḥ śṛṇu paurāṇikān mune
analyzed: ete ātharvaṇa ācāryāḥ śṛṇu paurāṇikān mune

original: BhP_12.07.005/1 trayyāruṇiḥ kaśyapaś ca sāvarṇir akṛtavranaḥ
analyzed: trayyāruṇiḥ kaśyapaḥ ca sāvarṇiḥ akṛtavranaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.005/3 vaiśampāyana-hārītau ṣaḍ vai paurāṇikā ime
analyzed: vaiśampāyana hārītau ṣaṭ vai paurāṇikāḥ ime

original: BhP_12.07.006/1 adhīyanta vyāsa-śiṣyāt saṃhitāṃ mat-pitur mukhāt
analyzed: adhīyanta vyāsa śiṣyāt saṃhitām mad pituḥ mukhāt

original: BhP_12.07.006/3 ekaikām aham eteṣāṃ śiṣyaḥ sarvāḥ samadhyagām
analyzed: ekaikām aham eteṣām śiṣyaḥ sarvāḥ samadhyagām

original: BhP_12.07.007/1 kaśyapo 'haṃ ca sāvarṇī rāma-śiṣyo 'kṛtavranaḥ
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ ham ca sāvarṇiḥ kṛtavranaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.007/3 adhīmahi vyāsa-śiṣyāc catvāro mūla-saṃhitāḥ
analyzed: adhīmahi vyāsa śiṣyāt catvāraḥ mūlasaṃhitāḥ

original: BhP_12.07.008/1 purāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ brahman brahmarṣibhir nirūpitam
analyzed: purāṇa lakṣaṇam brahman brahmarṣibhiḥ nirūpitam

original: BhP_12.07.008/3 śṛṇuṣva buddhim āśritya veda-śāstrānusārataḥ
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva buddhim āśritya veda śāstra anusārataḥ

original: BhP_12.07.009/1 sargo 'syātha visargaś ca vṛtti-rakṣāntarāṇi ca
analyzed: visargaḥ ca vṛtti rakṣā antarāṇi ca

original: BhP_12.07.009/3 vaṃśo vaṃśānucarītaṃ saṃsthā hetur apāśrayaḥ
analyzed: vaṃśaḥ vaṃśānucarītam saṃsthā hetuḥ apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.010/1 daśabhir lakṣaṇair yuktaṃ purāṇaṃ tad-vido viduḥ
analyzed: daśabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktam purāṇam tad vidaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_12.07.010/3 kecit pañca-vidhaṃ brahman mahad-alpa-vyavasthayā
analyzed: kecid pañcavidham brahman mahat alpa vyavasthayā

original: BhP_12.07.011/1 avyākṛta-guṇa-kṣobhān mahatas tri-vṛto 'hamaḥ
analyzed: avyākṛta guṇa kṣobhāt mahataḥ trivṛtaḥ hamaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.011/3 bhūta-sūkṣmendriyārthānāṃ sambhavaḥ sarga ucyate
analyzed: bhūta sūkṣma indriya arthānām sambhavaḥ sargaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_12.07.012/1 puruṣānugṛhītānām eteṣāṃ vāsanā-mayaḥ
analyzed: puruṣa anugṛhītānām eteṣām vāsanā mayaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.012/3 visargo 'yaṃ samāhāro bījād bījaṃ carācaram
analyzed: visargaḥ yam samāhāraḥ bījāt bījam carācaram

original: BhP_12.07.013/1 vṛttir bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ carāṇām acarāṇi ca
analyzed: vṛttiḥ bhūtāni bhūtānām carāṇām acarāṇi ca

original: BhP_12.07.013/3 kṛtā svena nṛṇāṃ tatra kāmāc codanayāpi vā
analyzed: kṛtā svena nṛṇām tatra kāmāt codanayā api vā

original: BhP_12.07.014/1 rakṣācyutāvatārehā viśvasyānu yuge yuge
analyzed: rakṣā acyuta avatāra īhā viśvasya anu yuge yuge

original: BhP_12.07.014/3 tiryaṅ-martyarṣi-deveṣu hanyante yais trayī-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: tiryak martya ṛṣi deveṣu hanyante yaiḥ trayī dviṣaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.015/1 manvantaraṃ manur devā manu-putrāḥ sureśvarāḥ
analyzed: manvantaram manuḥ devāḥ manu putrāḥ sura īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_12.07.015/3 rṣayo 'ṃśāvatārāś ca hareḥ ṣaḍ-vidham ucyate
