analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ṃśa avatārāḥ ca hareḥ ṣaḍvidham ucyate

original: BhP_12.07.016/1 rājñāṃ brahma-prasūtānāṃ vaṃśas trai-kāliko 'nvayaḥ
analyzed: rājñām brahma prasūtānām vaṃśaḥ traikālikaḥ nvayaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.016/3 vaṃśānucaritaṃ teṣām vṛttaṃ vaṃśa-dharās ca ye
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam teṣām vṛttam vaṃśa dharāḥ ca ye

original: BhP_12.07.017/1 naimittikaḥ prākṛtiko nitya ātyantiko layaḥ
analyzed: naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ nityaḥ ātyantikaḥ layaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.017/3 saṃstheti kavibhiḥ proktaś caturdhāsya svabhāvataḥ
analyzed: saṃsthā iti kavibhiḥ proktaḥ caturdhā asya svabhāvataḥ

original: BhP_12.07.018/1 hetur jīvo 'sya sargāder avidyā-karma-kārakaḥ
analyzed: hetuḥ sarga ādeḥ avidyā karma kārakaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.018/3 yaṃ cānuśāyinaṃ prāhur avyākṛtam utāpare
analyzed: yam ca anuśāyinam prāhuḥ avyākṛtam uta apare

original: BhP_12.07.019/1 vyatirekānvayo yasya jāgrat-svapna-suṣuptiṣu
analyzed: vyatireka anvayaḥ yasya jāgrat svapna suṣuptiṣu

original: BhP_12.07.019/3 māyā-mayeṣu tad brahma jīva-vṛttiṣv apāśrayaḥ
analyzed: māyā mayeṣu tat brahma jīva vṛttiṣu apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_12.07.020/1 padārtheṣu yathā dravyaṃ san-mātraṃ rūpa-nāmasu
analyzed: padārtheṣu yathā dravyam sat mātram rūpa nāmasu

original: BhP_12.07.020/3 bījādi-pañcatāntāsu hy avasthāsu yutāyutam
BhP_12.07.021/1 virameta yadā cittaṃ hitvā vṛtti-trayaṃ svayam
analyzed: virameta yadā cittam hitvā vṛtti trayam svayam

original: BhP_12.07.021/3 yogerla vā tadātmānaṃ vedehāyā nivartate
analyzed: vā tat ātmānam veda ihāyāḥ nivartate

original: BhP_12.07.022/1 evaṃ lakṣaṇa-lakṣyāṇi purāṇāni purā-vidaḥ
analyzed: evam lakṣaṇa lakṣyāṇi purāṇāni

original: BhP_12.07.022/3 munayo 'ṣṭādaśa prāhuḥ kṣullakāni mahānti ca
analyzed: munayaḥ ṣṭādaśa prāhuḥ kṣullakāni mahānti ca

original: BhP_12.07.023/1 brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śaivaṃ laiṅgaṃ sa-gāruḍaṃ
analyzed: brāhmam pādmam vaiṣṇavam ca śaivam laiṅgam sa gāruḍam

original: BhP_12.07.023/3 nāradīyaṃ bhāgavatam āgneyaṃ skānda-saṃjñitam
BhP_12.07.024/1 bhaviṣyaṃ brahma-vaivartaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ sa-vāmanam
analyzed: bhaviṣyam brahmavaivartam mārkaṇḍeyam sa vāmanam

original: BhP_12.07.024/3 vārāhaṃ mātsyaṃ kaurmaṃ ca brahmāṇḍākhyam iti tri-ṣaṭ
analyzed: vārāham mātsyam kaurmam ca brahmāṇḍa ākhyam iti tri ṣaṣ

original: BhP_12.07.025/1 brahmann idaṃ samākhyātaṃ śākhā-praṇayanaṃ muneḥ
analyzed: brahman idam samākhyātam śākhā praṇayanam muneḥ

original: BhP_12.07.025/3 śiṣya-śiṣya-praśiṣyāṇāṃ brahma-tejo-vivardhanam
analyzed: śiṣya śiṣya praśiṣyāṇām brahma tejaḥ vivardhanam

original: BhP_12.08.001/0 śrī-śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.08.001/1 sūta jīva ciraṃ sādho vada no vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: sūta jīva ciram sādho vada naḥ vadatām vara

original: BhP_12.08.001/3 tamasy apāre bhramatāṃ nṝṇāṃ tvaṃ pāra-darśanaḥ
analyzed: tamasi apāre bhramatām nṝṇām tvam pāra darśanaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.002/1 āhuś cirāyuṣam ṛṣiṃ mṛkaṇḍu-tanayaṃ janāḥ
analyzed: āhuḥ cira āyuṣam ṛṣim mṛkaṇḍu tanayam janāḥ

original: BhP_12.08.002/3 yaḥ kalpānte hy urvarito yena grastam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: yaḥ kalpa ante hi urvaritaḥ yena grastam idam jagat

original: BhP_12.08.003/1 sa vā asmat-kulotpannaḥ kalpe 'smin bhārgavarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa vai asmad kula utpannaḥ kalpe smin bhārgava ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.003/3 naivādhunāpi bhūtānāṃ samplavaḥ ko 'pi jāyate
analyzed: na eva adhunā api bhūtānām samplavaḥ kaḥ pi jāyate

original: BhP_12.08.004/1 eka evārṇave bhrāmyan dadarśa puruṣaṃ kila
analyzed: ekaḥ eva arṇave bhrāmyan dadarśa puruṣam kila

original: BhP_12.08.004/3 vaṭa-patra-puṭe tokaṃ śayānaṃ tv ekam adbhutam
analyzed: vaṭa patra puṭe tokam śayānam tu ekam adbhutam

original: BhP_12.08.005/1 eṣa naḥ saṃśayo bhūyān sūta kautūhalaṃ yataḥ
analyzed: eṣa naḥ saṃśayaḥ bhūyān sūta kautūhalam yatas

original: BhP_12.08.005/3 taṃ naś chindhi mahā-yogin purāṇeṣv api sammataḥ
analyzed: tam naḥ chindhi mahā yogin purāṇeṣu api sammataḥ

original: BhP_12.08.006/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.08.006/1 praśnas tvayā maharṣe 'yaṃ kṛto loka-bhramāpahaḥ
analyzed: praśnaḥ tvayā mahā ṛṣe yam kṛtaḥ loka bhrama apahaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.006/3 nārāyaṇa-kathā yatra gītā kali-malāpahā
analyzed: nārāyaṇa kathā yatra gītā kali mala apahā

original: BhP_12.08.007/1 prāpta-dvijāti-saṃskāro mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pituḥ kramāt
analyzed: prāpta dvijāti saṃskāraḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pituḥ kramāt

original: BhP_12.08.007/3 chandāṃsy adhītya dharmeṇa tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: chandāṃsi adhītya dharmeṇa tapaḥ svādhyāya saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.008/1 bṛhad-vrata-dharaḥ śānto jaṭilo valkalāmbaraḥ
BhP_12.08.008/3 bibhrat kamaṇḍaluṃ daṇḍam upavītaṃ sa-mekhalam
analyzed: bibhrat kamaṇḍalum daṇḍam upavītam sa mekhalam

original: BhP_12.08.009/1 kṛṣṇājinaṃ sākṣa-sūtraṃ kuśāṃś ca niyamarddhaye
analyzed: kṛṣṇājinam sa akṣasūtram kuśān ca niyama ṛddhaye

original: BhP_12.08.009/3 agny-arka-guru-viprātmasv arcayan sandhyayor harim
analyzed: agni arka guru vipra ātmasu arcayan sandhyayoḥ harim

original: BhP_12.08.010/1 sāyaṃ prātaḥ sa gurave bhaikṣyam āhṛtya vāg-yataḥ
analyzed: sāyam prātar sa gurave bhaikṣyam āhṛtya vāgyataḥ

original: BhP_12.08.010/3 bubhuje gurv-anujñātaḥ sakṛn no ced upoṣitaḥ
analyzed: bubhuje guru anujñātaḥ sakṛt no ced upoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.011/1 evaṃ tapaḥ-svādhyāya-paro varṣāṇām ayutāyutam
analyzed: evam tapaḥ svādhyāya paraḥ varṣāṇām ayuta ayutam

original: BhP_12.08.011/3 ārādhayan hṛṣīkeśaṃ jigye mṛtyuṃ su-durjayam
analyzed: ārādhayan hṛṣīkeśam jigye mṛtyum su durjayam

original: BhP_12.08.012/1 brahmā bhṛgur bhavo dakṣo brahma-putrāś ca ye 'pare
analyzed: brahmā bhṛguḥ bhavaḥ dakṣaḥ brahma putrāḥ ca ye pare

original: BhP_12.08.012/3 nṛ-deva-pitṛ-bhūtāni tenāsann ati-vismitāḥ
analyzed: nṛ deva pitṛ bhūtāni tena āsan ati vismitāḥ

original: BhP_12.08.013/1 itthaṃ bṛhad-vrata-dharas tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: ittham bṛhat vrata dharaḥ tapaḥ svādhyāya saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_12.08.013/3 dadhyāv adhokṣajaṃ yogī dhvasta-kleśāntarātmanā
analyzed: dadhyau adhokṣajam yogī dhvasta kleśa antarātmanā

original: BhP_12.08.014/1 tasyaivaṃ yuñjataś cittaṃ mahā-yogena yoginaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam yuñjataḥ cittam mahā yogena yoginaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.014/3 vyatīyāya mahān kālo manvantara-ṣaḍ-ātmakaḥ
analyzed: vyatīyāya mahān kālaḥ manvantara ṣaṣ ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.015/1 etat purandaro jñātvā saptame 'smin kilāntare
analyzed: etat purandaraḥ jñātvā saptame smin kila antare

original: BhP_12.08.015/3 tapo-viśaṅkito brahmann ārebhe tad-vighātanam
analyzed: tapaḥ viśaṅkitaḥ brahman ārebhe tad vighātanam

original: BhP_12.08.016/1 gandharvāpsarasaḥ kāmaṃ vasanta-malayānilau
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ kāmam vasanta malaya anilau

original: BhP_12.08.016/3 munaye preṣayām āsa rajas-toka-madau tathā
analyzed: munaye preṣayām āsa rajaḥ stoka madau tathā

original: BhP_12.08.017/1 te vai tad-āśramaṃ jagmur himādreḥ pārśva uttare
analyzed: te vai tad āśramam jagmuḥ himādreḥ pārśve uttare

original: BhP_12.08.017/3 puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra citrākhyā ca śilā vibho
analyzed: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra citra ākhyā ca śilā vibho

original: BhP_12.08.018/1 tad-āśrama-padaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇya-druma-latāñcitam
analyzed: tad āśrama padam puṇyam puṇya druma latā āñcitam

original: BhP_12.08.018/3 puṇya-dvija-kulākīṛnaṃ puṇyāmala-jalāśayam
analyzed: puṇya dvija kulākīṛnam puṇya amala jalāśayam

original: BhP_12.08.019/1 matta-bhramara-saṅgītaṃ matta-kokila-kūjitam
analyzed: matta bhramara saṅgītam matta kokila kūjitam

original: BhP_12.08.019/3 matta-barhi-naṭāṭopaṃ matta-dvija-kulākulam
analyzed: matta barhi naṭa āṭopam matta dvija kula ākulam

original: BhP_12.08.020/1 vāyuḥ praviṣṭa ādāya hima-nirjhara-śīkarān
analyzed: vāyuḥ praviṣṭaḥ ādāya hima nirjhara śīkarān

original: BhP_12.08.020/3 sumanobhiḥ pariṣvakto vavāv uttambhayan smaram
analyzed: sumanobhiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ vavau uttambhayan smaram

original: BhP_12.08.021/1 udyac-candra-niśā-vaktraḥ pravāla-stabakālibhiḥ
analyzed: udyat candra niśā vaktraḥ pravāla stabaka ālibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.08.021/3 gopa-druma-latā-jālais tatrāsīt kusumākaraḥ
analyzed: gopa druma latā jālaiḥ tatra āsīt kusumākaraḥ

original: BhP_12.08.022/1 anvīyamāno gandharvair gīta-vāditra-yūthakaiḥ
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ gīta vāditra yūthakaiḥ

original: BhP_12.08.022/3 adṛśyatātta-cāpeṣuḥ svaḥ-strī-yūtha-patiḥ smaraḥ
analyzed: adṛśyata ātta cāpa iṣuḥ svar strī yūtha patiḥ smaraḥ

original: BhP_12.08.023/1 hutvāgniṃ samupāsīnaṃ dadṛśuḥ śakra-kiṅkarāḥ
analyzed: hutvā agnim samupāsīnam dadṛśuḥ śakra kiṅkarāḥ

original: BhP_12.08.023/3 mīlitākṣaṃ durādharṣaṃ mūrtimantam ivānalam
analyzed: mīlita akṣam durādharṣam mūrtimantam iva analam

original: BhP_12.08.024/1 nanṛtus tasya purataḥ striyo 'tho gāyakā jaguḥ
analyzed: nanṛtuḥ tasya puratas striyaḥ thaḥ gāyakāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_12.08.024/3 mṛdaṅga-vīṇā-paṇavair vādyaṃ cakrur mano-ramam
analyzed: mṛdaṅga vīṇā paṇavaiḥ vādyam cakruḥ manoramam

original: BhP_12.08.025/1 sandadhe 'straṃ sva-dhanuṣi kāmaḥ pañca-mukhaṃ tadā
analyzed: sandadhe stram sva dhanuṣi kāmaḥ pañcamukham tadā

original: BhP_12.08.025/3 madhur mano rajas-toka indra-bhṛtyā vyakampayan
analyzed: madhuḥ manaḥ rajaḥ stokaḥ indra bhṛtyāḥ vyakampayan

original: BhP_12.08.026/1 krīḍantyāḥ puñjikasthalyāḥ kandukaiḥ stana-gauravāt
analyzed: krīḍantyāḥ puñjika sthalyāḥ kandukaiḥ stana gauravāt

original: BhP_12.08.026/3 bhṛśam udvigna-madhyāyāḥ keśa-visraṃsita-srajaḥ
analyzed: bhṛśam udvigna madhyāyāḥ keśa visraṃsita srajaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.027/1 itas tato bhramad-dṛṣṭeś calantyā anu kandukam
analyzed: itas tatas bhramat dṛṣṭeḥ calantyāḥ anu kandukam

original: BhP_12.08.027/3 vāyur jahāra tad-vāsaḥ sūkṣmaṃ truṭita-mekhalam
analyzed: vāyuḥ jahāra tat vāsaḥ sūkṣmam truṭita mekhalam

original: BhP_12.08.028/1 visasarja tadā bāṇaṃ matvā taṃ sva-jitaṃ smaraḥ
analyzed: visasarja tadā bāṇam matvā tam sva jitam smaraḥ

original: BhP_12.08.028/3 sarvaṃ tatrābhavan mogham anīśasya yathodyamaḥ
analyzed: sarvam tatra abhavat mogham anīśasya yathā udyamaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.029/1 ta ittham apakurvanto munes tat-tejasā mune
analyzed: te ittham apakurvantaḥ muneḥ tad tejasā mune

original: BhP_12.08.029/3 dahyamānā nivavṛtuḥ prabodhyāhim ivārbhakāḥ
analyzed: dahyamānāḥ nivavṛtuḥ prabodhya ahim iva arbhakāḥ

original: BhP_12.08.030/1 itīndrānucarair brahman dharṣito 'pi mahā-muniḥ
analyzed: iti indra anucaraiḥ brahman dharṣitaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_12.08.030/3 yan nāgād ahamo bhāvaṃ na tac citraṃ mahatsu hi
analyzed: yat na agāt ahamaḥ bhāvam na tat citram mahatsu hi

original: BhP_12.08.031/1 dṛṣṭvā nistejasaṃ kāmaṃ sa-gaṇaṃ bhagavān svarāṭ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā nistejasam kāmam sa gaṇam bhagavān svarāj

original: BhP_12.08.031/3 śrutvānubhāvaṃ brahmarṣer vismayaṃ samagāt param
analyzed: śrutvā anubhāvam brahmarṣeḥ vismayam samagāt param

original: BhP_12.08.032/1 tasyaivaṃ yuñjataś cittaṃ tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: tasya evam yuñjataḥ cittam tapaḥ svādhyāya saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_12.08.032/3 anugrahāyāvirāsīn nara-nārāyaṇo hariḥ
analyzed: anugrahāya āvirāsīt naranārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_12.08.033/1 tau śukla-kṛṣṇau nava-kañja-locanau
analyzed: tau śukla kṛṣṇau nava kañja locanau

original: BhP_12.08.033/2 catur-bhujau raurava-valkalāmbarau
analyzed: catur bhujau raurava valkala ambarau

original: BhP_12.08.033/3 pavitra-pāṇī upavītakaṃ tri-vṛt
analyzed: pavitra pāṇī upavītakam trivṛt

original: BhP_12.08.033/4 kamaṇḍaluṃ daṇḍam ṛjuṃ ca vaiṇavam
analyzed: kamaṇḍalum daṇḍam ṛjum ca vaiṇavam

original: BhP_12.08.034/1 padmākṣa-mālām uta jantu-mārjanaṃ
analyzed: padma akṣa mālām uta jantu mārjanam

original: BhP_12.08.034/2 vedaṃ ca sākṣāt tapa eva rūpiṇau
analyzed: vedam ca sākṣāt tapaḥ eva rūpiṇau

original: BhP_12.08.034/3 tapat-taḍid-varṇa-piśaṅga-rociṣā
analyzed: tapat taḍit varṇa piśaṅga rociṣā

original: BhP_12.08.034/4 prāṃśū dadhānau vibudharṣabhārcitau
analyzed: prāṃśū dadhānau vibudha ṛṣabha arcitau

original: BhP_12.08.035/1 te vai bhagavato rūpe nara-nārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
analyzed: te vai bhagavataḥ rūpe nara nārāyaṇau ṛṣī

original: BhP_12.08.035/3 dṛṣṭvotthāyādareṇoccair nanāmāṅgena daṇḍa-vat
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā utthāya ādareṇa uccais nanāma aṅgena daṇḍa vat

original: BhP_12.08.036/1 sa tat-sandarśanānanda- nirvṛtātmendriyāśayaḥ
analyzed: sa tad sandarśana ānanda nirvṛta ātma indriya āśayaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.036/3 hṛṣṭa-romāśru-pūrṇākṣo na sehe tāv udīkṣitum
analyzed: hṛṣṭa roma aśru pūrṇa akṣaḥ na sehe tau udīkṣitum

original: BhP_12.08.037/1 utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahva autsukyād āśliṣann iva
analyzed: utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ autsukyāt āśliṣan iva

original: BhP_12.08.037/3 namo nama itīśānau babhāśe gadgadākṣaram
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ iti īśānau babhāśe gadgada akṣaram

original: BhP_12.08.038/1 tayor āsanam ādāya pādayor avanijya ca
analyzed: tayoḥ āsanam ādāya pādayoḥ avanijya ca

original: BhP_12.08.038/3 arhaṇenānulepena dhūpa-mālyair apūjayat
analyzed: arhaṇena anulepena dhūpa mālyaiḥ apūjayat

original: BhP_12.08.039/1 sukham āsanam āsīnau prasādābhimukhau munī
analyzed: sukham āsanam āsīnau prasāda abhimukhau munī

original: BhP_12.08.039/3 punar ānamya pādābhyāṃ gariṣṭhāv idam abravīt
analyzed: punar ānamya pādābhyām gariṣṭhau idam abravīt

original: BhP_12.08.040/0 śrī-mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.08.040/1 kiṃ varṇaye tava vibho yad-udīrito 'suḥ
analyzed: kim varṇaye tava vibho suḥ

original: BhP_12.08.040/2 saṃspandate tam anu vāṅ-mana-indriyāṇi
analyzed: saṃspandate tam anu vāc manā indriyāṇi

original: BhP_12.08.040/3 spandanti vai tanu-bhṛtām aja-śarvayoś ca
analyzed: spandanti vai tanubhṛtām aja śarvayoḥ ca

original: BhP_12.08.040/4 svasyāpy athāpi bhajatām asi bhāva-bandhuḥ
analyzed: svasya api atha api bhajatām asi bhāva bandhuḥ

original: BhP_12.08.041/1 mūrtī ime bhagavato bhagavaṃs tri-lokyāḥ
analyzed: mūrtī ime bhagavataḥ bhagavan trilokyāḥ

original: BhP_12.08.041/2 kṣemāya tāpa-viramāya ca mṛtyu-jityai
analyzed: kṣemāya tāpa viramāya ca mṛtyu jityai

original: BhP_12.08.041/3 nānā bibharṣy avitum anya-tanūr yathedaṃ
analyzed: nānā bibharṣi avitum anya tanūḥ yathā idam

original: BhP_12.08.041/4 sṛṣṭvā punar grasasi sarvam ivorṇanābhiḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā punar grasasi sarvam iva ūrṇanābhiḥ

original: BhP_12.08.042/1 tasyāvituḥ sthira-careśitur aṅghri-mūlaṃ
analyzed: tasya avituḥ sthira cara īśituḥ aṅghri mūlam

original: BhP_12.08.042/2 yat-sthaṃ na karma-guṇa-kāla-rajaḥ spṛśanti
analyzed: yad stham na karma guṇa kāla rajaḥ spṛśanti

original: BhP_12.08.042/3 yad vai stuvanti ninamanti yajanty abhīkṣṇaṃ
analyzed: yat vai stuvanti ninamanti yajanti abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_12.08.042/4 dhyāyanti veda-hṛdayā munayas tad-āptyai
analyzed: dhyāyanti veda hṛdayāḥ munayaḥ tad āptyai

original: BhP_12.08.043/1 nānyaṃ tavāṅghry-upanayād apavarga-mūrteḥ
analyzed: na anyam tava aṅghri upanayāt apavarga mūrteḥ

original: BhP_12.08.043/2 kṣemaṃ janasya parito-bhiya īśa vidmaḥ
analyzed: kṣemam janasya paritobhiyaḥ īśa vidmaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.043/3 brahmā bibhety alam ato dvi-parārdha-dhiṣṇyaḥ
analyzed: brahmā bibheti alam atas dvi parārdha dhiṣṇyaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.043/4 kālasya te kim uta tat-kṛta-bhautikānām
analyzed: kālasya te kim uta tad kṛta bhautikānām

original: BhP_12.08.044/1 tad vai bhajāmy ṛta-dhiyas tava pāda-mūlaṃ
analyzed: tat vai bhajāmi ṛta dhiyaḥ tava pāda mūlam

original: BhP_12.08.044/2 hitvedam ātma-cchadi cātma-guroḥ parasya
analyzed: hitvā idam ātma chadi ca ātma guroḥ parasya

original: BhP_12.08.044/3 dehādy apārtham asad antyam abhijña-mātraṃ
analyzed: deha ādi apārtham asat antyam abhijña mātram

original: BhP_12.08.044/4 vindeta te tarhi sarva-manīṣitārtham
analyzed: vindeta te tarhi sarva manīṣita artham

original: BhP_12.08.045/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama itīśa tavātma-bandho
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti īśa tava ātmabandho

original: BhP_12.08.045/2 māyā-mayāḥ sthiti-layodaya-hetavo 'sya
analyzed: māyā mayāḥ sthiti laya udaya hetavaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.045/3 līlā dhṛtā yad api sattva-mayī praśāntyai
analyzed: līlā dhṛtā yat api sattva mayī praśāntyai

original: BhP_12.08.045/4 nānye nṛṇāṃ vyasana-moha-bhiyaś ca yābhyām
analyzed: na anye nṛṇām vyasana moha bhiyaḥ ca yābhyām

original: BhP_12.08.046/1 tasmāt taveha bhagavann atha tāvakānāṃ
analyzed: tasmāt tava iha bhagavan atha tāvakānām

original: BhP_12.08.046/2 śuklāṃ tanuṃ sva-dayitāṃ kuśalā bhajanti
analyzed: śuklām tanum sva dayitām kuśalāḥ bhajanti

original: BhP_12.08.046/3 yat sātvatāḥ puruṣa-rūpam uśanti sattvaṃ
analyzed: yat sātvatāḥ puruṣa rūpam uśanti sattvam

original: BhP_12.08.046/4 loko yato 'bhayam utātma-sukhaṃ na cānyat
analyzed: lokaḥ yatas bhayam uta ātma sukham na ca anyat

original: BhP_12.08.047/1 tasmai namo bhagavate puruṣāya bhūmne
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate puruṣāya bhūmne

original: BhP_12.08.047/2 viśvāya viśva-gurave para-daivatāya
analyzed: viśvāya viśva gurave para daivatāya

original: BhP_12.08.047/3 nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye ca narottamāya
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye ca narottamāya

original: BhP_12.08.047/4 haṃsāya saṃyata-gire nigameśvarāya
analyzed: haṃsāya saṃyata gire nigama īśvarāya

original: BhP_12.08.048/1 yaṃ vai na veda vitathākṣa-pathair bhramad-dhīḥ
analyzed: yam vai na veda vitatha akṣa pathaiḥ bhramat dhīḥ

original: BhP_12.08.048/2 santaṃ svakeṣv asuṣu hṛdy api dṛk-patheṣu
analyzed: santam svakeṣu asuṣu hṛdi api dṛkpatheṣu

original: BhP_12.08.048/3 tan-māyayāvṛta-matiḥ sa u eva sākṣād
analyzed: tad māyayā āvṛta matiḥ saḥ u eva sākṣāt

original: BhP_12.08.048/4 ādyas tavākhila-guror upasādya vedam
analyzed: ādyaḥ tava akhila guroḥ upasādya vedam

original: BhP_12.08.049/1 yad-darśanaṃ nigama ātma-rahaḥ-prakāśaṃ
analyzed: yat darśanam nigamaḥ ātma rahaḥ prakāśam

original: BhP_12.08.049/2 muhyanti yatra kavayo 'ja-parā yatantaḥ
analyzed: muhyanti yatra kavayaḥ japarāḥ yatantaḥ

original: BhP_12.08.049/3 taṃ sarva-vāda-viṣaya-pratirūpa-śīlaṃ
analyzed: tam sarva vāda viṣaya pratirūpa śīlam

original: BhP_12.08.049/4 vande mahā-puruṣam ātma-nigūḍha-bodham
analyzed: vande mahāpuruṣam ātma nigūḍha bodham

original: BhP_12.09.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.09.001/1 saṃstuto bhagavān itthaṃ mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā
analyzed: saṃstutaḥ bhagavān ittham mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā

original: BhP_12.09.001/3 nārāyaṇo nara-sakhaḥ prīta āha bhṛgūdvaham
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ nara sakhaḥ prītaḥ āha bhṛgu udvaham

original: BhP_12.09.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_12.09.002/1 bho bho brahmarṣi-varyo 'si siddha ātma-samādhinā
analyzed: bho bho brahmarṣi varyo si siddhaḥ ātma samādhinā

original: BhP_12.09.002/3 mayi bhaktyānapāyinyā tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: mayi bhaktyā anapāyinyā tapaḥ svādhyāya saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_12.09.003/1 vayaṃ te parituṣṭāḥ sma tvad-bṛhad-vrata-caryayā
analyzed: vayam te parituṣṭāḥ sma tvad bṛhat vrata caryayā

original: BhP_12.09.003/3 varaṃ pratīccha bhadraṃ te vara-do 'smi tvad-īpsitam
analyzed: varam pratīccha bhadram te vara do smi tvad īpsitam

original: BhP_12.09.004/0 śrī-ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.09.004/1 jitaṃ te deva-deveśa prapannārti-harācyuta
analyzed: jitam te devadeveśa prapanna ārti hara acyuta

original: BhP_12.09.004/3 vareṇaitāvatālaṃ no yad bhavān samadṛśyata
analyzed: vareṇa etāvatā alam naḥ yat bhavān samadṛśyata

original: BhP_12.09.005/1 gṛhītvājādayo yasya śrīmat-pādābja-darśanam
analyzed: gṛhītvā aja ādayaḥ yasya śrīmat pāda abja darśanam

original: BhP_12.09.005/3 manasā yoga-pakvena sa bhavān me 'kṣi-gocaraḥ
analyzed: manasā yoga pakvena sa bhavān me kṣi gocaraḥ

original: BhP_12.09.006/1 athāpy ambuja-patrākṣa puṇya-śloka-śikhāmaṇe
analyzed: athā api ambuja patra akṣa puṇyaśloka śikhāmaṇe

original: BhP_12.09.006/3 drakṣye māyāṃ yayā lokaḥ sa-pālo veda sad-bhidām
analyzed: drakṣye māyām yayā lokaḥ sa pālaḥ veda sat bhidām

original: BhP_12.09.007/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.09.007/1 itīḍito 'rcitaḥ kāmam ṛṣiṇā bhagavān mune
analyzed: iti īḍitaḥ rcitaḥ kāmam ṛṣiṇā bhagavān mune

original: BhP_12.09.007/3 tatheti sa smayan prāgād badary-āśramam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: tathā iti sa smayan prāgāt badaryāśramam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.09.008/1 tam eva cintayann artham ṛṣiḥ svāśrama eva saḥ
analyzed: tam eva cintayan artham ṛṣiḥ sva āśrame eva saḥ

original: BhP_12.09.008/3 vasann agny-arka-somāmbu- bhū-vāyu-viyad-ātmasu
analyzed: vasan agni arka soma ambu bhū vāyu viyat ātmasu

original: BhP_12.09.009/1 dhyāyan sarvatra ca hariṃ bhāva-dravyair apūjayat
analyzed: dhyāyan sarvatra ca harim bhāva dravyaiḥ apūjayat

original: BhP_12.09.009/3 kvacit pūjāṃ visasmāra prema-prasara-samplutaḥ
analyzed: kvacid pūjām visasmāra prema prasara samplutaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.010/1 tasyaikadā bhṛgu-śreṣṭha puṣpabhadrā-taṭe muneḥ
analyzed: tasya ekadā bhṛgu śreṣṭha puṣpabhadrā taṭe muneḥ

original: BhP_12.09.010/3 upāsīnasya sandhyāyāṃ brahman vāyur abhūn mahān
analyzed: upāsīnasya sandhyāyām brahman vāyuḥ abhūt mahān

original: BhP_12.09.011/1 taṃ caṇḍa-śabdaṃ samudīrayantaṃ balāhakā anv abhavan karālāḥ
analyzed: tam caṇḍa śabdam samudīrayantam balāhakāḥ anu abhavan karālāḥ

original: BhP_12.09.011/3 akṣa-sthaviṣṭhā mumucus taḍidbhiḥ svananta uccair abhi varṣa-dhārāḥ
analyzed: akṣa sthaviṣṭhāḥ mumucuḥ taḍidbhiḥ svanantaḥ uccais abhi varṣa dhārāḥ

original: BhP_12.09.012/1 tato vyadṛśyanta catuḥ samudrāḥ samantataḥ kṣmā-talam āgrasantaḥ
analyzed: tatas vyadṛśyanta catuḥ samudrāḥ samantataḥ kṣmā talam āgrasantaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.012/3 samīra-vegormibhir ugra-nakra- mahā-bhayāvarta-gabhīra-ghoṣāḥ
analyzed: samīra vega ūrmibhiḥ ugra nakra mahā bhaya āvarta gabhīra ghoṣāḥ

original: BhP_12.09.013/1 antar bahiś cādbhir ati-dyubhiḥ kharaiḥ
analyzed: antar bahis ca adbhiḥ atidyubhiḥ kharaiḥ

original: BhP_12.09.013/2 śatahradābhir upatāpitaṃ jagat
analyzed: śatahradābhiḥ upatāpitam jagat

original: BhP_12.09.013/3 catur-vidhaṃ vīkṣya sahātmanā munir
analyzed: caturvidham vīkṣya saha ātmanā muniḥ

original: BhP_12.09.013/4 jalāplutāṃ kṣmāṃ vimanāḥ samatrasat
analyzed: jala āplutām kṣmām vimanāḥ samatrasat

original: BhP_12.09.014/1 tasyaivam udvīkṣata ūrmi-bhīṣaṇaḥ prabhañjanāghūrṇita-vār mahārṇavaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam udvīkṣataḥ ūrmi bhīṣaṇaḥ prabhañjana āghūrṇita vāḥ mahā arṇavaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.014/3 āpūryamāṇo varaṣadbhir ambudaiḥ kṣmām apyadhād dvīpa-varṣādribhiḥ samam
analyzed: āpūryamāṇaḥ ambudaiḥ kṣmām apyadhāt dvīpa varṣa adribhiḥ samam

original: BhP_12.09.015/1 sa-kṣmāntarikṣaṃ sa-divaṃ sa-bhā-gaṇaṃ
analyzed: sakṣma antarikṣam sa divam sabhā gaṇam

original: BhP_12.09.015/2 trai-lokyam āsīt saha digbhir āplutam
analyzed: trailokyam āsīt saha digbhiḥ āplutam

original: BhP_12.09.015/3 sa eka evorvarito mahā-munir
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ eva urvaritaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_12.09.015/4 babhrāma vikṣipya jaṭā jaḍāndha-vat
analyzed: babhrāma vikṣipya jaṭāḥ jaḍa andha vat

original: BhP_12.09.016/1 kṣut-tṛṭ-parīto makarais timiṅgilair
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ parītaḥ makaraiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ

original: BhP_12.09.016/2 upadruto vīci-nabhasvatāhataḥ
analyzed: upadrutaḥ vīci nabhasvatā āhataḥ

original: BhP_12.09.016/3 tamasy apāre patito bhraman diśo
analyzed: tamasi apāre patitaḥ bhraman diśaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.016/4 na veda khaṃ gāṃ ca pariśrameṣitaḥ
analyzed: na veda kham gām ca pariśrama iṣitaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.017/1 kracin magno mahāvarte taralais tāḍitaḥ kvacit
analyzed: kracid magnaḥ mahā āvarte taralaiḥ tāḍitaḥ kvacid

original: BhP_12.09.017/3 yādobhir bhakṣyate kvāpi svayam anyonya-ghātibhiḥ
analyzed: yādobhiḥ bhakṣyate kvāpi svayam anyonya ghātibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.09.018/1 kvacic chokaṃ kvacin mohaṃ kvacid duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ bhayam
analyzed: kvacid śokam kvacid moham kvacid duḥkham sukham bhayam

original: BhP_12.09.018/3 kvacin mṛtyum avāpnoti vyādhy-ādibhir utārditaḥ
analyzed: kvacid mṛtyum avāpnoti vyādhi ādibhiḥ uta arditaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.019/1 ayutāyata-varṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
analyzed: ayuta āyata varṣāṇām sahasrāṇi śatāni ca

original: BhP_12.09.019/3 vyatīyur bhramatas tasmin viṣṇu-māyāvṛtātmanaḥ
analyzed: vyatīyuḥ bhramataḥ tasmin viṣṇu māyā vṛta ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.020/1 sa kadācid bhramaṃs tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi dvijaḥ
analyzed: sa kadācid bhraman tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi dvijaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.020/3 nyāgrodha-potaṃ dadṛśe phala-pallava-śobhitam
analyzed: nyāgrodha potam dadṛśe phala pallava śobhitam

original: BhP_12.09.021/1 prāg-uttarasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ tasyāpi dadṛśe śiśum
analyzed: prāguttarasyām śākhāyām tasya api dadṛśe śiśum

original: BhP_12.09.021/3 śayānaṃ parṇa-puṭake grasantaṃ prabhayā tamaḥ
analyzed: śayānam parṇa puṭake grasantam prabhayā tamaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.022/1 mahā-marakata-śyāmaṃ śrīmad-vadana-paṅkajam
BhP_12.09.022/3 kambu-grīvaṃ mahoraskaṃ su-nasaṃ sundara-bhruvam
analyzed: kambu grīvam mahā uraskam su nasam sundara bhruvam

original: BhP_12.09.023/1 śvāsaijad-alakābhātaṃ kambu-śrī-karṇa-dāḍimam
BhP_12.09.023/3 vidrumādhara-bhāseṣac- choṇāyita-sudhā-smitam
analyzed: vidruma adhara bhāsā īṣat śoṇāyita sudhā smitam

original: BhP_12.09.024/1 padma-garbhāruṇāpāṅgaṃ hṛdya-hāsāvalokanam
BhP_12.09.024/3 śvāsaijad-vali-saṃvigna- nimna-nābhi-dalodaram
BhP_12.09.025/1 cārv-aṅgulibhyāṃ pāṇibhyām unnīya caraṇāmbujam
analyzed: cāru aṅgulibhyām pāṇibhyām unnīya caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_12.09.025/3 mukhe nidhāya viprendro dhayantaṃ vīkṣya vismitaḥ
analyzed: mukhe nidhāya vipra indraḥ dhayantam vīkṣya vismitaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.026/1 tad-darśanād vīta-pariśramo mudā protphulla-hṛt-paulma-vilocanāmbujaḥ
analyzed: tad darśanāt vīta pariśramaḥ mudā protphulla hṛd paulma vilocana ambujaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.026/3 prahṛṣṭa-romādbhuta-bhāva-śaṅkitaḥ praṣṭuṃ puras taṃ prasasāra bālakam
analyzed: prahṛṣṭa roma adbhuta bhāva śaṅkitaḥ praṣṭum puras tam prasasāra bālakam

original: BhP_12.09.027/1 tāvac chiśor vai śvasitena bhārgavaḥ
analyzed: tāvat śiśoḥ vai śvasitena bhārgavaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.027/2 so 'ntaḥ śarīraṃ maśako yathāviśat
analyzed: saḥ ntar śarīram maśakaḥ yathā āviśat

original: BhP_12.09.027/3 tatrāpy ado nyastam acaṣṭa kṛtsnaśo
analyzed: tatra api adaḥ nyastam acaṣṭa kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_12.09.027/4 yathā purāmuhyad atīva vismitaḥ
analyzed: yathā purā amuhyat atīva vismitaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.028/1 khaṃ rodasī bhā-gaṇān adri-sāgarān dvīpān sa-varṣān kakubhaḥ surāsurān
analyzed: kham rodasī bhāgaṇān adri sāgarān dvīpān sa varṣān kakubhaḥ sura asurān

original: BhP_12.09.028/3 vanāni deśān saritaḥ purākarān kheṭān vrajān āśrama-varṇa-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: vanāni deśān saritaḥ pura ākarān kheṭān vrajān āśrama varṇa vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.029/1 mahānti bhūtāny atha bhautikāny asau kālaṃ ca nānā-yuga-kalpa-kalpanam
analyzed: mahānti bhūtāni atha bhautikāni asau kālam ca nānā yuga kalpa kalpanam

original: BhP_12.09.029/3 yat kiñcid anyad vyavahāra-kāraṇaṃ dadarśa viśvaṃ sad ivāvabhāsitam
analyzed: yat kiñcid anyat vyavahāra kāraṇam dadarśa viśvam sat iva avabhāsitam

original: BhP_12.09.030/1 himālayaṃ puṣpavahāṃ ca tāṃ nadīṃ nijāśramaṃ yatra ṛṣī apaśyata
analyzed: himālayam puṣpa vahām ca tām nadīm nija āśramam yatra ṛṣī apaśyata

original: BhP_12.09.030/3 viśvaṃ vipaśyañ chvasitāc chiśor vai bahir nirasto nyapatal layābdhau
analyzed: viśvam vipaśyam śvasitāt śiśoḥ vai bahis nirastaḥ nyapatat laya abdhau

original: BhP_12.09.031/1 tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi prarūḍhaṃ vaṭaṃ ca tat-parṇa-puṭe śayānam
analyzed: tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi prarūḍham vaṭam ca tad parṇa puṭe śayānam

original: BhP_12.09.031/3 tokaṃ ca tat-prema-sudhā-smitena nirīkṣito 'pāṅga-nirīkṣaṇena
analyzed: tokam ca tad prema sudhā smitena upāṅga nirīkṣaṇena

original: BhP_12.09.032/1 atha taṃ bālakaṃ vīkṣya netrābhyāṃ dhiṣṭhitaṃ hṛdi
analyzed: atha tam bālakam vīkṣya netrābhyām dhiṣṭhitam hṛdi

original: BhP_12.09.032/3 abhyayād ati-saṅkliṣṭaḥ pariṣvaktum adhokṣajam
analyzed: abhyayāt ati saṅkliṣṭaḥ pariṣvaktum adhokṣajam

original: BhP_12.09.033/1 tāvat sa bhagavān sākṣād yogādhīśo guhā-śayaḥ
analyzed: tāvat sa bhagavān sākṣāt yoga adhīśaḥ guhā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.033/3 antardadha ṛṣeḥ sadyo yathehānīśa-nirmitā
analyzed: antardadhe ṛṣeḥ sadyas yathā iha anīśa nirmitā

original: BhP_12.09.034/1 tam anv atha vaṭo brahman salilaṃ loka-samplavaḥ
analyzed: tam anu atha vaṭaḥ brahman salilam loka samplavaḥ

original: BhP_12.09.034/3 tirodhāyi kṣaṇād asya svāśrame pūrva-vat sthitaḥ
analyzed: tirodhāyi kṣaṇāt asya sva āśrame pūrva vat sthitaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.001/1 sa evam anubhūyedaṃ nārāyaṇa-vinirmitam
analyzed: saḥ evam anubhūya idam nārāyaṇa vinirmitam

original: BhP_12.10.001/3 vaibhavaṃ yoga-māyāyās tam eva śaraṇaṃ yayau
analyzed: vaibhavam yoga māyāyāḥ tam eva śaraṇam yayau

original: BhP_12.10.002/0 śrī-mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.002/1 prapanno 'smy aṅghri-mūlaṃ te prapannābhaya-daṃ hare
analyzed: prapannā smi aṅghri mūlam te prapannā abhaya dam hare

original: BhP_12.10.002/3 yan-māyayāpi vibudhā muhyanti jñāna-kāśayā
analyzed: yad māyayā api vibudhāḥ muhyanti jñāna kāśayā

original: BhP_12.10.003/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.003/1 tam evaṃ nibhṛtātmānaṃ vṛṣeṇa divi paryaṭan
analyzed: tam evam nibhṛta ātmānam vṛṣeṇa divi paryaṭan

original: BhP_12.10.003/3 rudrāṇyā bhagavān rudro dadarśa sva-gaṇair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: rudrāṇyā bhagavān rudraḥ dadarśa sva gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.004/1 athomā tam ṛṣiṃ vīkṣya giriśaṃ samabhāṣata
analyzed: atha umā tam ṛṣim vīkṣya giriśam samabhāṣata

original: BhP_12.10.004/3 paśyemaṃ bhagavan vipraṃ nibhṛtātmendriyāśayam
analyzed: paśya imam bhagavan vipram nibhṛta ātma indriya āśayam

original: BhP_12.10.005/1 nibhṛtoda-jhaṣa-vrāto vātāpāye yathārṇavaḥ
analyzed: nibhṛta uda jhaṣa vrātaḥ vāta apāye yathā arṇavaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.005/3 kurv asya tapasaḥ sākṣāt saṃsiddhiṃ siddhi-do bhavān
analyzed: kuru asya tapasaḥ sākṣāt saṃsiddhim siddhi daḥ bhavān

original: BhP_12.10.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.006/1 naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta
analyzed: na eva icchati āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣiḥ mokṣam api uta

original: BhP_12.10.006/3 bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye
analyzed: bhaktim parām bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe vyaye

original: BhP_12.10.007/1 athāpi saṃvadiṣyāmo bhavāny etena sādhunā
analyzed: atha api saṃvadiṣyāmaḥ bhavāni etena sādhunā

original: BhP_12.10.007/3 ayaṃ hi paramo lābho nṛṇāṃ sādhu-samāgamaḥ
analyzed: ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ nṛṇām sādhu samāgamaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.008/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.008/1 ity uktvā tam upeyāya bhagavān sa satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā tam upeyāya bhagavān sa satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.008/3 īśānaḥ sarva-vidyānām īśvaraḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: īśānaḥ sarva vidyānām īśvaraḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_12.10.009/1 tayor āgamanaṃ sākṣād īśayor jagad-ātmanoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ āgamanam sākṣāt īśayoḥ jagadātmanoḥ

original: BhP_12.10.009/3 na veda ruddha-dhī-vṛttir ātmānaṃ viśvam eva ca
analyzed: na veda ruddha dhī vṛttiḥ ātmānam viśvam eva ca

original: BhP_12.10.010/1 bhagavāṃs tad abhijñāya giriśo yoga-māyayā
analyzed: bhagavān tat abhijñāya giriśaḥ yoga māyayā

original: BhP_12.10.010/3 āviśat tad-guhākāśaṃ vāyuś chidram iveśvaraḥ
analyzed: āviśat tat guhā ākāśam vāyuḥ chidram iva īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.10.011/1 ātmany api śivaṃ prāptaṃ taḍit-piṅga-jaṭā-dharam
analyzed: ātmani api śivam prāptam taḍit piṅga jaṭā dharam

original: BhP_12.10.011/3 try-akṣaṃ daśa-bhujaṃ prāṃśum udyantam iva bhāskaram
analyzed: tri akṣam daśa bhujam prāṃśum udyantam iva bhāskaram

original: BhP_12.10.012/1 vyāghra-carmāmbaraṃ śūla- dhanur-iṣv-asi-carmabhiḥ
analyzed: vyāghra carma ambaram śūla dhanuḥ iṣu asi carmabhiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.012/3 akṣa-mālā-ḍamaruka- kapālaṃ paraśuṃ saha
analyzed: akṣamālā ḍamaruka kapālam paraśum saha

original: BhP_12.10.013/1 bibhrāṇaṃ sahasā bhātaṃ vicakṣya hṛdi vismitaḥ
analyzed: bibhrāṇam sahasā bhātam vicakṣya hṛdi vismitaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.013/3 kim idaṃ kuta eveti samādher virato muniḥ
analyzed: kim idam kutas evā iti samādheḥ virataḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_12.10.014/1 netre unmīlya dadṛśe sa-gaṇaṃ somayāgatam
analyzed: netre unmīlya dadṛśe sa gaṇam somayā āgatam

original: BhP_12.10.014/3 rudraṃ tri-lokaika-guruṃ nanāma śirasā muniḥ
analyzed: rudram triloka eka gurum nanāma śirasā muniḥ

original: BhP_12.10.015/1 tasmai saparyāṃ vyadadhāt sa-gaṇāya sahomayā
analyzed: tasmai saparyām vyadadhāt sa gaṇāya saha umayā

original: BhP_12.10.015/3 svāgatāsana-pādyārghya- gandha-srag-dhūpa-dīpakaiḥ
analyzed: svāgata āsana pādya arghya gandha sraj dhūpa dīpakaiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.016/1 āha tv ātmānubhāvena pūrṇa-kāmasya te vibho
analyzed: āha tu ātma anubhāvena pūrṇa kāmasya te vibho

original: BhP_12.10.016/3 karavāma kim īśāna yenedaṃ nirvṛtaṃ jagat
analyzed: karavāma kim īśāna yena idam nirvṛtam jagat

original: BhP_12.10.017/1 namaḥ śivāya śāntāya sattvāya pramṛḍāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya sattvāya pramṛḍāya ca

original: BhP_12.10.017/3 rajo-juṣe 'tha ghorāya namas tubhyaṃ tamo-juṣe

original: BhP_12.10.018/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.018/1 evaṃ stutaḥ sa bhagavān ādi-devaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.019/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.019/1 varaṃ vṛṇīṣva naḥ kāmaṃ vara-deśā vayaṃ trayaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.019/3 amoghaṃ darśanaṃ yeṣāṃ martyo yad vindate 'mṛtam

original: BhP_12.10.020/1 brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaḥ śāntā niḥsaṅgā bhūta-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaḥ śāntāḥ niḥsaṅgāḥ bhūta vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_12.10.020/3 ekānta-bhaktā asmāsu nirvairāḥ sama-darśinaḥ
analyzed: ekānta bhaktāḥ asmāsu nirvairāḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.021/1 sa-lokā loka-pālās tān vandanty arcanty upāsate
analyzed: sa lokāḥ lokapālāḥ tān vandanti arcanti upāsate

original: BhP_12.10.021/3 ahaṃ ca bhagavān brahmā svayaṃ ca harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: aham ca bhagavān brahmā svayam ca hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.10.022/1 na te mayy acyute 'je ca bhidām aṇv api cakṣate
analyzed: na te mayi acyute je ca bhidām aṇu api cakṣate

original: BhP_12.10.022/3 nātmanaś ca janasyāpi tad yuṣmān vayam īmahi
analyzed: na ātmanaḥ ca janasya api tat yuṣmān vayam īmahi

original: BhP_12.10.023/1 na hy am-mayāni tīrthāni na devāś cetanojjhitāḥ
analyzed: na hi am mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ cetanā ujjhitāḥ

original: BhP_12.10.023/3 te punanty uru-kālena yūyaṃ darśana-mātrataḥ
analyzed: te punanti uru kālena yūyam darśana mātrataḥ

original: BhP_12.10.024/1 brāhmaṇebhyo namasyāmo ye 'smad-rūpaṃ trayī-mayam

original: BhP_12.10.024/3 bibhraty ātma-samādhāna- tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.025/3 śudhyerann antya-jāś cāpi kim u sambhāṣaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: śudhyeran antyajāḥ ca api kim sambhāṣaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.10.026/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.026/1 iti candra-lalāmasya dharma-gahyopabṛṃhitam
analyzed: iti candralalāmasya dharma gahya upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_12.10.026/3 vaco 'mṛtāyanam ṛṣir nātṛpyat karṇayoḥ piban

original: BhP_12.10.027/1 sa ciraṃ māyayā viṣṇor bhrāmitaḥ karśito bhṛśam
analyzed: sa ciram māyayā viṣṇoḥ bhrāmitaḥ karśitaḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_12.10.027/3 śiva-vāg-amṛta-dhvasta- kleśa-puñjas tam abravīt

original: BhP_12.10.028/0 śrī-mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
analyzed: śrī mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.028/1 aho īśvara-līleyaṃ durvibhāvyā śarīriṇām

original: BhP_12.10.028/3 yan namantīśitavyāni stuvanti jagad-īśvarāḥ
analyzed: yat namanti īśitavyāni stuvanti jagat īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_12.10.030/3 na duṣyetānubhāvas tair māyinaḥ kuhakaṃ yathā

original: BhP_12.10.031/1 sṛṣṭvedaṃ manasā viśvam ātmanānupraviśya yaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.031/3 guṇaiḥ kurvadbhir ābhāti karteva svapna-dṛg yathā

original: BhP_12.10.033/3 yad-darśanāt pūrṇa-kāmaḥ satya-kāmaḥ pumān bhavet

original: BhP_12.10.034/3 bhagavaty acyutāṃ bhaktiṃ tat-pareṣu tathā tvayi
analyzed: bhagavati acyutām bhaktim tad pareṣu tathā tvayi

original: BhP_12.10.035/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

analyzed: tam āha bhagavān śarvaḥ śarvayā ca abhinanditaḥ

original: BhP_12.10.036/1 kāmo maharṣe sarvo 'yaṃ bhaktimāṃs tvam adhokṣaje

original: BhP_12.10.037/1 jñānaṃ trai-kālikaṃ brahman vijñānaṃ ca viraktimat
analyzed: jñānam traikālikam brahman vijñānam ca viraktimat

original: BhP_12.10.037/3 brahma-varcasvino bhūyāt purāṇācāryatāstu te

original: BhP_12.10.038/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.10.040/3 anubhūtaṃ bhagavato māyā-vaibhavam adbhutam
analyzed: anubhūtam bhagavataḥ māyā vaibhavam adbhutam

original: BhP_12.10.041/1 etat kecid avidvāṃso māyā-saṃsṛtir ātmanaḥ

analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca

analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

analyzed: namaskṛtya gurūn vakṣye vibhūtīḥ vaiṣṇavīḥ api

analyzed: prajāpatiḥ prajananam apānaḥ mṛtyuḥ īśituḥ

analyzed: tad bāhavaḥ lokapālāḥ manaḥ candraḥ bhruvau yamaḥ

BhP_12.11.008/3 romāṇi bhūruhā bhūmno meghāḥ puruṣa-mūrdhajāḥ
analyzed: romāṇi bhūruhāḥ bhūmnaḥ meghāḥ puruṣa mūrdhajāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.009/3 tāvān asāv api mahā- puruṣo loka-saṃsthayā
analyzed: tāvān asau api mahā puruṣaḥ loka saṃsthayā

original: BhP_12.11.010/1 kaustubha-vyapadeśena svātma-jyotir bibharty ajaḥ
analyzed: bibharti

analyzed: tad prabhā vyāpinī sākṣāt śrīvatsam urasā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_12.11.011/1 sva-māyāṃ vana-mālākhyāṃ nānā-guṇa-mayīṃ dadhat
analyzed: sva māyām vanamālā ākhyām nānā guṇa mayīm dadhat

original: BhP_12.11.011/3 vāsaś chando-mayaṃ pītaṃ brahma-sūtraṃ tri-vṛt svaram
analyzed: vāsaḥ chandaḥ mayam pītam brahmasūtram trivṛt svaram

original: BhP_12.11.012/1 bibharti sāṅkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca devo makara-kuṇḍale
analyzed: bibharti sāṅkhyam yogam ca devaḥ makara kuṇḍale

original: BhP_12.11.012/3 mauliṃ padaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ sarva-lokābhayaṅ-karam
analyzed: maulim padam pārameṣṭhyam sarva loka abhayaṅkaram

original: BhP_12.11.013/1 avyākṛtam anantākhyam āsanaṃ yad-adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.013/3 dharma-jñānādibhir yuktaṃ sattvaṃ padmam ihocyate
analyzed: iha ucyate

original: BhP_12.11.014/1 ojaḥ-saho-bala-yutaṃ mukhya-tattvaṃ gadāṃ dadhat
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ bala yutam mukhya tattvam gadām dadhat

original: BhP_12.11.014/3 apāṃ tattvaṃ dara-varaṃ tejas-tattvaṃ sudarśanam
analyzed: apām tattvam daravaram tejaḥ tattvam sudarśanam

original: BhP_12.11.015/1 nabho-nibhaṃ nabhas-tattvam asiṃ carma tamo-mayam
analyzed: nabhaḥ nibham nabhaḥ tattvam asim carma tamaḥ mayam

original: BhP_12.11.015/3 kāla-rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śārṅgaṃ tathā karma-mayeṣudhim
analyzed: kāla rūpam dhanuḥ śārṅgam tathā karma maya iṣudhim

original: BhP_12.11.016/1 indriyāṇi śarān āhur ākūtīr asya syandanam
analyzed: indriyāṇi śarān āhuḥ ākūtīḥ asya syandanam

original: BhP_12.11.016/3 tan-mātrāṇy asyābhivyaktiṃ mudrayārtha-kriyātmatām
BhP_12.11.017/1 maṇḍalaṃ deva-yajanaṃ dīkṣā saṃskāra ātmanaḥ
analyzed: maṇḍalam devayajanam dīkṣā saṃskāraḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.017/3 paricaryā bhagavata ātmano durita-kṣayaḥ
analyzed: paricaryā bhagavataḥ ātmanaḥ durita kṣayaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.018/1 bhagavān bhaga-śabdārthaṃ līlā-kamalam udvahan
BhP_12.11.018/3 dharmaṃ yaśaś ca bhagavāṃś cāmara-vyajane 'bhajat
analyzed: dharmam yaśaḥ ca bhagavān cāmara vyajane bhajat

original: BhP_12.11.019/1 ātapatraṃ tu vaikuṇṭhaṃ dvijā dhāmākuto-bhayam
analyzed: ātapatram tu vaikuṇṭham dvijāḥ dhāma akutobhayam

original: BhP_12.11.019/3 tri-vṛd vedaḥ suparṇākhyo yajñaṃ vahati pūruṣam
analyzed: trivṛt vedaḥ suparṇa ākhyaḥ yajñam vahati pūruṣam

original: BhP_12.11.020/1 anapāyinī bhagavatī śṛīḥ sākṣād ātmano hareḥ
analyzed: anapāyinī bhagavatī śṛīḥ sākṣāt ātmanaḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_12.11.020/3 viṣvakṣenas tantra-mūrtir viditaḥ pārṣadādhipaḥ
BhP_12.11.020/5 nandādayo 'ṣṭau dvāḥ-sthāś ca te 'ṇimādyā harer guṇāḥ
analyzed: nanda ādayaḥ ṣṭau dvāḥsthāḥ ca te ṇima ādyāḥ hareḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.021/1 vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam

original: BhP_12.11.021/3 aniruddha iti brahman mūrti-vyūho 'bhidhīyate
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ iti brahman mūrti vyūhaḥ bhidhīyate

original: BhP_12.11.022/1 sa viśvas taijasaḥ prājñas turīya iti vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: sa viśvaḥ taijasaḥ prājñaḥ turīyaḥ iti vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_12.11.022/3 arthendriyāśaya-jñānair bhagavān paribhāvyate
analyzed: artha indriya āśaya jñānaiḥ bhagavān paribhāvyate

original: BhP_12.11.023/1 aṅgopāṅgāyudhākalpair bhagavāṃs tac catuṣṭayam
analyzed: aṅga upāṅga āyudha ākalpaiḥ bhagavān tat catuṣṭayam

original: BhP_12.11.023/3 bibharti sma catur-mūrtir bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: bibharti sma caturmūrtiḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.11.024/1 dvija-ṛṣabha sa eṣa brahma-yoniḥ svayaṃ-dṛk
analyzed: dvija ṛṣabha saḥ eṣa brahma yoniḥ svayaṃdṛś

original: BhP_12.11.024/2 sva-mahima-paripūrṇo māyayā ca svayaitat
analyzed: sva mahima paripūrṇaḥ māyayā ca svayā etat

original: BhP_12.11.024/3 sṛjati harati pātīty ākhyayānāvṛtākṣo
analyzed: sṛjati harati pāti iti ākhyayā an āvṛta akṣaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.024/4 vivṛta iva niruktas tat-parair ātma-labhyaḥ
analyzed: vivṛtaḥ iva niruktaḥ tad paraiḥ ātma labhyaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.025/1 śrī-kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-sakha vṛṣṇy-ṛṣabhāvani-dhrug-
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇasakha

original: BhP_12.11.025/2 rājanya-vaṃśa-dahanānapavarga-vīrya
analyzed: rājanya vaṃśa dahana anapavarga vīrya

original: BhP_12.11.025/3 govinda gopa-vanitā-vraja-bhṛtya-gīta
analyzed: govinda gopa vanitā vraja bhṛtya gīta

original: BhP_12.11.025/4 tīrtha-śravaḥ śravaṇa-maṅgala pāhi bhṛtyān
analyzed: tīrtha śravaḥ śravaṇa maṅgala pāhi bhṛtyān

original: BhP_12.11.026/1 ya idaṃ kalya utthāya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: yaḥ idam kalye utthāya mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_12.11.026/3 tac-cittaḥ prayato japtvā brahma veda guhāśayam
analyzed: tad cittaḥ prayataḥ japtvā brahma veda guhā āśayam

original: BhP_12.11.027/0 śrī-śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.11.027/1 śuko yad āha bhagavān viṣṇu-rātāya śṛṇvate
analyzed: śukaḥ yat āha bhagavān viṣṇurātāya śṛṇvate

original: BhP_12.11.027/3 sauro gaṇo māsi māsi nānā vasati saptakaḥ
analyzed: sauraḥ gaṇaḥ māsi māsi nānā vasati saptakaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.028/1 teṣāṃ nāmāni karmāṇi niyuktānām adhīśvaraiḥ
analyzed: teṣām nāmāni karmāṇi niyuktānām adhīśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_12.11.028/3 brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānāṃ vyūhaṃ sūryātmano hareḥ
analyzed: brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām vyūham sūrya ātmanaḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_12.11.029/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.11.029/1 anādy-avidyayā viṣṇor ātmanaḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: anādya vidyayā viṣṇoḥ ātmanaḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_12.11.029/3 nirmito loka-tantro 'yaṃ lokeṣu parivartate
analyzed: nirmitaḥ lokatantraḥ yam lokeṣu parivartate

original: BhP_12.11.030/1 eka eva hi lokānāṃ sūrya ātmādi-kṛd dhariḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi lokānām sūryaḥ ātma ādi kṛt hariḥ

original: BhP_12.11.030/3 sarva-veda-kriyā-mūlam ṛṣibhir bahudhoditaḥ
analyzed: sarva veda kriyā mūlam ṛṣibhiḥ bahudhā uditaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.031/1 kālo deśaḥ kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ kāryam āgamaḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ deśaḥ kriyā kartā karaṇam kāryam āgamaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.031/3 dravyaṃ phalam iti brahman navadhokto 'jayā hariḥ
analyzed: dravyam phalam iti brahman navadhā uktaḥ jayā hariḥ

original: BhP_12.11.032/1 madhv-ādiṣu dvādaśasu bhagavān kāla-rūpa-dhṛk
analyzed: madhu ādiṣu dvādaśasu bhagavān kāla rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_12.11.032/3 loka-tantrāya carati pṛthag dvādaśabhir gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: lokatantrāya carati pṛthak dvādaśabhiḥ gaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_12.11.033/1 dhātā kṛtasthalī hetir vāsukī rathakṛn mune
analyzed: dhātā kṛtasthalī hetiḥ vāsukī rathakṛt mune

original: BhP_12.11.033/3 pulastyas tumburur iti madhu-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: pulastyaḥ tumburuḥ iti madhu māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.034/1 aryamā pulaho 'thaujāḥ prahetiḥ puñjikasthalī
analyzed: aryamā pulahaḥ thaujāḥ prahetiḥ puñjikasthalī

original: BhP_12.11.034/3 nāradaḥ kacchanīraś ca nayanty ete sma mādhavam
analyzed: nāradaḥ kacchanīraḥ ca nayanti ete sma mādhavam

original: BhP_12.11.035/1 mitro 'triḥ pauruṣeyo 'tha takṣako menakā hahāḥ
analyzed: mitraḥ tris pauruṣeyaḥ tha takṣakaḥ menakā hahāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.035/3 rathasvana iti hy ete śukra-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: ratha svanaḥ iti hi ete śukra māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.036/1 vasiṣṭho varuṇo rambhā sahajanyas tathā huhūḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ varuṇaḥ rambhā sahajanyaḥ tathā huhūḥ

original: BhP_12.11.036/3 śukraś citrasvanaś caiva śuci-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: śukraḥ citrasvanaḥ ca eva śuci māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.037/1 indro viśvāvasuḥ śrotā elāpatras tathāṅgirāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ śrotā elāpatraḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.037/3 pramlocā rākṣaso varyo nabho-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: pramlocāḥ rākṣasaḥ varyaḥ nabhaḥ māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.038/1 vivasvān ugrasenaś ca vyāghra āsāraṇo bhṛguḥ
analyzed: vivasvān ugrasenaḥ ca vyāghraḥ āsāraṇaḥ bhṛguḥ

original: BhP_12.11.038/3 anumlocā śaṅkhapālo nabhasyākhyaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: anumlocā śaṅkhapālaḥ nabhasya ākhyam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.039/1 pūṣā dhanañjayo vātaḥ suṣeṇaḥ surucis tathā
analyzed: pūṣā dhanañjayaḥ vātaḥ suṣeṇaḥ suruciḥ tathā

original: BhP_12.11.039/3 ghṛtācī gautamaś ceti tapo-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: ghṛtācī gautamaḥ ca iti tapaḥ māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.040/1 ṛtur varcā bharadvājaḥ parjanyaḥ senajit tathā
analyzed: ṛtuḥ varcāḥ bharadvājaḥ parjanyaḥ senajit tathā

original: BhP_12.11.040/3 viśva airāvataś caiva tapasyākhyaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: viśvaḥ airāvataḥ ca eva tapasya ākhyam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.041/1 athāṃśuḥ kaśyapas tārkṣya ṛtasenas tathorvaśī
analyzed: atha aṃśuḥ kaśyapaḥ tārkṣyaḥ ṛtasenaḥ tathā urvaśī

original: BhP_12.11.041/3 vidyucchatrur mahāśaṅkhaḥ saho-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: vidyucchatruḥ mahāśaṅkhaḥ saha umāsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.042/1 bhagaḥ sphūrjo 'riṣṭanemir ūrṇa āyuś ca pañcamaḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ sphūrjaḥ riṣṭanemiḥ ūrṇaḥ āyuḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.042/3 karkoṭakaḥ pūrvacittiḥ puṣya-māsaṃ nayanty amī
BhP_12.11.043/1 tvaṣṭā ṛcīka-tanayaḥ kambalaś ca tilottamā
analyzed: tvaṣṭā ṛcīka tanayaḥ kambalaḥ ca tilottamā

original: BhP_12.11.043/3 brahmāpeto 'tha satajid dhṛtarāṣṭra iṣam-bharāḥ
analyzed: satajit dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ iṣambharāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.044/1 viṣṇur aśvataro rambhā sūryavarcāś ca satyajit
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ aśvataraḥ rambhā sūryavarcāḥ ca satyajit

original: BhP_12.11.044/3 viśvāmitro makhāpeta ūrja-māsaṃ nayanty amī
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ makha apetaḥ ūrja māsam nayanti amī

original: BhP_12.11.045/1 etā bhagavato viṣṇor ādityasya vibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: etāḥ bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ ādityasya vibhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.045/3 smaratāṃ sandhyayor nṝṇāṃ haranty aṃho dine dine
analyzed: smaratām sandhyayoḥ nṝṇām haranti aṃhaḥ dine dine

original: BhP_12.11.046/1 dvādaśasv api māseṣu devo 'sau ṣaḍbhir asya vai
analyzed: dvādaśasu api māseṣu sau ṣaḍbhiḥ asya vai

original: BhP_12.11.046/3 caran samantāt tanute paratreha ca san-matim
analyzed: caran samantāt tanute paratra iha ca sat matim

original: BhP_12.11.047/1 sāmarg-yajurbhis tal-liṅgair ṛṣayaḥ saṃstuvanty amum
analyzed: sāma ṛc yajurbhiḥ tad liṅgaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ saṃstuvanti amum

original: BhP_12.11.047/3 gandharvās taṃ pragāyanti nṛtyanty apsaraso 'grataḥ
analyzed: gandharvāḥ tam pragāyanti nṛtyanti apsarasaḥ gratas

original: BhP_12.11.048/1 unnahyanti rathaṃ nāgā grāmaṇyo ratha-yojakāḥ
analyzed: unnahyanti ratham nāgāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ratha yojakāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.048/3 codayanti rathaṃ pṛṣṭhe nairṛtā bala-śālinaḥ
analyzed: codayanti ratham pṛṣṭhe nairṛtāḥ bala śālinaḥ

original: BhP_12.11.049/1 vālakhilyāḥ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir brahmarṣayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: vālakhilyāḥ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ brahmarṣayaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_12.11.049/3 purato 'bhimukhaṃ yānti stuvanti stutibhir vibhum
analyzed: puratas abhimukham yānti stuvanti stutibhiḥ vibhum

original: BhP_12.11.050/1 evaṃ hy anādi-nidhano bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam hi an ādi nidhanaḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.11.050/3 kalpe kalpe svam ātmānaṃ vyūhya lokān avaty ajaḥ
analyzed: kalpe kalpe svam ātmānam vyūhya lokān avati ajaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.12.001/1 namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
analyzed: namaḥ dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase

original: BhP_12.12.001/3 brahmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣye sanātanān
analyzed: brahmaṇebhyaḥ namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣye sanātanān

original: BhP_12.12.002/1 etad vaḥ kathitaṃ viprā viṣṇoś caritam adbhutam
analyzed: etat vaḥ kathitam viprāḥ viṣṇoḥ caritam adbhutam

original: BhP_12.12.002/3 bhavadbhir yad ahaṃ pṛṣṭo narāṇāṃ puruṣocitam
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ yat aham pṛṣṭaḥ narāṇām puruṣa ucitam

original: BhP_12.12.003/1 atra saṅkīrtitaḥ sākṣāt sarva-pāpa-haro hariḥ
analyzed: atra saṅkīrtitaḥ sākṣāt sarva pāpa haraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_12.12.003/3 nārāyaṇo hṛṣīkeśo bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_12.12.004/1 atra brahma paraṃ guhyaṃ jagataḥ prabhavāpyayam
analyzed: atra brahma param guhyam jagataḥ prabhava apyayam

original: BhP_12.12.004/3 jñānaṃ ca tad-upākhyānaṃ proktaṃ vijñāna-saṃyutam
analyzed: jñānam ca tat upākhyānam proktam vijñāna saṃyutam

original: BhP_12.12.005/1 bhakti-yogaḥ samākhyāto vairāgyaṃ ca tad-āśrayam
analyzed: bhakti yogaḥ samākhyātaḥ vairāgyam ca tad āśrayam

original: BhP_12.12.005/3 pārīkṣitam upākhyānaṃ nāradākhyānam eva ca
analyzed: pārīkṣitam upākhyānam nārada ākhyānam eva ca

original: BhP_12.12.006/1 prāyopaveśo rājarṣer vipra-śāpāt parīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: prāya upaveśaḥ rājarṣeḥ vipra śāpāt parīkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.006/3 śukasya brahmarṣabhasya saṃvādaś ca parīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: śukasya brahmarṣabhasya saṃvādaḥ ca parīkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.007/1 yoga-dhāraṇayotkrāntiḥ saṃvādo nāradājayoḥ
analyzed: yoga dhāraṇayā utkrāntiḥ saṃvādaḥ nārada ājayoḥ

original: BhP_12.12.007/3 avatārānugītaṃ ca sargaḥ prādhāniko 'grataḥ
analyzed: avatāra anugītam ca sargaḥ prādhānikaḥ gratas

original: BhP_12.12.008/1 viduroddhava-saṃvādaḥ kṣattṛ-maitreyayos tataḥ
analyzed: vidura uddhava saṃvādaḥ kṣattṛ maitreyayoḥ tatas

original: BhP_12.12.008/3 purāṇa-saṃhitā-praśno mahā-puruṣa-saṃsthitiḥ
BhP_12.12.009/1 tataḥ prākṛtikaḥ sargaḥ sapta vaikṛtikāś ca ye
analyzed: tatas prākṛtikaḥ sargaḥ sapta vaikṛtikāḥ ca ye

original: BhP_12.12.009/3 tato brahmāṇḍa-sambhūtir vairājaḥ puruṣo yataḥ
analyzed: tatas brahmāṇḍa sambhūtiḥ vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ yatas

original: BhP_12.12.010/1 kālasya sthūla-sūkṣmasya gatiḥ padma-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: kālasya sthūla sūkṣmasya gatiḥ padma samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.010/3 bhuva uddharaṇe 'mbhodher hiraṇyākṣa-vadho yathā
analyzed: bhuvaḥ uddharaṇe mbhodheḥ hiraṇyākṣa vadhaḥ yathā

original: BhP_12.12.011/1 ūrdhva-tiryag-avāk-sargo rudra-sargas tathaiva ca
analyzed: ūrdhva tiryak avāk sargaḥ rudra sargaḥ tathā eva ca

original: BhP_12.12.011/3 ardha-nārīśvarasyātha yataḥ svāyambhuvo manuḥ
analyzed: ardhanārīśvarasya atha yatas svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_12.12.012/1 śatarūpā ca yā strīṇām ādyā prakṛtir uttamā
analyzed: śata rūpā ca yā strīṇām ādyā prakṛtiḥ uttamā

original: BhP_12.12.012/3 santāno dharma-patnīnāṃ kardamasya prajāpateḥ
analyzed: santānaḥ dharma patnīnām kardamasya prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_12.12.013/1 avatāro bhagavataḥ kapilasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: avatāraḥ bhagavataḥ kapilasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.013/3 devahūtyāś ca saṃvādaḥ kapilena ca dhīmatā
analyzed: devahūtyāḥ ca saṃvādaḥ kapilena ca dhīmatā

original: BhP_12.12.014/1 nava-brahma-samutpattir dakṣa-yajña-vināśanam
BhP_12.12.014/3 dhruvasya caritaṃ paścāt pṛthoḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: dhruvasya caritam paścāt pṛthoḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.015/1 nāradasya ca saṃvādas tataḥ praiyavrataṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: nāradasya ca saṃvādaḥ tatas praiyavratam dvijāḥ

original: BhP_12.12.015/3 nābhes tato 'nucaritam ṛṣabhasya bharatasya ca
analyzed: nābheḥ tatas nu caritam ṛṣabhasya bharatasya ca

original: BhP_12.12.016/1 dvīpa-varṣa-samudrāṇāṃ giri-nady-upavarṇanam
analyzed: dvīpa varṣa samudrāṇām giri nadī upavarṇanam

original: BhP_12.12.016/3 jyotiś-cakrasya saṃsthānaṃ pātāla-naraka-sthitiḥ
BhP_12.12.017/1 dakṣa-janma pracetobhyas tat-putrīṇāṃ ca santatiḥ
analyzed: dakṣa janma pracetobhyaḥ tad putrīṇām ca santatiḥ

original: BhP_12.12.017/3 yato devāsura-narās tiryaṅ-naga-khagādayaḥ
analyzed: yatas deva asura narāḥ tiryak naga khaga ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.018/1 tvāṣṭrasya janma-nidhanaṃ putrayoś ca diter dvijāḥ
analyzed: tvāṣṭrasya janma nidhanam putrayoḥ ca diteḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_12.12.018/3 daityeśvarasya caritaṃ prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: daitya īśvarasya caritam prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.019/1 manv-antarānukathanaṃ gajendrasya vimokṣaṇam
analyzed: manvantara anukathanam gaja indrasya vimokṣaṇam

original: BhP_12.12.019/3 manv-antarāvatārāś ca viṣṇor hayaśirādayaḥ
analyzed: manvantara avatārāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ hayaśira ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.020/1 kaurmaṃ mātsyaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ vāmanaṃ ca jagat-pateḥ
analyzed: kaurmam mātsyam nārasiṃham vāmanam ca jagatpateḥ

original: BhP_12.12.020/3 kṣīroda-mathanaṃ tadvad amṛtārthe divaukasām
analyzed: kṣīroda mathanam tadvat amṛta arthe divaukasām

original: BhP_12.12.021/1 devāsura-mahā-yuddhaṃ rāja-vaṃśānukīrtanam
BhP_12.12.021/3 ikṣvāku-janma tad-vaṃśaḥ sudyumnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: ikṣvāku janma tad vaṃśaḥ sudyumnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.022/1 ilopākhyānam atroktaṃ tāropākhyānam eva ca
analyzed: ila upākhyānam atra uktam tāra upākhyānam eva ca

original: BhP_12.12.022/3 sūrya-vaṃśānukathanaṃ śaśādādyā nṛgādayaḥ
analyzed: sūryavaṃśa anukathanam śaśāda ādyāḥ nṛga ādayaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.023/1 saukanyaṃ cātha śaryāteḥ kakutsthasya ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: saukanyam ca atha śaryāteḥ kakutsthasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: BhP_12.12.023/3 khaṭvāṅgasya ca māndhātuḥ saubhareḥ sagarasya ca
analyzed: khaṭvāṅgasya ca māndhātuḥ saubhareḥ sagarasya ca

original: BhP_12.12.024/1 rāmasya kośalendrasya caritaṃ kilbiṣāpaham
analyzed: rāmasya kośala indrasya caritam kilbiṣa apaham

original: BhP_12.12.024/3 nimer aṅga-parityāgo janakānāṃ ca sambhavaḥ
analyzed: nimeḥ aṅga parityāgaḥ janakānām ca sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.025/1 rāmasya bhārgavendrasya niḥkṣatṛī-karaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya bhārgava indrasya niḥkṣatṛīkaraṇam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.025/3 ailasya soma-vaṃśasya yayāter nahuṣasya ca
analyzed: ailasya soma vaṃśasya yayāteḥ nahuṣasya ca

original: BhP_12.12.026/1 dauṣmanter bharatasyāpi śāntanos tat-sutasya ca
analyzed: dauṣmanteḥ bharatasya api śāntanoḥ tad sutasya ca

original: BhP_12.12.026/3 yayāter jyeṣṭha-putrasya yador vaṃśo 'nukīrtitaḥ
analyzed: yayāteḥ jyeṣṭha putrasya yadoḥ vaṃśaḥ nu kīrtitaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.027/1 yatrāvatīṛṇo bhagavān kṛṣṇākhyo jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: bhagavān kṛṣṇa ākhyaḥ jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_12.12.027/3 vasudeva-gṛhe janma tato vṛddhiś ca gokule
analyzed: vasudeva gṛhe janma tatas vṛddhiḥ ca gokule

original: BhP_12.12.028/1 tasya karmāṇy apārāṇi kīrtitāny asura-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: tasya karmāṇi apārāṇi kīrtitāni asura dviṣaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.028/3 pūtanāsu-payaḥ-pānaṃ śakaṭoccāṭanaṃ śiśoḥ
analyzed: pūtanā su payaḥ pānam śakaṭa uccāṭanam śiśoḥ

original: BhP_12.12.029/1 tṛṇāvartasya niṣpeṣas tathaiva baka-vatsayoḥ
analyzed: tṛṇāvartasya niṣpeṣaḥ tathā eva baka vatsayoḥ

original: BhP_12.12.029/3 aghāsura-vadho dhātrā vatsa-pālāvagūhanam
analyzed: agha asura vadhaḥ dhātrā vatsa pāla avagūhanam

original: BhP_12.12.030/1 dhenukasya saha-bhrātuḥ pralambasya ca saṅkṣayaḥ
analyzed: dhenukasya sahabhrātuḥ pralambasya ca saṅkṣayaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.030/3 gopānāṃ ca paritrāṇaṃ dāvāgneḥ parisarpataḥ
analyzed: gopānām ca paritrāṇam dāva agneḥ parisarpataḥ

original: BhP_12.12.031/1 damanaṃ kāliyasyāher mahāher nanda-mokṣaṇam
analyzed: damanam kāliyasya aheḥ mahā aheḥ nanda mokṣaṇam

original: BhP_12.12.031/3 vrata-caryā tu kanyānāṃ yatra tuṣṭo 'cyuto vrataiḥ
analyzed: vrata caryā tu kanyānām yatra cyutaḥ vrataiḥ

original: BhP_12.12.032/1 prasādo yajña-patnībhyo viprāṇāṃ cānutāpanam
analyzed: prasādaḥ yajña patnībhyaḥ viprāṇām ca anutāpanam

original: BhP_12.12.032/3 govardhanoddhāraṇaṃ ca śakrasya surabher atha
analyzed: govardhana uddhāraṇam ca śakrasya surabheḥ atha

original: BhP_12.12.033/1 yajñabhiṣekaḥ kṛṣṇasya strībhiḥ krīḍā ca rātriṣu
analyzed: yajña abhiṣekaḥ kṛṣṇasya strībhiḥ krīḍā ca rātriṣu

original: BhP_12.12.033/3 śaṅkhacūḍasya durbuddher vadho 'riṣṭasya keśinaḥ
analyzed: śaṅkhacūḍasya durbuddheḥ vadhaḥ riṣṭasya keśinaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.034/1 akrūrāgamanaṃ paścāt prasthānaṃ rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: akrūra āgamanam paścāt prasthānam rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_12.12.034/3 vraja-strīṇāṃ vilāpaś ca mathurālokanaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: vraja strīṇām vilāpaḥ ca mathurā ālokanam tatas

original: BhP_12.12.035/1 gaja-muṣṭika-cāṇūra- kaṃsādīnāṃ tathā vadhaḥ
analyzed: gaja muṣṭika cāṇūra kaṃsa ādīnām tathā vadhaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.035/3 mṛtasyānayanaṃ sūnoḥ punaḥ sāndīpaner guroḥ
analyzed: mṛtasya ānayanam sūnoḥ punar sāndīpaneḥ guroḥ

original: BhP_12.12.036/1 mathurāyāṃ nivasatā yadu-cakrasya yat priyam
analyzed: mathurāyām nivasatā yadu cakrasya yat priyam

original: BhP_12.12.036/3 kṛtam uddhava-rāmābhyāṃ yutena hariṇā dvijāḥ
analyzed: kṛtam uddhava rāmābhyām yutena hariṇā dvijāḥ

original: BhP_12.12.037/1 jarāsandha-samānīta- sainyasya bahuśo vadhaḥ
analyzed: jarāsandha samānīta sainyasya bahuśas vadhaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.037/3 ghātanaṃ yavanendrasya kuśasthalyā niveśanam
analyzed: ghātanam yavana indrasya kuśasthalyāḥ niveśanam

original: BhP_12.12.038/1 ādānaṃ pārijātasya sudharmāyāḥ surālayāt
analyzed: ādānam pārijātasya sudharmāyāḥ surālayāt

original: BhP_12.12.038/3 rukmiṇyā haraṇaṃ yuddhe pramathya dviṣato hareḥ
analyzed: rukmiṇyāḥ haraṇam yuddhe pramathya dviṣataḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_12.12.039/1 harasya jṛmbhaṇaṃ yuddhe bāṇasya bhuja-kṛntanam
analyzed: harasya jṛmbhaṇam yuddhe bāṇasya bhuja kṛntanam

original: BhP_12.12.039/3 prāgjyotiṣa-patiṃ hatvā kanyānāṃ haraṇaṃ ca yat
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣa patim hatvā kanyānām haraṇam ca yat

original: BhP_12.12.040/1 caidya-pauṇḍraka-śālvānāṃ dantavakrasya durmateḥ
analyzed: caidya pauṇḍraka śālvānām dantavakrasya durmateḥ

original: BhP_12.12.040/3 śambaro dvividaḥ pīṭho muraḥ pañcajanādayaḥ
BhP_12.12.041/1 māhātmyaṃ ca vadhas teṣāṃ vārāṇasyāś ca dāhanam
analyzed: māhātmyam ca vadhaḥ teṣām vārāṇasyāḥ ca dāhanam

original: BhP_12.12.041/3 bhārāvataraṇaṃ bhūmer nimittī-kṛtya pāṇḍavān
analyzed: bhāra avataraṇam bhūmeḥ nimittīkṛtya pāṇḍavān

original: BhP_12.12.042/1 vipra-śāpāpadeśena saṃhāraḥ sva-kulasya ca
analyzed: vipra śāpa apadeśena saṃhāraḥ sva kulasya ca

original: BhP_12.12.042/3 uddhavasya ca saṃvādo vasudevasya cādbhutaḥ
analyzed: uddhavasya ca saṃvādaḥ vasudevasya ca adbhutaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.043/1 yatrātma-vidyā hy akhilā proktā dharma-vinirṇayaḥ
analyzed: yatra ātma vidyā hi akhilā proktā dharma vinirṇayaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.043/3 tato martya-parityāga ātma-yogānubhāvataḥ
analyzed: tatas martya parityāgaḥ ātma yoga anubhāvataḥ

original: BhP_12.12.044/1 yuga-lakṣaṇa-vṛttiś ca kalau nṝṇām upaplavaḥ
analyzed: yuga lakṣaṇa vṛttiḥ ca kalau nṝṇām upaplavaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.044/3 catur-vidhaś ca pralaya utpattis tri-vidhā tathā
analyzed: caturvidhaḥ ca pralayaḥ utpattiḥ trividhā tathā

original: BhP_12.12.045/1 deha-tyāgaś ca rājarṣer viṣṇu-rātasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: dehatyāgaḥ ca rājarṣeḥ viṣṇurātasya dhīmataḥ

original: BhP_12.12.045/3 śākhā-praṇayanam ṛṣer mārkaṇḍeyasya sat-kathā
analyzed: śākhā praṇayanam ṛṣeḥ mārkaṇḍeyasya sat kathā

original: BhP_12.12.045/5 mahā-puruṣa-vinyāsaḥ sūryasya jagad-ātmanaḥ
BhP_12.12.046/1 iti coktaṃ dvija-śreṣṭhā yat pṛṣṭo 'ham ihāsmi vaḥ
analyzed: iti ca uktam dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham iha asmi vaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.046/3 līlāvatāra-karmāṇi kīrtitānīha sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: līlāvatāra karmāṇi kīrtitāni iha sarvaśas

original: BhP_12.12.047/1 patitaḥ skhalitaś cārtaḥ kṣuttvā vā vivaśo gṛṇan
analyzed: patitaḥ skhalitaḥ ca ārtaḥ kṣuttvā vā vivaśaḥ gṛṇan

original: BhP_12.12.047/3 haraye nama ity uccair mucyate sarva-pātakāt
analyzed: haraye namaḥ iti uccais mucyate sarva pātakāt

original: BhP_12.12.048/1 saṅkīrtyamāno bhagavān anantaḥ śrutānubhāvo vyasanaṃ hi puṃsām
analyzed: saṅkīrtyamānaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ śruta anubhāvaḥ vyasanam hi puṃsām

original: BhP_12.12.048/3 praviśya cittaṃ vidhunoty aśeṣaṃ yathā tamo 'rko 'bhram ivāti-vātaḥ
analyzed: praviśya cittam vidhunoti aśeṣam yathā tamaḥ rkaḥ bhram iva ati vātaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.049/1 mṛṣā giras tā hy asatīr asat-kathā na kathyate yad bhagavān adhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: mṛṣā giraḥ tāḥ hi asatīḥ asat kathāḥ na kathyate yat bhagavān adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.049/3 tad eva satyaṃ tad u haiva maṅgalaṃ tad eva puṇyaṃ bhagavad-guṇodayam
analyzed: tat eva satyam tat u ha eva maṅgalam tat eva puṇyam bhagavat guṇa udayam

original: BhP_12.12.050/1 tad eva ramyaṃ ruciraṃ navaṃ navaṃ tad eva śaśvan manaso mahotsavam
analyzed: tat eva ramyam ruciram navam navam tat eva śaśvat manasaḥ mahā utsavam

original: BhP_12.12.050/3 tad eva śokārṇava-śoṣaṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ yad uttamaḥśloka-yaśo 'nugīyate
analyzed: tat eva śoka arṇava śoṣaṇam nṛṇām yat uttamaḥśloka yaśaḥ nugīyate

original: BhP_12.12.051/1 na yad vacaś citra-padaṃ harer yaśo
analyzed: na yat vacaḥ citra padam hareḥ yaśaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.051/2 jagat-pavitraṃ pragṛṇīta karhicit
analyzed: jagat pavitram pragṛṇīta karhicit

original: BhP_12.12.051/3 tad dhvāṅkṣa-tīṛthaṃ na tu haṃsa-sevitaṃ
analyzed: tat dhvāṅkṣatīṛtham na tu haṃsa sevitam

original: BhP_12.12.051/4 yatrācyutas tatra hi sādhavo 'malāḥ
analyzed: yatra acyutaḥ tatra hi sādhavaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_12.12.052/1 tad vāg-visargo janatāgha-samplavo yasmin prati-ślokam abaddhavaty api
analyzed: tat vāgvisargaḥ janatā agha samplavaḥ yasmin pratiślokam a baddhavatī api

original: BhP_12.12.052/3 nāmāny anantasya yaśo 'ṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ
analyzed: nāmāni anantasya yaśaḥ ṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.053/1 naiṣkarmyam apy acyuta-bhāva-varjitaṃ
analyzed: naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam

original: BhP_12.12.053/2 na śobhate jñānam alaṃ nirañjanam
analyzed: na śobhate jñānam alam nirañjanam

original: BhP_12.12.053/3 kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvad abhadram īśvare
analyzed: kutas punar śaśvat abhadram īśvare

original: BhP_12.12.053/4 na hy arpitaṃ karma yad apy anuttamam
analyzed: na hi arpitam karma yat api anuttamam

original: BhP_12.12.054/1 yaśaḥ-śriyām eva pariśramaḥ paro varṇāśramācāra-tapaḥ-śrutādiṣu
analyzed: yaśaḥ śriyām eva pariśramaḥ paraḥ varṇa āśrama ācāra tapaḥ śruta ādiṣu

original: BhP_12.12.054/3 avismṛtiḥ śrīdhara-pāda-padmayor guṇānuvāda-śravaṇādarādibhiḥ
BhP_12.12.055/1 avismṛtiḥ kṛṣṇa-padāravindayoḥ kṣiṇoty abhadrāṇi ca śaṃ tanoti
analyzed: a vismṛtiḥ kṛṣṇa pada aravindayoḥ kṣiṇoti abhadrāṇi ca śam tanoti

original: BhP_12.12.055/3 sattvasya śuddhiṃ paramātma-bhaktiṃ jñānaṃ ca vijñāna-virāga-yuktam
analyzed: sattvasya śuddhim parama ātma bhaktim jñānam ca vijñāna virāga yuktam

original: BhP_12.12.056/1 yūyaṃ dvijāgryā bata bhūri-bhāgā yac chaśvad ātmany akhilātma-bhūtam
analyzed: yūyam dvijāgryāḥ bata bhūri bhāgāḥ yat śaśvat ātmani akhilātma bhūtam

original: BhP_12.12.056/3 nārāyaṇaṃ devam adevam īśam ajasra-bhāvā bhajatāviveśya
analyzed: nārāyaṇam devam adevam īśam ajasra bhāvāḥ bhajata āviveśya

original: BhP_12.12.057/1 ahaṃ ca saṃsmārita ātma-tattvaṃ śrutaṃ purā me paramarṣi-vaktrāt
analyzed: aham ca saṃsmāritaḥ ātma tattvam śrutam purā me parama ṛṣi vaktrāt

original: BhP_12.12.057/3 prāyopaveśe nṛpateḥ parīkṣitaḥ sadasy ṛṣīṇāṃ mahatāṃ ca śṛṇvatām
analyzed: prāya upaveśe nṛpateḥ parīkṣitaḥ sadasi ṛṣīṇām mahatām ca śṛṇvatām

original: BhP_12.12.058/1 etad vaḥ kathitaṃ viprāḥ kathanīyoru-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: etat vaḥ kathitam viprāḥ kathanīya uru karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.058/3 māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya sarvāśubha-vināśanam
analyzed: māhātmyam vāsudevasya sarva aśubha vināśanam

original: BhP_12.12.059/1 ya etat śrāvayen nityaṃ yāma-kṣaṇam ananya-dhīḥ
analyzed: yaḥ etat śrāvayet nityam yām akṣaṇam an anya dhīḥ

original: BhP_12.12.059/3 ślokam ekaṃ tad-ardhaṃ vā pādaṃ pādārdham eva vā
analyzed: ślokam ekam tad ardham vā pādam pāda ardham eva vā

original: BhP_12.12.059/5 śraddhāvān yo 'nuśṛṇuyāt punāty ātmānam eva saḥ
analyzed: śraddhāvān yaḥ nu śṛṇuyāt punāti ātmānam eva saḥ

original: BhP_12.12.060/1 dvādaśyām ekādaśyāṃ vā śṛṇvann āyuṣyavān bhavet
analyzed: dvādaśyām ekādaśyām vā śṛṇvan āyuṣyavān bhavet

original: BhP_12.12.060/3 paṭhaty anaśnan prayataḥ pūto bhavati pātakāt
analyzed: paṭhati an aśnan prayataḥ pūtaḥ bhavati pātakāt

original: BhP_12.12.061/1 puṣkare mathurayāṃ ca dvāravatyāṃ yatātmavān
analyzed: puṣkare ca dvāravatyām yata ātmavān

original: BhP_12.12.061/3 upoṣya saṃhitām etāṃ paṭhitvā mucyate bhayāt
analyzed: upoṣya saṃhitām etām paṭhitvā mucyate bhayāt

original: BhP_12.12.062/1 devatā munayaḥ siddhāḥ pitaro manavo nṛpāḥ
analyzed: devatāḥ munayaḥ siddhāḥ pitaraḥ manavaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_12.12.062/3 yacchanti kāmān gṛṇataḥ śṛṇvato yasya kīrtanāt
analyzed: yacchanti kāmān gṛṇataḥ śṛṇvataḥ yasya kīrtanāt

original: BhP_12.12.063/1 ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni dvijo 'dhītyānuvindate
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni dvijaḥ dhītyā anuvindate

original: BhP_12.12.063/3 madhu-kulyā ghṛta-kulyāḥ payaḥ-kulyāś ca tat phalam
analyzed: madhu kulyāḥ ghṛta kulyāḥ payaḥ kulyāḥ ca tat phalam

original: BhP_12.12.064/1 purāṇa-saṃhitām etām adhītya prayato dvijaḥ
analyzed: purāṇa saṃhitām etām adhītya prayataḥ dvijaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.064/3 proktaṃ bhagavatā yat tu tat padaṃ paramaṃ vrajet
analyzed: proktam bhagavatā yat tu tat padam paramam vrajet

original: BhP_12.12.065/1 vipro 'dhītyāpnuyāt prajñāṃ rājanyodadhi-mekhalām
analyzed: vipraḥ dhītya āpnuyāt prajñām rājanya udadhi mekhalām

original: BhP_12.12.065/3 vaiśyo nidhi-patitvaṃ ca śūdraḥ śudhyeta pātakāt
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ nidhi pati tvam ca śūdraḥ śudhyeta pātakāt

original: BhP_12.12.066/1 kali-mala-saṃhati-kālano 'khileśo harir itaratra na gīyate hy abhīkṣṇam
analyzed: kali mala saṃhati kālano khila īśaḥ hariḥ itaratra na gīyate hi abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_12.12.066/3 iha tu punar bhagavān aśeṣa-mūrtiḥ paripaṭhito 'nu-padaṃ kathā-prasaṅgaiḥ
analyzed: iha tu punar bhagavān aśeṣa mūrtiḥ paripaṭhitaḥ nupadam kathā prasaṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_12.12.067/1 tam aham ajam anantam ātma-tattvaṃ jagad-udaya-sthiti-saṃyamātma-śaktim
analyzed: tam aham ajam anantam ātma tattvam jagat udaya sthiti saṃyama ātma śaktim

original: BhP_12.12.067/3 dyu-patibhir aja-śakra-śaṅkarādyair duravasita-stavam acyutaṃ nato 'smi
analyzed: dyupatibhiḥ aja śakra śaṅkara ādyaiḥ duravasita stavam acyutam nataḥ smi

original: BhP_12.12.068/1 upacita-nava-śaktibhiḥ sva ātmany uparacita-sthira-jaṅgamālayāya
analyzed: upacita nava śaktibhiḥ sve ātmani uparacita sthira jaṅgama ālayāya

original: BhP_12.12.068/3 bhagavata upalabdhi-mātra-dhamne sura-ṛṣabhāya namaḥ sanātanāya
analyzed: bhagavataḥ upalabdhi mātra dhamne sura ṛṣabhāya namaḥ sanātanāya

original: BhP_12.12.069/1 sva-sukha-nibhṛta-cetās tad-vyudastānya-bhāvo
analyzed: sva sukha nibhṛta cetāḥ tad vyudasta anya bhāvaḥ

original: BhP_12.12.069/2 'py ajita-rucira-līlākṛṣṭa-sāras tadīyam
analyzed: pi ajita rucira līlā ākṛṣṭa sāraḥ tadīyam

original: BhP_12.12.069/3 vyatanuta kṛpayā yas tattva-dīpaṃ purāṇaṃ
analyzed: vyatanuta kṛpayā yaḥ tattva dīpam purāṇam

original: BhP_12.12.069/4 tam akhila-vṛjina-ghnaṃ vyāsa-sūnuṃ nato 'smi
analyzed: tam akhila vṛjina ghnam vyāsa sūnum nataḥ smi

original: BhP_12.13.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_12.13.001/1 yaṃ brahmā varuṇendra-rudra-marutaḥ stunvanti divyaiḥ stavair
analyzed: yam brahmā varuṇa indra rudra marutaḥ stunvanti divyaiḥ stavaiḥ

original: BhP_12.13.001/2 vedaiḥ sāṅga-pada-kramopaniṣadair gāyanti yaṃ sāma-gāḥ
analyzed: vedaiḥ sa aṅga padakrama upaniṣadaiḥ gāyanti yam sāmagāḥ

original: BhP_12.13.001/3 dhyānāvasthita-tad-gatena manasā paśyanti yaṃ yogino
analyzed: dhyāna avasthita tad gatena manasā paśyanti yam yoginaḥ

original: BhP_12.13.001/4 yasyāntaṃ na viduḥ surāsura-gaṇā devāya tasmai namaḥ
analyzed: yasya antam na viduḥ sura asura gaṇāḥ devāya tasmai namaḥ

original: BhP_12.13.002/1 pṛṣṭhe bhrāmyad amanda-mandara-giri-grāvāgra-kaṇḍūyanān
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe bhrāmyat amanda mandara giri grāvā agra kaṇḍūyanān

original: BhP_12.13.002/2 nidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛter bhagavataḥ śvāsānilāḥ pāntu vaḥ
analyzed: nidrāloḥ kamaṭha ākṛteḥ bhagavataḥ śvāsa anilāḥ pāntu vaḥ

original: BhP_12.13.002/3 yat-saṃskāra-kalānuvartana-vaśād velā-nibhenāmbhasāṃ
analyzed: yat saṃskāra kalā anuvartana vaśāt velā nibhena ambhasām

original: BhP_12.13.002/4 yātāyātam atandritaṃ jala-nidher nādyāpi viśrāmyati
analyzed: yāta āyātam atandritam jalanidheḥ na adya api viśrāmyati

original: BhP_12.13.003/1 purāṇa-saṅkhyā-sambhūtim asya vācya-prayojane
analyzed: purāṇa saṅkhyā sambhūtim asya vācya prayojane

original: BhP_12.13.003/3 dānaṃ dānasya māhātmyaṃ pāṭhādeś ca nibodhata
analyzed: dānam dānasya māhātmyam pāṭhādeḥ ca nibodhata

original: BhP_12.13.004/1 brāhmaṃ daśa sahasrāṇi pādmaṃ pañcona-ṣaṣṭi ca
analyzed: brāhmam daśa sahasrāṇi pādmam pañconaṣaṣṭi ca

original: BhP_12.13.004/2 śrī-vaiṣṇavaṃ trayo-viṃśac catur-viṃśati śaivakam
analyzed: śrīvaiṣṇavam trayoviṃśat caturviṃśati śaivakam

original: BhP_12.13.005/1 daśāṣṭau śrī-bhāgavataṃ nāradaṃ pañca-viṃśati
analyzed: daśa aṣṭau śrībhāgavatam nāradam pañcaviṃśati

original: BhP_12.13.005/3 mārkaṇḍaṃ nava vāhnaṃ ca daśa-pañca catuḥ-śatam
analyzed: mārkaṇḍam nava vāhnam ca daśa pañca catuḥśatam

original: BhP_12.13.006/1 catur-daśa bhaviṣyaṃ syāt tathā pañca-śatāni ca
analyzed: caturdaśa bhaviṣyam syāt tathā pañca śatāni ca

original: BhP_12.13.006/3 daśāṣṭau brahma-vaivartaṃ laiṅgam ekādaśaiva tu
analyzed: daśa aṣṭau brahmavaivartam laiṅgam ekādaśa eva tu

original: BhP_12.13.007/1 catur-viṃśati vārāham ekāśīti-sahasrakam
analyzed: caturviṃśati vārāham ekāśīti sahasrakam

original: BhP_12.13.007/3 skāndaṃ śataṃ tathā caikaṃ vāmanaṃ daśa kīrtitam
analyzed: skāndam śatam tathā ca ekam vāmanam daśa kīrtitam

original: BhP_12.13.008/1 kaurmaṃ sapta-daśākhyātaṃ mātsyaṃ tat tu catur-daśa
analyzed: kaurmam saptadaśa ākhyātam mātsyam tat tu caturdaśa

original: BhP_12.13.008/3 ekona-viṃśat sauparṇaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ dvādaśaiva tu
analyzed: ekonaviṃśat sauparṇam brahmāṇḍam dvādaśa eva tu

original: BhP_12.13.009/1 evaṃ purāṇa-sandohaś catur-lakṣa udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: evam purāṇa sandohaḥ catur lakṣaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_12.13.009/3 tatrāṣṭadaśa-sāhasraṃ śrī-bhāgavataṃ iṣyate
analyzed: tatra aṣṭadaśa sāhasram śrībhāgavatam iṣyate

original: BhP_12.13.010/1 idaṃ bhagavatā pūrvaṃ brahmaṇe nābhi-paṅkaje
analyzed: idam bhagavatā pūrvam brahmaṇe nābhi paṅkaje

original: BhP_12.13.010/3 sthitāya bhava-bhītāya kāruṇyāt samprakāśitam
analyzed: sthitāya bhava bhītāya kāruṇyāt samprakāśitam

original: BhP_12.13.011/1 ādi-madhyāvasāneṣu vairāgyākhyāna-saṃyutam
analyzed: ādi madhya avasāneṣu vairāgya ākhyāna saṃyutam

original: BhP_12.13.011/3 hari-līlā-kathā-vrātā- mṛtānandita-sat-suram
BhP_12.13.012/1 sarva-vedānta-sāraṃ yad brahmātmaikatva-lakṣaṇam
BhP_12.13.012/3 vastv advitīyaṃ tan-niṣṭhaṃ kaivalyaika-prayojanam
BhP_12.13.013/1 prauṣṭhapadyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ hema-siṃha-samanvitam
analyzed: prauṣṭhapadyām paurṇamāsyām hema siṃha samanvitam

original: BhP_12.13.013/3 dadāti yo bhāgavataṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ bhāgavatam sa yāti paramām gatim

original: BhP_12.13.014/1 rājante tāvad anyāni purāṇāni satāṃ gaṇe
analyzed: rājante tāvat anyāni purāṇāni satām gaṇe

original: BhP_12.13.014/3 yāvad bhāgavataṃ naiva śrūyate 'mṛta-sāgaram
analyzed: yāvat bhāgavatam na eva śrūyate mṛta sāgaram

original: BhP_12.13.015/1 sarva-vedānta-sāraṃ hi śrī-bhāgavatam iṣyate
analyzed: sarva vedānta sāram hi śrī bhāgavatam iṣyate

original: BhP_12.13.015/3 tad-rasāmṛta-tṛptasya nānyatra syād ratiḥ kvacit
BhP_12.13.016/1 nimna-gānāṃ yathā gaṅgā devānām acyuto yathā
analyzed: nimnagānām yathā gaṅgā devānām acyutaḥ yathā

original: BhP_12.13.016/3 vaiṣṇavānāṃ yathā śambhuḥ purāṇānām idam tathā
analyzed: vaiṣṇavānām yathā śambhuḥ purāṇānām idam tathā

original: BhP_12.13.017/1 kṣetrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ yathā kāśī hy anuttamā
analyzed: kṣetrāṇām ca eva sarveṣām yathā kāśī hi anuttamā

original: BhP_12.13.017/3 tathā purāṇa-vrātānāṃ śrīmad-bhāgavataṃ dvijāḥ
analyzed: tathā purāṇa vrātānām śrīmat bhāgavatam dvijāḥ

original: BhP_12.13.018/1 śrīmad-bhāgavataṃ purāṇam amalaṃ yad vaiṣṇavānāṃ priyaṃ
analyzed: śrīmat bhāgavatam purāṇam amalam yat vaiṣṇavānām priyam

original: BhP_12.13.018/2 yasmin pāramahaṃsyam ekam amalaṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ gīyate
analyzed: yasmin pāramahaṃsyam ekam amalam jñānam param gīyate

original: BhP_12.13.018/3 tatra jñāna-virāga-bhakti-sahitaṃ naiṣkarmyam āviskṛtaṃ
analyzed: tatra jñāna virāga bhakti sahitam naiṣkarmyam āviskṛtam

original: BhP_12.13.018/4 tac chṛṇvan su-paṭhan vicāraṇa-paro bhaktyā vimucyen naraḥ
analyzed: tat śṛṇvan su paṭhan vicāraṇa paraḥ bhaktyā vimucyet naraḥ

original: BhP_12.13.019/1 kasmai yena vibhāsito 'yam atulo jñāna-pradīpaḥ purā
analyzed: kasmai yena vibhāsitaḥ yam atulaḥ jñāna pradīpaḥ purā

original: BhP_12.13.019/2 tad-rūpeṇa ca nāradāya munaye kṛṣṇāya tad-rūpiṇā
analyzed: tad rūpeṇa ca nāradāya munaye kṛṣṇāya tad rūpiṇā

original: BhP_12.13.019/3 yogīndrāya tad-ātmanātha bhagavad-rātāya kāruṇyatas
analyzed: yogi indrāya tad ātma nātha bhagavat rātāya kāruṇyatas

original: BhP_12.13.019/4 tac chuddhaṃ vimalaṃ viśokam amṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ dhīmahi
analyzed: tat śuddham vimalam viśokam amṛtam satyam param dhīmahi

original: BhP_12.13.020/1 namas tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_12.13.020/3 ya idam kṛpayā kasmai vyācacakṣe mumukṣave
analyzed: yaḥ idam kṛpayā kasmai vyācacakṣe mumukṣave

original: BhP_12.13.021/1 yogīndrāya namas tasmai śukāya brahma-rūpiṇe
analyzed: yogi indrāya namaḥ tasmai śukāya brahma rūpiṇe

original: BhP_12.13.021/3 saṃsāra-sarpa-daṣṭaṃ yo viṣṇu-rātam amūmucat
analyzed: saṃsāra sarpa daṣṭam yaḥ viṣṇurātam amūmucat

original: BhP_12.13.022/1 bhave bhave yathā bhaktiḥ pādayos tava jāyate
analyzed: bhave bhave yathā bhaktiḥ pādayoḥ tava jāyate

original: BhP_12.13.022/3 tathā kuruṣva deveśa nāthas tvaṃ no yataḥ prabho
analyzed: tathā kuruṣva deveśa nāthaḥ tvam naḥ yatas prabho

original: BhP_12.13.023/1 nāma-saṅkīrtanaṃ yasya sarva-pāpa praṇāśanam
analyzed: nāma saṅkīrtanam yasya sarva pāpa praṇāśanam

original: BhP_12.13.023/3 praṇāmo duḥkha-śamanas taṃ namāmi hariṃ param
analyzed: praṇāmaḥ duḥkha śamanaḥ tam namāmi harim param
